GE09ram_03_u:1: 3.001.001a praviśya tu mahāraṇyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam ātmavān 3.001.001c dadarśa rāmo durdharṣas
GE09ram_03_u:3: 3.001.002c yathā pradīptaṃ durdharśaṃ gagane sūryamaṇḍalam 3.001.003a śaraṇyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ susamṛṣṭājiraṃ sadā
GE09ram_03_u:4: 3.001.003c pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:5: 3.001.004a viśālair agniśaraṇaiḥ srugbhāṇḍair ajinaiḥ kuśaiḥ 3.001.004c samidbhis toyakalaśaiḥ phalamūlaiś ca śobhitam 3.001.005a āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:7: 3.001.006a puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā
GE09ram_03_u:9: 3.001.007a sūryavaiśvānarābhaiś ca purāṇair munibhir vṛtam 3.001.007c puṇyaiś a niyatāhāraiḥ śobhitaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ 3.001.008a tad brahmabhavanaprakhyaṃ brahmaghoṣanināditam
GE09ram_03_u:11: 3.001.009a tad dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃs tāpasāśramamaṇḍalam 3.001.009c abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:12: 3.001.010a divyajñānopapannās te rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ 3.001.010c abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:13: 3.001.011a te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:17: 3.001.013a vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_03_u:18: 3.001.013c āścaryabhūtān dadṛśuḥ sarve te vanacāriṇaḥ 3.001.014a atrainaṃ hi mahābhāgāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ 3.001.014c atithiṃ parṇaśālāyāṃ rāghavaṃ saṃnyaveśayan
GE09ram_03_u:19: 3.001.015a tato rāmasya satkṛtya vidhinā pāvakopamāḥ 3.001.015c ājahrus te mahābhāgāḥ salilaṃ dharmacāriṇaḥ 3.001.016a mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:21: 3.001.017a dharmapālo janasyāsya śaraṇyaś ca mahāyaśāḥ 3.001.017c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ
GE09ram_03_u:22: 3.001.018a indrasyaiva caturbhāgaḥ prajā rakṣati rāghava 3.001.018c rājā tasmād vanān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:23: 3.001.019a te vayaṃ bhavatā rakṣyā bhavadviṣayavāsinaḥ 3.001.019c nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:24: 3.001.020a nyastadaṇḍā vayaṃ rājañ jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥ 3.001.020c rakṣitavyās tvayā śaśvad garbhabhūtās tapodhanāḥ 3.001.021a evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam 3.001.021c anyaiś ca vividhāhāraiḥ salakṣmaṇam apūjayan 3.001.022a tathānye tāpasāḥ siddhā rāmaṃ vaiśvānaropamāḥ 3.001.022c nyāyavṛttā yathānyāyaṃ tarpayām āsur īśvaram 3.002.001a kṛtātithyo 'tha rāmas tu sūryasyodayanaṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:25: 3.002.001c āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata
GE09ram_03_u:28: 3.002.003c lakṣmaṇānugato rāmo vanamadhyaṃ dadarśa ha 3.002.004a vanamadhye tu kākutsthas tasmin ghoramṛgāyute 3.002.004c dadarśa giriśṛṅgābhaṃ puruṣādaṃ mahāsvanam
GE09ram_03_u:30: 3.002.005c bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dīrghaṃ vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam 3.002.006a vasānaṃ carmavaiyāghraṃ vasārdraṃ rudhirokṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:32: 3.002.007a trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa 3.002.007c saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat
GE09ram_03_u:34: 3.002.008c sa rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm 3.002.009a abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhaḥ prajāḥ kāla ivāntakaḥ 3.002.009c sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_03_u:38: 3.002.011c kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:39: 3.002.012a adharmacāriṇau pāpau kau yuvāṃ munidūṣakau 3.002.012c ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virāgho nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:40: 3.002.013a carāmi sāyudho nityam ṛṣimāṃsāni bhakṣayan 3.002.013c iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bharyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:41: 3.002.013e yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe
GE09ram_03_u:42: 3.002.014a tasyaivaṃ bruvato dhṛṣṭaṃ virādhasya durātmanaḥ 3.002.014c śrutvā sagarvitaṃ vākyaṃ saṃbhrāntā janakātmajā 3.002.014e sītā prāvepatodvegāt pravāte kadalī yathā 3.002.015a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_03_u:43: 3.002.015c abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā 3.002.016a paśya saumya narendrasya
GE09ram_03_u:44: 3.002.016c mama bhāryāṃ śubhācārāṃ virādhāṅke praveśitām 3.002.016e atyanta sukhasaṃvṛddhāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:45: 3.002.017a yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ vara vṛtaṃ ca yat 3.002.017c kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:46: 3.002.018a yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:47: 3.002.018c yayāhaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ hitaḥ prasthāpito vanam 3.002.018e adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:48: 3.002.019a parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me
GE09ram_03_u:49: 3.002.019c pitur vināśāt saumitre svarājyaharaṇāt tathā 3.002.020a iti bruvati kākutsthe
GE09ram_03_u:50: 3.002.020c abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan
GE09ram_03_u:51: 3.002.021a anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:52: 3.002.021c mayā preṣyeṇa kākutstha kimarthaṃ paritapsyase 3.002.022a śareṇa nihatasyādya mayā kruddhena rakṣasaḥ 3.002.022c virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam
GE09ram_03_u:53: 3.002.023a rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha
GE09ram_03_u:54: 3.002.023c taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale
GE09ram_03_u:55: 3.002.024a mama bhujabalavegavegitaḥ; patatu śaro 'sya mahān mahorasi 3.002.024c vyapanayatu tanoś ca jīvitaṃ; patatu tataś ca mahīṃ vighūrṇitaḥ 3.003.001a athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam
GE09ram_03_u:56: 3.003.001c ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:57: 3.003.002a tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam
GE09ram_03_u:59: 3.003.003a kṣatriyo vṛttasaṃpannau viddhi nau vanagocarau 3.003.003c tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān 3.003.004a tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
GE09ram_03_u:60: 3.003.004c hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:61: 3.003.005a putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā
GE09ram_03_u:62: 3.003.005c virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:63: 3.003.006a tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā
GE09ram_03_u:64: 3.003.006c śastreṇāvadhyatā loke 'cchedyābhedyatvam eva ca 3.003.007a utsṛjya pramadām enām anapekṣau yathāgatam 3.003.007c tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade
GE09ram_03_u:67: 3.003.009a kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam 3.003.009c raṇe saṃprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:68: 3.003.010a tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_03_u:69: 3.003.010c suśīghram abhisaṃdhāya rākṣasaṃ nijaghāna ha 3.003.011a dhanuṣā jyāguṇavatā saptabāṇān mumoca ha 3.003.011c rukmapuṅkhān mahāvegān suparṇānilatulyagān
GE09ram_03_u:70: 3.003.012a te śarīraṃ virādhasya bhittvā barhiṇavāsasaḥ 3.003.012c nipetuḥ śoṇitādigdhā dharaṇyāṃ pāvakopamāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:71: 3.003.013a sa vinadya mahānādaṃ śūlaṃ śakradhvajopamam 3.003.013c pragṛhyāśobhata tadā vyāttānana ivāntakaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:72: 3.003.014a tac chūlaṃ vajrasaṃkāśaṃ gagane jvalanopamam 3.003.014c dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ ciccheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:73: 3.003.015a tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha
GE09ram_03_u:74: 3.003.015c rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:75: 3.003.016a sa bhagnabāhuḥ saṃvigno nipapātāśu rākṣasaḥ 3.003.016c dharaṇyāṃ meghasaṃkāśo vajrabhinna ivācalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:76: 3.003.016e idaṃ provāca kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ puruṣarṣabham 3.003.017a kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:77: 3.003.017c vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:78: 3.003.018a abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum
GE09ram_03_u:79: 3.003.018c tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśvaraṇena hi
GE09ram_03_u:80: 3.003.019a prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ 3.003.019c yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:81: 3.003.020a tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:82: 3.003.020c iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:83: 3.003.021a anupasthīyamāno māṃ saṃkruddho vyajahāra ha 3.003.021c tava prasādān mukto 'ham abhiśāpāt sudāruṇāt 3.003.021e bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:84: 3.003.022a ito vasati dharmātmā śarabhaṅgaḥ pratāpavān 3.003.022c adhyardhayojane tāta maharṣiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:85: 3.003.023a taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati 3.003.023c avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja
GE09ram_03_u:86: 3.003.024a rakṣasāṃ gatasattvānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 3.003.024c avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:87: 3.003.025a evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:89: 3.003.026a taṃ muktakaṇṭham utkṣipya śaṅkukarṇaṃ mahāsvanam 3.003.026c virādhaṃ prākṣipac chvabhre nadantaṃ bhairavasvanam 3.003.027a tatas tu tau kāñcanacitrakārmukau; nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya
GE09ram_03_u:91: 3.003.027c vijahratus tau muditau mahāvane; divi sthitau candradivākarāv
GE09ram_03_u:93: 3.004.001a hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:94: 3.004.001c tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:95: 3.004.001e abravīl lakṣmaṇāṃ rāmo bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.004.002a kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ 3.004.002c abhigacchāmahe śīghraṃ śarabhaṅgaṃ tapodhanam
GE09ram_03_u:98: 3.004.004c samīpe śarabhaṅgasya dadarśa mahad adbhutam 3.004.005a vibhrājamānaṃ vapuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:101: 3.004.006c tadvidhair eva bahubhiḥ pūjyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥ 3.004.007a haribhir vājibhir yuktam antarikṣagataṃ ratham 3.004.007c dadarśādūratas tasya taruṇādityasaṃnibham
GE09ram_03_u:104: 3.004.009c gṛhīte vananārībhyāṃ dhūyamāne ca mūrdhani 3.004.010a gandharvāmarasiddhāś ca bahavaḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:105: 3.004.010c antarikṣagataṃ devaṃ vāgbhir agryābhir īḍire 3.004.011a dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:106: 3.004.011c ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:107: 3.004.011e antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam
GE09ram_03_u:108: 3.004.012a ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham
GE09ram_03_u:109: 3.004.012c śataṃ śataṃ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥ khaḍgapāṇayaḥ 3.004.013a urodeśeṣu sarveṣāṃ hārā
GE09ram_03_u:111: 3.004.014a etad dhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā
GE09ram_03_u:113: 3.004.015a ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:114: 3.004.015c yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe 3.004.016a tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti
GE09ram_03_u:116: 3.004.017a tataḥ samabhigacchantaṃ prekṣya rāmaṃ śacīpatiḥ 3.004.017c śarabhaṅgam anujñāpya vibudhān idam abravīt 3.004.018a ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_03_u:117: 3.004.018c niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati 3.004.019a jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam
GE09ram_03_u:118: 3.004.019c karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_03_u:119: 3.004.020a iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:120: 3.004.020c rathena hariyuktena yayau divam ariṃdamaḥ 3.004.021a prayāte tu sahasrākṣe rāghavaḥ saparicchadaḥ 3.004.021c agnihotram upāsīnaṃ śarabhaṅgam upāgamat
GE09ram_03_u:121: 3.004.022a tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 3.004.022c niṣedus tadanujñātā labdhavāsā nimantritāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:122: 3.004.023a tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:123: 3.004.023c śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_03_u:124: 3.004.024a mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati
GE09ram_03_u:125: 3.004.024c jitam ugreṇa tapasā duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ 3.004.025a ahaṃ jñātvā naravyāghra vartamānam adūrataḥ 3.004.025c brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim
GE09ram_03_u:127: 3.004.026c akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:128: 3.004.026e brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān
GE09ram_03_u:130: 3.004.027c ṛṣiṇā śarabhaṅgena rāghavo vākyam abravīt 3.004.028a aham evāhariṣyāmi sarvāṃl lokān mahāmune 3.004.028c āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
GE09ram_03_u:131: 3.004.029a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu śakratulyabalena vai 3.004.029c śarabhaṅgo mahāprājñaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ 3.004.030a sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam
GE09ram_03_u:132: 3.004.030c ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:133: 3.004.031a eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām
GE09ram_03_u:134: 3.004.031c yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇaṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:135: 3.004.032a tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit 3.004.032c śarabhaṅgo mahātejāḥ praviveśa hutāśanam
GE09ram_03_u:136: 3.004.033a tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:137: 3.004.033c jīrṇaṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam 3.004.034a sa ca pāvakasaṃkāśaḥ kumāraḥ samapadyata 3.004.034c utthāyāgnicayāt tasmāc charabhaṅgo vyarocata
GE09ram_03_u:138: 3.004.035a sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:139: 3.004.035c devānāṃ ca vyatikramya brahmalokaṃ vyarohata 3.004.036a sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ; pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa
GE09ram_03_u:141: 3.004.036c pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ; nananda susvāgatam ity
GE09ram_03_u:142: uvāca ha 3.005.001a śarabhaṅge divaṃ prāpte munisaṃghāḥ samāgatāḥ 3.005.001c abhyagacchanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ jvalitatejasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:144: 3.005.002c aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ patrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:150: 3.005.005c sarve brāhmyā śriyā juṣṭā dṛḍhayogasamāhitāḥ 3.005.005e śarabhaṅgāśrame rāmam abhijagmuś ca tāpasāḥ 3.005.006a abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:152: 3.005.007a tvam ikṣvākukulasyāsya pṛthivyāś ca mahārathaḥ 3.005.007c pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva
GE09ram_03_u:153: 3.005.008a viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
GE09ram_03_u:154: 3.005.008c pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:155: 3.005.009a tvām āsādya mahātmānaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmavatsalam 3.005.009c arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi 3.005.010a adhārmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_03_u:156: 3.005.010c yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat
GE09ram_03_u:157: 3.005.011a yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva 3.005.011c nityayuktaḥ sadā rakṣan sarvān viṣayavāsinaḥ 3.005.012a prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm
GE09ram_03_u:158: 3.005.012c brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate
GE09ram_03_u:159: 3.005.013a yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:160: 3.005.013c tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:162: 3.005.014c tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:163: 3.005.015a ehi paśya śarīrāṇi munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām 3.005.015c hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane
GE09ram_03_u:165: 3.005.016c citrakūṭālayānāṃ ca kriyate kadanaṃ mahat 3.005.017a evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ
GE09ram_03_u:166: 3.005.017c kriyamāṇaṃ vane ghoraṃ rakṣobhir bhīmakarmabhiḥ 3.005.018a tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:167: 3.005.018c paripālaya no rāma vadhyamānān niśācaraiḥ 3.005.019a etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_03_u:168: 3.005.019c idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:169: 3.005.019e naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinam
GE09ram_03_u:171: 3.005.020c tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:172: 3.005.020e tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:173: 3.005.021a dattvā varaṃ cāpi tapodhanānāṃ; dharme dhṛtātmā sahalakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_03_u:174: 3.005.021c tapodhanaiś cāpi sahārya vṛttaḥ; sutīṣkṇam evābhijagāma vīraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:175: 3.006.001a rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:176: 3.006.001c sutīkṣṇasyāśramapadaṃ jagāma saha tair dvijaiḥ 3.006.002a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtva bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:177: 3.006.002c dadarśa vipulaṃ śailaṃ mahāmegham ivonnatam 3.006.003a tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:178: 3.006.003c kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:179: 3.006.004a praviṣṭas tu vanaṃ ghoraṃ bahupuṣpaphaladrumam 3.006.004c dadarśāśramam ekānte
GE09ram_03_u:181: 3.006.005c rāmaḥ sutīkṣṇaṃ vidhivat tapovṛddham abhāṣata 3.006.006a rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ 3.006.006c tan mābhivada dharmajña maharṣe satyavikrama 3.006.007a sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:182: 3.006.007c samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:183: 3.006.008a svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:186: 3.006.009c devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale
GE09ram_03_u:187: 3.006.010a citrakūṭam upādāya rājyabhraṣṭo 'si me śrutaḥ 3.006.010c ihopayātaḥ kākutstho devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:188: 3.006.010e sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:189: 3.006.011a teṣu devarṣijuṣṭeṣu jiteṣu tapasā mayā 3.006.011c matprasādāt sabhāryas tvaṃ viharasva salakṣmaṇaḥ 3.006.012a tam ugratapasaṃ dīptaṃ maharṣiṃ satyavādinam 3.006.012c pratyuvācātmavān rāmo brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ 3.006.013a aham evāhariṣyāmi svayaṃ lokān mahāmune 3.006.013c āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
GE09ram_03_u:190: 3.006.014a bhavān sarvatra kuśalaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ 3.006.014c ākhyātaḥ śarabhaṅgena gautamena mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:191: 3.006.015a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:192: 3.006.015c abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ harṣeṇa mahatāplutaḥ 3.006.016a ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha
GE09ram_03_u:194: 3.006.017a imam āśramam āgamya mṛgasaṃghā mahāyaśāḥ 3.006.017c aṭitvā pratigacchanti lobhayitvākutobhayāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:195: 3.006.018a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:196: 3.006.018c uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:197: 3.006.019a tān ahaṃ sumahābhāga mṛgasaṃghān samāgatān 3.006.019c hanyāṃ niśitadhāreṇa śareṇāśanivarcasā
GE09ram_03_u:198: 3.006.020a bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:199: 3.006.020c etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye
GE09ram_03_u:200: 3.006.021a tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat
GE09ram_03_u:201: 3.006.021c anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat
GE09ram_03_u:202: 3.006.022a tataḥ śubhaṃ tāpasabhojyam annaṃ; svayaṃ sutīkṣṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhābhyām
GE09ram_03_u:203: 3.006.022c tābhyāṃ susatkṛtya dadau mahātmā; saṃdhyānivṛttau rajanīṃ samīkṣya
GE09ram_03_u:205: 3.007.001c pariṇamya niśāṃ tatra prabhāte pratyabudhyata 3.007.002a utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:207: 3.007.003a atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:208: 3.007.003c kālyaṃ vidhivad abhyarcya tapasviśaraṇe vane 3.007.004a udayanntaṃ dinakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā vigatakalmaṣāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:209: 3.007.004c sutīkṣṇam abhigamyedaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abruvan 3.007.005a sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:210: 3.007.005c āpṛcchāmaḥ prayāsyāmo munayas tvarayanti naḥ 3.007.006a tvarāmahe vayaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṛtsnam āśramamaṇḍalam 3.007.006c ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyaśīlānāṃ daṇḍakāraṇyavāsinām
GE09ram_03_u:212: 3.007.007c dharmanityais tapodāntair viśikhair iva pāvakaiḥ 3.007.008a aviṣahyātapo yāvat sūryo nātivirājite
GE09ram_03_u:214: 3.007.009a tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ
GE09ram_03_u:215: 3.007.009c vavande sahasaumitriḥ sītayā saha rāghavaḥ 3.007.010a tau saṃspṛśantau caraṇāv utthāpya munipuṃgavaḥ 3.007.010c gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:216: 3.007.011a ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:219: 3.007.012c eṣāṃ tapasvināṃ vīra tapasā bhāvitātmanām 3.007.013a suprājyaphalamūlāni puṣpitāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:225: 3.007.016a gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu
GE09ram_03_u:226: 3.007.016c āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:227: 3.007.017a evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:228: 3.007.017c pradakṣiṇaṃ muniṃ kṛtā prasthātum upacakrame 3.007.018a tataḥ śubhatare tūṇī dhanuṣī cāyatekṣaṇā 3.007.018c dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ 3.007.019a ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpe cādāya sasvane
GE09ram_03_u:229: 3.007.019c niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:231: 3.008.001c vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:232: 3.008.002a ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān
GE09ram_03_u:233: 3.008.002c nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha
GE09ram_03_u:234: 3.008.003a trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta
GE09ram_03_u:235: 3.008.003c mithyā vākyaṃ paramakaṃ tasmād gurutarāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:236: 3.008.003e paradārābhigamanaṃ vinā vairaṃ ca raudratā 3.008.004a mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:238: 3.008.005a tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:239: 3.008.005c tava vaśyendriyatvaṃ ca jānāmi śubhadarśana 3.008.006a tṛtīyaṃ yad idaṃ raudraṃ paraprāṇābhihiṃsanam 3.008.006c nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:241: 3.008.007c ṛṣīṇāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya vadhaḥ saṃyati rakṣasām 3.008.008a etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam
GE09ram_03_u:242: 3.008.008c prasthitas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā dhṛtabāṇaśarāsanaḥ 3.008.009a tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:243: 3.008.009c tvad vṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:244: 3.008.010a na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati 3.008.010c kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:245: 3.008.011a tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:246: 3.008.011c dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam
GE09ram_03_u:247: 3.008.012a kṣatriyāṇām iha dhanur hutāśasyendhanāni ca 3.008.012c samīpataḥ sthitaṃ tejobalam ucchrayate bhṛśam 3.008.013a purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:248: 3.008.013c kasmiṃś cid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije
GE09ram_03_u:249: 3.008.014a tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:250: 3.008.014c khaḍgapāṇir athāgacchad āśramaṃ bhaṭa rūpadhṛk 3.008.015a tasmiṃs tad āśramapade nihitaḥ khaḍga uttamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:251: 3.008.015c sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:252: 3.008.016a sa tac chastram anuprāpya nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ 3.008.016c vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:253: 3.008.017a yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:254: 3.008.017c na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:255: 3.008.018a nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:256: 3.008.018c cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam
GE09ram_03_u:258: 3.008.019c tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:259: 3.008.020a snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye 3.008.020c na kathaṃ cana sā kāryā hṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:260: 3.008.021a buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān
GE09ram_03_u:261: 3.008.021c aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye
GE09ram_03_u:262: 3.008.022a kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu vīrāṇāṃ vaneṣu niyatātmanām 3.008.022c dhanuṣā kāryam etāvad ārtānām abhirakṣaṇam 3.008.023a kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca
GE09ram_03_u:263: 3.008.023c vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām
GE09ram_03_u:264: 3.008.024a tad āryakaluṣā buddhir jāyate śastrasevanāt 3.008.024c punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:265: 3.008.025a akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrū śvaśurayor mama
GE09ram_03_u:266: 3.008.025c yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ 3.008.026a dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham
GE09ram_03_u:267: 3.008.026c dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_03_u:268: 3.008.027a ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:269: 3.008.027c prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham
GE09ram_03_u:270: 3.008.028a nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane
GE09ram_03_u:271: 3.008.028c sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:272: 3.008.029a strīcāpalād etad udāhṛtaṃ me; dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:273: 3.008.029c vicārya buddhyā tu sahānujena; yad rocate tat kuru mācireṇa 3.009.001a vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā
GE09ram_03_u:274: 3.009.001c śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:275: 3.009.002a hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:276: 3.009.002c kulaṃ vyapadiśantyā ca dharmajñe janakātmaje 3.009.003a kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ 3.009.003c kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:277: 3.009.004a te cārtā daṇḍakāraṇye munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ 3.009.004c māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:279: 3.009.005c na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:280: 3.009.006a kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane
GE09ram_03_u:283: 3.009.007c asmān abhyavapadyeti mām ūcur dvijasattamāḥ 3.009.008a mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam 3.009.008c kṛtvā caraṇaśuśrūṣāṃ vākyam etad udāhṛtam 3.009.009a prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā
GE09ram_03_u:284: 3.009.009c yadīdṛśair ahaṃ viprair upastheyair upasthitaḥ 3.009.009e kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_03_u:285: 3.009.010a sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:287: 3.009.010e arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati 3.009.011a homakāle tu saṃprāpte parvakāleṣu cānagha 3.009.011c dharṣayanti sma durdharṣā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ 3.009.012a rākṣasair dharṣitānāṃ ca tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām 3.009.012c gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:288: 3.009.013a kāmaṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena śaktā hantuṃ niśācarān
GE09ram_03_u:289: 3.009.013c cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam
GE09ram_03_u:290: 3.009.014a bahuvighnaṃ taponityaṃ duścaraṃ caiva rāghava 3.009.014c tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:292: 3.009.015c rakṣanas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane 3.009.016a mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam
GE09ram_03_u:294: 3.009.017a saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam
GE09ram_03_u:295: 3.009.017c munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā 3.009.018a apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām 3.009.018c na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:296: 3.009.019a tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam
GE09ram_03_u:297: 3.009.019c anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:298: 3.009.020a mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ 3.009.020c parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:299: 3.009.020e sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:300: 3.009.021a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā; sītāṃ priyāṃ maithila
GE09ram_03_u:302: 3.009.021c rāmo dhanuṣmān sahalakṣmaṇena; jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni
GE09ram_03_u:303: 3.010.001a agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:305: 3.010.002a tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:306: 3.010.002c nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:308: 3.010.003c sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:309: 3.010.004a yūthabaddhāṃś ca pṛṣatān madonmattān viṣāṇinaḥ 3.010.004c mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:310: 3.010.005a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_03_u:311: 3.010.005c dadṛśuḥ sahitā ramyaṃ taṭākaṃ yojanāyatam 3.010.006a padmapuṣkarasaṃbādhaṃ gajayūthair
GE09ram_03_u:314: 3.010.007c gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaś cana dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:315: 3.010.008a tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:316: 3.010.008c muniṃ dharmabhṛtaṃ nāma praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame 3.010.009a idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune
GE09ram_03_u:317: 3.010.009c kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām
GE09ram_03_u:318: 3.010.010a tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā
GE09ram_03_u:319: 3.010.010c prabhāvaṃ sarasaḥ kṛtsnam ākhyātum upacakrame 3.010.011a idaṃ pañcāpsaro nāma taṭākaṃ sārvakālikam 3.010.011c nirmitaṃ tapasā rāma muninā māṇḍakarṇinā 3.010.012a sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:321: 3.010.013a tataḥ pravyathitāḥ sarve devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ 3.010.013c abruvan vacanaṃ sarve paraspara samāgatāḥ 3.010.013e asmakaṃ kasya cit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:322: 3.010.014a tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:323: 3.010.014c pradhānāpsarasaḥ pañcavidyuccalitavarcasaḥ 3.010.015a apsarobhis tatas tābhir munir dṛṣṭaparāvaraḥ 3.010.015c nīto madanavaśyatvaṃ surāṇāṃ kāryasiddhaye
GE09ram_03_u:324: 3.010.016a tāś caivāpsarasaḥ pañcamuneḥ patnītvam āgatāḥ 3.010.016c taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham
GE09ram_03_u:326: 3.010.017c ramayanti tapoyogān muniṃ yauvanam āsthitam 3.010.018a tāsāṃ saṃkrīḍamānānām eṣa vāditraniḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:328: 3.010.019a āścaryam iti tasyaitad vacanaṃ bhāvitātmanaḥ 3.010.019c rāghavaḥ pratijagrāha saha bhrātrā mahāyaśāḥ 3.010.020a evaṃ kathayamānasya dadarśāśramamaṇḍalam
GE09ram_03_u:329: 3.010.020c kuśacīraparikṣiptaṃ nānāvṛkṣasamāvṛtam 3.010.021a praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:330: 3.010.021c tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale
GE09ram_03_u:331: 3.010.022a uṣitvā susukhaṃ tatra pūrjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ 3.010.022c jagāma cāśramāṃs teṣāṃ paryāyeṇa tapasvinām 3.010.023a yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit
GE09ram_03_u:332: 3.010.023c kva cit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kva cit 3.010.024a kva cic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:333: 3.010.024c aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:334: 3.010.025a trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham
GE09ram_03_u:335: 3.010.025c tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai
GE09ram_03_u:336: 3.010.025e ramataś cānukulyena yayuḥ saṃvatsarā daśa 3.010.026a parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:337: 3.010.026c sutīkṣṇasyāśramaṃ śrīmān punar evājagāma ha 3.010.027a sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:338: 3.010.027c tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃ cit kālam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:339: 3.010.028a athāśramastho vinayāt kadā cit taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:340: 3.010.028c upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:341: 3.010.029a asminn araṇye bhagavann agastyo munisattamaḥ 3.010.029c vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:342: 3.010.030a na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā
GE09ram_03_u:343: 3.010.030c kutrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ maharṣes tasya dhīmataḥ 3.010.031a prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:345: 3.010.032a manoratho mahān eṣa hṛdi saṃparivartate 3.010.032c yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam
GE09ram_03_u:346: 3.010.033a iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:348: 3.010.034a aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:349: 3.010.034c agastyam abhigaccheti sītayā saha rāghava 3.010.035a diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_03_u:350: 3.010.035c aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:351: 3.010.036a yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:352: 3.010.036c dakṣiṇena mahāñ śrīmān agastyabhrātur āśramaḥ 3.010.037a sthalaprāye vanoddeśe
GE09ram_03_u:354: 3.010.038a padminyo vividhās tatra prasannasalilāḥ śivāḥ 3.010.038c haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇāś cakravākopaśobhitāḥ 3.010.039a tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām
GE09ram_03_u:355: 3.010.039c dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya vanakhaṇḍasya pārśvataḥ 3.010.040a tatrāgastyāśramapadaṃ gatvā yojanam antaram
GE09ram_03_u:357: 3.010.040e raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:358: 3.010.041a sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo bahupādapasaṃkulaḥ 3.010.041c yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:359: 3.010.041e adyaiva gamane buddhiṃ rocayasva mahāyaśaḥ 3.010.042a iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca
GE09ram_03_u:361: 3.010.043a paśyan vanāni citrāṇi parvapāṃś cābhrasaṃnibhān 3.010.043c sarāṃsi saritaś caiva pathi mārgavaśānugāḥ 3.010.044a sutīkṣṇenopadiṣṭena gatvā tena pathā sukham 3.010.044c idaṃ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt 3.010.045a etad evāśramapadaṃ nūnaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ 3.010.045c agastyasya muner bhrātur dṛśyate puṇyakarmaṇaḥ 3.010.046a yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:362: 3.010.046c saṃnatāḥ phalabhareṇa puṣpabhāreṇa ca drumāḥ 3.010.047a pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:364: 3.010.048a tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:365: 3.010.048c lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaidūryavarcasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:368: 3.010.050a vivikteṣu ca tīrtheṣu kṛtasnānā dvijātayaḥ 3.010.050c puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti kusumaiḥ svayam ārjitaiḥ 3.010.051a tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:369: 3.010.051c agastyasyāśramo bhrātur nūnam eṣa bhaviṣyati 3.010.052a nigṛhya tarasā mṛtyuṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 3.010.052c yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:370: 3.010.053a ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:371: 3.010.053c bhrātarau sahitāv āstāṃ brāhmaṇaghnau mahāsurau 3.010.054a dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan
GE09ram_03_u:372: 3.010.054c āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:373: 3.010.055a bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:374: 3.010.055c tān dvijān bhojayām āsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:376: 3.010.056c vātāpe niṣkramasveti svareṇa mahatā vadan 3.010.057a tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan
GE09ram_03_u:377: 3.010.057c bhittvā bhitvā śarīrāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ viniṣpatat 3.010.058a brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi tair evaṃ kāmarūpibhiḥ 3.010.058c vināśitāni saṃhatya nityaśaḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:378: 3.010.059a agastyena tadā devaiḥ prārthitena maharṣiṇā 3.010.059c anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:379: 3.010.060a tataḥ saṃpannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam
GE09ram_03_u:381: 3.010.061a taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam
GE09ram_03_u:382: 3.010.061c abravīt prahasan dhīmān agastyo munisattamaḥ 3.010.062a kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:383: 3.010.062c bhrātus te meṣa rūpasya gatasya yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:384: 3.010.063a atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam
GE09ram_03_u:385: 3.010.063c pradharṣayitum ārebhe muniṃ krodhān niśācaraḥ 3.010.064a so 'bhyadravad dvijendraṃ taṃ muninā dīptatejasā
GE09ram_03_u:388: 3.010.065c viprānukampayā yena karmedaṃ duṣkaraṃ kṛtam 3.010.066a evaṃ kathayamānasya tasya saumitriṇā saha 3.010.066c rāmasyāstaṃ gataḥ sūryaḥ saṃdhyākālo 'bhyavartata
GE09ram_03_u:389: 3.010.067a upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:391: 3.010.068a samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:392: 3.010.068c nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:393: 3.010.069a tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ vimale sūryamaṇḍale 3.010.069c bhrātaraṃ tam agastyasya āmantrayata rāghavaḥ 3.010.070a abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām
GE09ram_03_u:394: 3.010.070c āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam
GE09ram_03_u:395: 3.010.071a gamyatām iti tenokto jagāma raghunandanaḥ 3.010.071c yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa vanaṃ tac cāvalokayan 3.010.072a nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān
GE09ram_03_u:396: 3.010.072c ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān
GE09ram_03_u:398: 3.010.073c dadarśa rāmaḥ śataśas tatra kāntārapādapān 3.010.074a hastihastair vimṛditān vānarair upaśobhitān
GE09ram_03_u:399: 3.010.074c mattaiḥ śakunisaṃghaiś ca śataśaḥ pratināditān 3.010.075a tato 'bravīt samīpasthaṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:401: 3.010.076a snigdhapatrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:403: 3.010.077a agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:404: 3.010.077c āśramo dṛśyate tasya pariśrānta śramāpahaḥ 3.010.078a prājyadhūmākulavanaś cīramālāpariṣkṛtaḥ 3.010.078c praśāntamṛgayūthaś ca nānāśakunināditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:405: 3.010.079a nigṛhya tarasā mṛtyuṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 3.010.079c dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā
GE09ram_03_u:406: 3.010.080a tasyedam āśramapadaṃ prabhāvād yasya rākṣasaiḥ 3.010.080c dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate
GE09ram_03_u:407: 3.010.081a yadā prabhṛti cākrāntā dig iyaṃ puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:408: 3.010.081c tadā prabhṛti nirvairāḥ praśāntā rajanīcarāḥ 3.010.082a nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:409: 3.010.082c prathitā triṣu lokeṣu durdharṣā krūrakarmabhiḥ 3.010.083a mārgaṃ niroddhuṃ satataṃ
GE09ram_03_u:410: 3.010.083c saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaśaulo na vardhate
GE09ram_03_u:411: 3.010.084a ayaṃ dīrghāyuṣas tasya loke viśrutakarmaṇaḥ 3.010.084c agastyasyāśramaḥ śrīmān
GE09ram_03_u:412: 3.010.085a eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām
GE09ram_03_u:413: 3.010.085c asmān adhigatān eṣa śreyasā yojayiṣyati 3.010.086a ārādhayiṣyāmy atrāham agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim 3.010.086c śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE09ram_03_u:414: 3.010.087a atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:416: 3.010.088a nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ 3.010.088c nṛśaṃsaḥ kāma vṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:417: 3.010.089a atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_03_u:419: 3.010.090a atra siddhā mahātmāno vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaiḥ 3.010.090c tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:420: 3.010.091a yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:421: 3.010.091c atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:423: 3.010.092c nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:425: 3.011.001c agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:426: 3.011.002a rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī
GE09ram_03_u:427: 3.011.002c rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:428: 3.011.003a lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:429: 3.011.003c anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ 3.011.004a te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt
GE09ram_03_u:430: 3.011.004c draṣṭum icchāmahe sarve bhagavantaṃ nivedyatām 3.011.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya tapodhanaḥ 3.011.005c tathety uktvāgniśaraṇaṃ praviveśa niveditum
GE09ram_03_u:431: 3.011.006a sa praviśya muni śreṣṭhaṃ tapasā duṣpradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:433: 3.011.007a putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:434: 3.011.007c praviṣṭāv āśramapadaṃ sītayā saha bhāryayā 3.011.008a draṣṭuṃ bhavantam āyātau śuśrūṣārtham ariṃdamau 3.011.008c yad atrānantaraṃ tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi 3.011.009a tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:435: 3.011.009c vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:436: 3.011.010a diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:437: 3.011.010c manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:438: 3.011.011a gamyatāṃ satkṛto rāmaḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 3.011.011c praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:439: 3.011.012a evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:441: 3.011.013a tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:442: 3.011.013c kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam
GE09ram_03_u:444: 3.011.014c darśayām āsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām
GE09ram_03_u:445: 3.011.015a taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan
GE09ram_03_u:447: 3.011.016a praviveśa tato rāmaḥ sītayā sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 3.011.016c praśāntahariṇākīrṇam āśramaṃ hy avalokayan
GE09ram_03_u:448: 3.011.017a sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca 3.011.017c viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:449: 3.011.018a somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:450: 3.011.018c dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca 3.011.019a tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat
GE09ram_03_u:451: 3.011.019c taṃ dadarśāgrato rāmo munīnāṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.011.019e abravīd vacanaṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam 3.011.020a eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:453: 3.011.021a evam uktvā mahābāhur agastyaṃ sūryavarcasaṃ 3.011.021c jagrāha paramaprītas tasya pādau paraṃtapaḥ 3.011.022a abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:454: 3.011.022c sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāma salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:456: 3.011.023c kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt
GE09ram_03_u:457: 3.011.024a agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_03_u:458: 3.011.024c vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau
GE09ram_03_u:460: 3.011.025c uvāca rāmam āsīnaṃ prāñjaliṃ dharmakovidam 3.011.026a anyathā khalu kākutstha tapasvī samudācaran 3.011.026c duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet
GE09ram_03_u:461: 3.011.027a rājā sarvasya lokasya dharmacārī mahārathaḥ 3.011.027c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:462: 3.011.028a evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam 3.011.028c pūjayitvā yathākāmaṃ punar eva tato 'bravīt
GE09ram_03_u:463: 3.011.029a idaṃ divyaṃ mahac cāpaṃ hemavajravibhūṣitam 3.011.029c vaiṣṇavaṃ puruṣavyāghra nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:465: 3.011.030c datto mama mahendreṇa tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau 3.011.031a saṃpūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:466: 3.011.031c mahārājata kośo 'yam asir hemavibhūṣitaḥ 3.011.032a anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān
GE09ram_03_u:467: 3.011.032c ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām
GE09ram_03_u:468: 3.011.033a tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_03_u:469: 3.011.033c jayāya pratigṛhṇīṣva vajraṃ vajradharo yathā 3.011.034a evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham
GE09ram_03_u:470: 3.011.034c dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:471: 3.012.001a rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:472: 3.012.001c abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:473: 3.012.002a adhvaśrameṇa vāṃ khedo bādhate pracuraśramaḥ 3.012.002c vyaktam utkaṇṭhate cāpi maithilī janakātmajā 3.012.003a eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā 3.012.003c prājyadoṣaṃ vanaṃ praptā bhartṛsnehapracoditā
GE09ram_03_u:474: 3.012.004a yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru
GE09ram_03_u:475: 3.012.004c duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī
GE09ram_03_u:476: 3.012.005a eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana
GE09ram_03_u:477: 3.012.005c samastham anurajyante viṣamasthaṃ tyajanti ca 3.012.006a śatahradānāṃ lolatvaṃ śastrāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatāṃ tathā 3.012.006c garuḍānilayoḥ śaighryam anugacchanti yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:478: 3.012.007a iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:479: 3.012.007c ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī 3.012.008a alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha 3.012.008c vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:480: 3.012.009a evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:481: 3.012.009c uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam
GE09ram_03_u:484: 3.012.011a kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam
GE09ram_03_u:485: 3.012.011c yatrāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā vaseyaṃ nirataḥ sukham 3.012.012a tato 'bravīn muni śreṣṭhaḥ śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam 3.012.012c dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:487: 3.012.013c deśo bahumṛgaḥ śrīmān pañcavaṭy abhiviśrutaḥ 3.012.014a tatra gatvāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā saumitriṇā saha 3.012.014c ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan
GE09ram_03_u:488: 3.012.015a vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha
GE09ram_03_u:489: 3.012.015c tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:490: 3.012.016a hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā
GE09ram_03_u:491: 3.012.016c iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane
GE09ram_03_u:492: 3.012.017a ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti 3.012.017c sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate
GE09ram_03_u:493: 3.012.018a sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:494: 3.012.018c godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate
GE09ram_03_u:495: 3.012.019a prājyamūlaphalaiś caiva nānādvija gaṇair yutaḥ 3.012.019c viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:496: 3.012.020a bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:497: 3.012.020c api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:498: 3.012.021a etad ālakṣyate vīra madhukānāṃ mahad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:502: 3.012.023a agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:503: 3.012.023c sātkṛtyāmantrayām āsa tam ṛṣiṃ satyavādinam 3.012.024a tau tu tenābhyanujñātau
GE09ram_03_u:504: 3.012.024c tadāśramāt pañcavaṭīṃ jagmatuḥ saha sītayā 3.012.025a gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau; viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau
GE09ram_03_u:505: 3.012.025c yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā; prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau
GE09ram_03_u:506: 3.013.001a atha pañcavaṭīṃ gacchann antarā raghunandanaḥ 3.013.001c āsasāda mahākāyaṃ gṛdhraṃ
GE09ram_03_u:507: 3.013.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:508: 3.013.002c menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_03_u:509: 3.013.003a sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva
GE09ram_03_u:510: 3.013.003c uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:511: 3.013.004a sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:512: 3.013.004c sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca 3.013.005a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:515: 3.013.006c tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:516: 3.013.007a kardamaḥ prathamas teṣāṃ vikṛtas tadanantaram 3.013.007c śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:517: 3.013.008a sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:518: 3.013.008c pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:519: 3.013.009a dakṣo vivasvān aparo 'riṣṭanemiś ca rāghava 3.013.009c kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:520: 3.013.010a prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:521: 3.013.010c ṣaṣṭir duhitaro rāma yaśasvinyo mahāyaśaḥ 3.013.011a kaśyapaḥ pratijagrāha tāsām aṣṭau sumadhyamāḥ 3.013.011c aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danūm api ca kālakām 3.013.012a tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api
GE09ram_03_u:522: 3.013.012c tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt 3.013.013a putrāṃs trailokyabhartṝn vai janayiṣyatha mat samān
GE09ram_03_u:523: 3.013.013c aditis tan manā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:524: 3.013.014a kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan
GE09ram_03_u:525: 3.013.014c adityāṃ jajñire devās trayastriṃśad ariṃdama 3.013.015a ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:526: 3.013.015c ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:527: 3.013.016a teṣām iyaṃ vasumatī purāsīt savanārṇavā 3.013.016c danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:528: 3.013.017a narakaṃ kālakaṃ caiva kālakāpi vyajāyata 3.013.017c krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm
GE09ram_03_u:529: 3.013.018a tāmrāpi suṣuve kanyāḥ pañcaitā lokaviśrutāḥ 3.013.018c ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata
GE09ram_03_u:530: 3.013.019a śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:531: 3.013.019c dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:532: 3.013.020a cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī
GE09ram_03_u:533: 3.013.020c śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā
GE09ram_03_u:535: 3.013.021c mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api
GE09ram_03_u:536: 3.013.022a mātaṅgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā
GE09ram_03_u:538: 3.013.023a apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama
GE09ram_03_u:539: 3.013.023c ṛṣkāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:540: 3.013.024a tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām
GE09ram_03_u:541: 3.013.024c tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:542: 3.013.025a haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:543: 3.013.025c golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān
GE09ram_03_u:544: 3.013.026a mātaṅgyās tv atha mātaṅgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:545: 3.013.026c diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam
GE09ram_03_u:546: 3.013.027a tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata
GE09ram_03_u:547: 3.013.027c rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:548: 3.013.028a rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān
GE09ram_03_u:549: 3.013.028c surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān
GE09ram_03_u:550: 3.013.029a manur manuṣyāñ janayat kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ 3.013.029c brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:551: 3.013.030a mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:552: 3.013.030c ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:553: 3.013.031a sarvān puṇyaphalān vṛkṣān analāpi vyajāyata 3.013.031c vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā 3.013.032a kadrūr nāgasahaskraṃ tu vijajñe dharaṇīdharam 3.013.032c dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca 3.013.033a tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt saṃpātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:554: 3.013.033c jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:556: 3.013.034c sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:557: 3.013.035a jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo; mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato
GE09ram_03_u:559: 3.013.035c pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ; jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:561: 3.013.036a sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ; sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:562: 3.013.036c jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo; ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān
GE09ram_03_u:565: 3.014.001c uvāca bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.014.002a āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:566: 3.014.002c ayaṃ pañcavaṭī deśaḥ saumya puṣpitakānanaḥ 3.014.003a sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi
GE09ram_03_u:567: 3.014.003c āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:568: 3.014.004a ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:571: 3.014.005c saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ ca yatra syāt samitpuṣpakuśodakam 3.014.006a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:572: 3.014.006c sītā samakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:573: 3.014.007a paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite
GE09ram_03_u:574: 3.014.007c svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada 3.014.008a suprītas tena vākyena lakṣmaṇasya mahādyutiḥ 3.014.008c vimṛśan rocayām āsa deśaṃ sarvaguṇānvitam 3.014.009a sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi
GE09ram_03_u:575: 3.014.009c haste gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:576: 3.014.010a ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitair tarubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:577: 3.014.010c ihāśramapadaṃ saumya yathāvat kartum arhasi 3.014.011a iyam ādityasaṃkāśaiḥ padmaiḥ surabhigandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:578: 3.014.011c adūre dṛśyate ramyā padminī padmaśobhitā 3.014.012a yathākhyātam agastyena muninā
GE09ram_03_u:579: 3.014.012c iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:580: 3.014.013a haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇā cakravākopaśobhitā 3.014.013c nātidūre na cāsanne mṛgayūthanipīḍitā
GE09ram_03_u:582: 3.014.014c dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:583: 3.014.015a sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:585: 3.014.016a sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:586: 3.014.016c nīvārais timiśaiś caiva puṃnāgaiś copaśobhitāḥ 3.014.017a cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api
GE09ram_03_u:587: 3.014.017c puṣpagulmalatopetais tais tais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ 3.014.018a candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api
GE09ram_03_u:588: 3.014.018c dhavāśvakarṇakhadiraiḥ śamīkiṃśukapāṭalaiḥ 3.014.019a idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam
GE09ram_03_u:589: 3.014.019c iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:590: 3.014.020a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_03_u:593: 3.014.021c sustambhāṃ maskarair dīrghaiḥ kṛtavaṃśāṃ suśobhanām 3.014.022a sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:594: 3.014.022c snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:595: 3.014.023a tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:596: 3.014.023c darśayām āsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:597: 3.014.024a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā 3.014.024c rāghavaḥ parṇaśālāyāṃ harṣam āhārayat param 3.014.025a susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tadā 3.014.025c atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:598: 3.014.026a prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_03_u:599: 3.014.026c pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:600: 3.014.027a bhāvajñena kṛtajñena dharmajñena ca lakṣmaṇa 3.014.027c tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama
GE09ram_03_u:601: 3.014.028a evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:602: 3.014.028c tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī
GE09ram_03_u:603: 3.014.029a kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca 3.014.029c anvāsyamāno nyavasat svargaloke yathāmaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:604: 3.015.001a vasatas tasya tu mukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:605: 3.015.001c śaradvyapāye hemanta ṛtur iṣṭaḥ pravartate 3.015.002a sa kadā cit prabhātāyāṃ śarvaryāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:606: 3.015.002c prayayāv abhiṣekārthaṃ ramyaṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm 3.015.003a prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:608: 3.015.004a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada 3.015.004c alaṃkṛta ivābhāti yena saṃvatsaraḥ śubhaḥ 3.015.005a nīhāraparuṣo lokaḥ pṛṣhivī sasyamālinī
GE09ram_03_u:614: 3.015.008a sevamāne dṛḍhaṃ sūrye diśam antakasevitām 3.015.008c vihīnatilakeva strī nottarā dik prakāśate 3.015.009a prakṛtyā himakośāḍhyo dūrasūryaś ca sāmpratam 3.015.009c yathārthanāmā suvyaktaṃ himavān himavān giriḥ 3.015.010a atyantasukhasaṃcārā madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:617: 3.015.011c śūnyāraṇyā himadhvastā divasā bhānti sāmpratam 3.015.012a nivṛttākāśaśayanāḥ puṣyanītā himāruṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:618: 3.015.012c śītā vṛddhatarāyāmās triyāmā yānti sāmpratam 3.015.013a ravisaṃkrāntasaubhābyas tuṣārāruṇamaṇḍalaḥ 3.015.013c niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaś candramā na prakāśate 3.015.014a jyotsnā tuṣāramalinā paurṇamāsyāṃ na rājate 3.015.014c sīteva cātapa śyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate
GE09ram_03_u:619: 3.015.015a prakṛtyā śītalasparśo himaviddhaś ca sāmpratam 3.015.015c pravāti paścimo vāyuḥ kāle dviguṇaśītalaḥ 3.015.016a bāṣpacchannān araṇyāni yavagodhūmavanti ca
GE09ram_03_u:622: 3.015.017c śobhante kiṃ cidālambāḥ śālayaḥ kanakaprabhāḥ 3.015.018a mayūkhair upasarpadbhir
GE09ram_03_u:623: 3.015.018c dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:624: 3.015.019a agrāhyavīryaḥ pūrvāhṇe madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhaḥ 3.015.019c saṃraktaḥ kiṃ cid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau
GE09ram_03_u:627: 3.015.021a avaśyāyatamonaddhā nīhāratamasāvṛtāḥ 3.015.021c prasuptā iva lakṣyante vipuṣpā vanarājayaḥ 3.015.022a bāṣpasaṃchannasalilā rutavijñeyasārasāḥ 3.015.022c himārdravālukais tīraiḥ sarito bhānti sāmpratam 3.015.023a tuṣārapatanāc caiva mṛdutvād bhāskarasya ca 3.015.023c śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam
GE09ram_03_u:629: 3.015.024c nālaśeṣā himadhvastā na bhānti kamalākarāḥ 3.015.025a asmiṃs tu puruṣavyāghra kāle duḥkhasamanvitaḥ 3.015.025c tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure
GE09ram_03_u:630: 3.015.026a tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_03_u:631: 3.015.026c tapasvī niyatāhāraḥ śete śīte mahītale 3.015.027a so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ 3.015.027c vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:633: 3.015.028c kathaṃ tv apararātreṣu sarayūm avagāhate 3.015.029a padmapatrekṣaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ śrīmān nirudaro mahān 3.015.029c dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrī niṣedho jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:635: 3.015.030c saṃtyajya vividhān saukhyān āryaṃ sarvātmanāśritaḥ 3.015.031a jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:636: 3.015.031c vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate
GE09ram_03_u:637: 3.015.032a na pitryam anuvarntante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti
GE09ram_03_u:639: 3.015.033a bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:640: 3.015.033c kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:641: 3.015.034a ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dharmike
GE09ram_03_u:643: 3.015.035a na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃ cana 3.015.035c tām evekṣvākunāthasya bharatasya kathāṃ kuru 3.015.036a niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_03_u:645: 3.015.037a ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:647: 3.015.038a tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:648: 3.015.038c stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:649: 3.015.039a kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ; sītādvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_03_u:650: 3.015.039c kṛtābhiṣekas tv agarājaputryā; rudraḥ sanandir bhagavān iveśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:651: 3.016.001a kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:652: 3.016.001c tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:653: 3.016.002a āśramaṃ tam upāgamya rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 3.016.002c kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ karma parṇaśālām upāgamat 3.016.003a sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:654: 3.016.003c virarāja mahābāhuś citrayā candramā iva 3.016.003e lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:656: 3.016.004c taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kā cid ājagāma yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_03_u:657: 3.016.005a sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:658: 3.016.005c bhaginī rāmam āsādya dadarśa tridaśopamam 3.016.006a siṃhoraskaṃ mahābāhuṃ padmapatranibhekṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:662: 3.016.008a sumukhaṃ durmukhī rāmaṃ vṛttamadhyaṃ mahodarī 3.016.008c viśālākṣaṃ virūpākṣī sukeśaṃ tāmramūrdhajā
GE09ram_03_u:663: 3.016.009a priyarūpaṃ virūpā sā susvaraṃ bhairavasnavā 3.016.009c taruṇaṃ dāruṇā vṛddhā dakṣiṇaṃ vāmabhāṣiṇī 3.016.010a nyāyavṛttaṃ sudurvṛttā priyam apriyadarśanā
GE09ram_03_u:666: 3.016.011c āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam
GE09ram_03_u:667: 3.016.012a evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:669: 3.016.013a āsīd daśaratho nāma rājā tridaśavikramaḥ 3.016.013c tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:670: 3.016.014a bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:671: 3.016.014c iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā
GE09ram_03_u:672: 3.016.015a niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:673: 3.016.015c dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:674: 3.016.016a tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā 3.016.016c iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:675: 3.016.017a sābravīd vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasī madanārditā 3.016.017c śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:676: 3.016.018a ahaṃ śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī 3.016.018c araṇyaṃ vicarāmīdam ekā sarvabhayaṃkarā
GE09ram_03_u:677: 3.016.019a rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:678: 3.016.019c pravṛddhanidraś ca sadā kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ 3.016.020a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:679: 3.016.020c prakhyātavīryau ca raṇe bhrātarau kharadūṣaṇau 3.016.021a tān ahaṃ samatikrāntā rāma tvāpūrvadarśanāt 3.016.021c samupetāsmi bhāvena bhartāraṃ puruṣottamam
GE09ram_03_u:680: 3.016.021e cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:681: 3.016.022a vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava 3.016.022c aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām
GE09ram_03_u:682: 3.016.023a imāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm 3.016.023c anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi
GE09ram_03_u:683: 3.016.024a tataḥ parvataśṛṅgāṇi vanāni vividhāni ca 3.016.024c paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān
GE09ram_03_u:684: 3.016.025a ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:685: 3.016.025c idaṃ vacanam ārebhe vaktuṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 3.017.001a tāṃ tu śūrpaṇakhāṃ rāmaḥ kāmapāśāvapāśitām 3.017.001c svecchayā ślakṣṇayā vācā smitapūrvam athābravīt 3.017.002a kṛtadāro 'smi bhavati bhāryeyaṃ dayitā mama
GE09ram_03_u:686: 3.017.002c tvadvidhānāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ suduḥkhā sasapatnatā 3.017.003a anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:687: 3.017.003c śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:688: 3.017.004a apūrvī bhāryayā cārthī taruṇaḥ priyadarśanaḥ 3.017.004c anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:689: 3.017.005a enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:690: 3.017.005c asapatnā varārohe merum arkaprabhā yathā 3.017.006a iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī
GE09ram_03_u:691: 3.017.006c visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:692: 3.017.007a asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī
GE09ram_03_u:693: 3.017.007c mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:694: 3.017.008a evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:695: 3.017.008c tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:696: 3.017.009a kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:699: 3.017.010c āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī
GE09ram_03_u:700: 3.017.011a etāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm 3.017.011c bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:701: 3.017.012a ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini
GE09ram_03_u:702: 3.017.012c mānuṣeṣu varārohe kuryād bhāvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ 3.017.013a iti sā lakṣmaṇenoktā karālā nirṇatodarī 3.017.013c manyate tad vacaḥ satyaṃ parihāsāvicakṣaṇā 3.017.014a sā rāmaṃ parṇaśālāyām upaviṣṭaṃ paraṃtapam 3.017.014c sītayā saha durdharṣam abravīt kāmamohitā 3.017.015a imāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm 3.017.015c vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase 3.017.016a adyemāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi paśyatas tava mānuṣīm 3.017.016c tvayā saha cariṣyāmi niḥsapatnā yathāsukham 3.017.017a ity uktvā mṛgaśāvākṣīm alātasadṛśekṣaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:703: 3.017.017c abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhā maholkā rohiṇīm iva 3.017.018a tāṃ mṛtyupāśapratimām āpatantīṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:704: 3.017.018c nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:705: 3.017.019a krūrair anāryaiḥ saumitre parihāsaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:706: 3.017.019c na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃ cit saumya jīvatīm 3.017.020a imāṃ virūpām asatīm atimattāṃ mahodarīm 3.017.020c rākṣasīṃ puruṣavyāghra virūpayitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:707: 3.017.021a ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:708: 3.017.021c uddhṛtya khaḍgaṃ ciccheda karṇanāsaṃ mahābalaḥ 3.017.022a nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca
GE09ram_03_u:709: 3.017.022c yathāgataṃ pradudrāva ghorā śūrpaṇakhā vanam 3.017.023a sā virūpā mahāghorā rākṣasī śoṇitokṣitā 3.017.023c nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:710: 3.017.024a sā vikṣarantī rudhiraṃ bahudhā ghoradarśanā 3.017.024c pragṛhya bāhū garjantī praviveśa mahāvanam 3.017.025a tatas tu sā rākṣasasaṃgha saṃvṛtaṃ; kharaṃ janasthānagataṃ virūpitā
GE09ram_03_u:711: 3.017.025c upetya taṃ bhrātaram ugratejasaṃ; papāta bhūmau gaganād
GE09ram_03_u:713: 3.017.026a tataḥ sabhāryaṃ bhayamohamūrchitā; salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam āgataṃ
GE09ram_03_u:715: 3.017.026c virūpaṇaṃ cātmani śoṇitokṣitā; śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā 3.018.001a tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām
GE09ram_03_u:716: 3.018.001c bhaginīṃ krodhasaṃtaptaḥ kharaḥ papraccha rākṣasaḥ 3.018.002a balavikramasaṃpannā kāmagā kāmarūpiṇī
GE09ram_03_u:717: 3.018.002c imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā
GE09ram_03_u:719: 3.018.003c ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:720: 3.018.004a na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam
GE09ram_03_u:722: 3.018.005a adyāhaṃ mārgaṇaiḥ prāṇān ādāsye jīvitāntakaiḥ 3.018.005c salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:724: 3.018.006c saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:725: 3.018.007a kasya patrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:726: 3.018.007c prahṛṣṭā bhakṣayiṣyanti nihatasya mayā raṇe 3.018.008a taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:727: 3.018.008c mayāpakṛṣṭaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ śaktās trātuṃ mahāhave 3.018.009a upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:728: 3.018.009c yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā
GE09ram_03_u:729: 3.018.010a iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:730: 3.018.010c tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:732: 3.018.011c puṇḍarīkaviśālākṣau cīrakṛṣṇājināmbarau 3.018.012a gandharvarājapratimau pārthivavyañjanānvitau 3.018.012c devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe 3.018.013a taruṇī rūpasaṃpannā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā
GE09ram_03_u:733: 3.018.013c dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:734: 3.018.014a tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃbhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām
GE09ram_03_u:735: 3.018.014c imām avasthāṃ nītāhaṃ yathānāthāsatī tathā 3.018.015a tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham
GE09ram_03_u:736: 3.018.015c saphenaṃ pātum icchāmi rudhiraṃ raṇamūrdhani 3.018.016a eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet 3.018.016c tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave
GE09ram_03_u:737: 3.018.017a iti tasyāṃ bruvāṇāyāṃ caturdaśa mahābalān 3.018.017c vyādideśa kharaḥ kruddho rākṣasān antakopamān 3.018.018a mānuṣau śastrasaṃpannau cīrakṛṣṇājināmbarau
GE09ram_03_u:738: 3.018.018c praviṣṭau daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ ghoraṃ pramadayā saha 3.018.019a tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha
GE09ram_03_u:739: 3.018.019c iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:741: 3.018.020c śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā
GE09ram_03_u:742: 3.018.021a iti pratisamādiṣṭā rākṣasās te caturdaśa 3.018.021c tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:743: 3.019.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā ghorā rāghavāśramam āgatā 3.019.001c rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:744: 3.019.002a te rāmaṃ parṇaśālāyām upaviṣṭaṃ mahābalam 3.019.002c dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_03_u:745: 3.019.003a tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm 3.019.003c abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.019.004a muhūrtaṃ bhava saumitre sītāyāḥ pratyanantaraḥ 3.019.004c imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha
GE09ram_03_u:746: 3.019.005a vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:747: 3.019.005c tatheti lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ rāmasya pratyapūjayat 3.019.006a rāghavo 'pi mahac cāpaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:748: 3.019.006c cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:750: 3.019.007c praviṣṭau sītayā sārdhaṃ duścaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam 3.019.008a phalamūlāśanau dāntau tāpasau dharmacāriṇau
GE09ram_03_u:752: 3.019.009a yuṣmān pāpātmakān hantuṃ viprakārān mahāvane 3.019.009c ṛṣīṇāṃ tu niyogena prāpto 'haṃ saśarāsanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:754: 3.019.010c yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:755: 3.019.011a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:756: 3.019.011c ūcur vācaṃ susaṃkruddhā brahmaghnaḥ śūlapāṇayaḥ 3.019.012a saṃraktanayanā ghorā rāmaṃ raktāntalocanam
GE09ram_03_u:758: 3.019.013a krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:759: 3.019.013c tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi
GE09ram_03_u:760: 3.019.014a kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_03_u:761: 3.019.014c asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave
GE09ram_03_u:762: 3.019.015a ebhir bāhuprayuktair naḥ parighaiḥ śūlapaṭṭiśaiḥ 3.019.015c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam
GE09ram_03_u:763: 3.019.016a ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:765: 3.019.016e cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam
GE09ram_03_u:766: 3.019.017a tāni śūlāni kākutsthaḥ samastāni caturdaśa 3.019.017c tāvadbhir eva ciccheda śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ 3.019.018a tataḥ paścān mahātejā nārācān sūryasaṃnibhān 3.019.018c jagrāha paramakruddhaś caturdaśa śilāśitān
GE09ram_03_u:767: 3.019.019a gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:768: 3.019.019c mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:769: 3.019.020a rukmapuṅkhāś ca viśikhāḥ pradīptā hemabhūṣaṇāḥ 3.019.020c antarikṣe maholkānāṃ babhūvus tulyavarcasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:770: 3.019.021a te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:772: 3.019.022a te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:774: 3.019.023a tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_03_u:775: 3.019.023c paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam
GE09ram_03_u:776: 3.019.024a sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:777: 3.019.024c upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃ cit saṃśuṣka śoṇitā 3.019.024e papāta punar evārtā saniryāseva vallarī 3.019.025a nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān; pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punas
GE09ram_03_u:779: 3.019.025c vadhaṃ ca teṣāṃ nikhilena rakṣasāṃ; śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī
GE09ram_03_u:780: kharasya sā 3.020.001a sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:781: 3.020.001c uvāca vyaktatā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām
GE09ram_03_u:782: 3.020.002a mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:783: 3.020.002c tvatpriyārthaṃ vinirdiṣṭāḥ kimarthaṃ rudyate punaḥ 3.020.003a bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:784: 3.020.003c ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama
GE09ram_03_u:785: 3.020.004a kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:786: 3.020.004c hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau
GE09ram_03_u:787: 3.020.005a anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite
GE09ram_03_u:788: 3.020.005c uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha
GE09ram_03_u:789: 3.020.006a ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā
GE09ram_03_u:790: 3.020.006c vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:791: 3.020.007a preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:792: 3.020.007c nihantuṃ rāghavaṃ ghorā matpriyārthaṃ salakṣmaṇam 3.020.008a te tu rāmeṇa sāmarṣāḥ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇayaḥ 3.020.008c samare nihatāḥ sarve sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ 3.020.009a tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān
GE09ram_03_u:793: 3.020.009c rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama
GE09ram_03_u:794: 3.020.010a sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:795: 3.020.010c śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:796: 3.020.011a viṣādanakrādhyuṣite paritrāsormimālini 3.020.011c kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare
GE09ram_03_u:797: 3.020.012a ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:798: 3.020.012c ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:799: 3.020.013a mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca 3.020.013c rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:801: 3.020.014a yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:802: 3.020.014c tava caivāgrataḥ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi nirapatrapā 3.020.015a buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:803: 3.020.015c sthātuṃ pratimukhe śaktaḥ sacāpasya mahāraṇe 3.020.016a śūramānī na śūras tvaṃ mithyāropitavikramaḥ 3.020.016c mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:805: 3.020.017c niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha
GE09ram_03_u:807: 3.020.018c sa hi tejaḥsamāyukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 3.020.018e bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā
GE09ram_03_u:808: 3.021.001a evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:809: 3.021.001c uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:810: 3.021.002a tavāpamānaprabhavaḥ krodho 'yam atulo mama 3.021.002c na śakyate dhārayituṃ lavaṇāmbha ivotthitam 3.021.003a na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:811: 3.021.003c ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:812: 3.021.004a bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa saṃbhramaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_03_u:813: 3.021.004c ahaṃ rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:815: 3.021.005c rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi
GE09ram_03_u:816: 3.021.006a sā prahṛṣṭvā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam
GE09ram_03_u:817: 3.021.006c praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:818: 3.021.007a tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:819: 3.021.007c abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:825: 3.021.010c sarvodyogam udīrṇānāṃ rakṣasāṃ saumya kāraya 3.021.011a upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_03_u:826: 3.021.011c śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:827: 3.021.012a agre niryātum icchāmi paulastyānāṃ mahātmanām 3.021.012c vadhārthaṃ durvinītasya rāmasya raṇakovidaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:828: 3.021.013a iti tasya bruvāṇasya sūryavarṇaṃ mahāratham 3.021.013c sadaśvaiḥ śabalair yuktam ācacakṣe 'tha dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:831: 3.021.015a matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:832: 3.021.015c māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:833: 3.021.016a dhvajanistriṃśasaṃpannaṃ kiṅkiṇīkavibhūṣitam 3.021.016c sadaśvayuktaṃ so 'marṣād āruroha rathaṃ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:834: 3.021.017a niśāmya taṃ rathagataṃ rāakṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ 3.021.017c tasthuḥ saṃparivāryainaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca mahābalam 3.021.018a kharas tu tān maheṣvāsān ghoracarmāyudhadhvajān 3.021.018c niryātety abravīd dṛṣṭvā rathasthaḥ sarvarākṣasān 3.021.019a tatas tad rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ ghoracarmāyudhadhvajam 3.021.019c nirjagāma janasthānān mahānādaṃ mahājavam
GE09ram_03_u:835: 3.021.020a mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:836: 3.021.020c khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:837: 3.021.021a śaktibhiḥ patighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:841: 3.021.023a tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
GE09ram_03_u:842: 3.021.023c kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃ cij jagāma tadanantaram
GE09ram_03_u:843: 3.021.024a tatas tāñ śabalān aśvāṃs taptakāñcanabhūṣitān 3.021.024c kharasya matam ājñāya sārathiḥ samacodayat 3.021.025a sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:844: 3.021.025c śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaś ca pratiśas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:845: 3.021.026a pravṛddhamanyus tu kharaḥ kharasvano; ripor vadhārthaṃ tvarito
GE09ram_03_u:847: 3.021.026c acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar; mahābalo megha ivāśmavarṣavān
GE09ram_03_u:848: 3.022.001a tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam
GE09ram_03_u:850: 3.022.002a nipetus turagās tasya rathayuktā mahājavāḥ 3.022.002c same puṣpacite deśe rājamārge yadṛcchayā 3.022.003a śyāmaṃ rudhiraparyantaṃ babhūva pariveṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:852: 3.022.004a tato dhvajam upāgamya hemadaṇḍaṃ samucchritam 3.022.004c samākramya mahākāyas tasthau gṛdhraḥ sudāruṇaḥ 3.022.005a janasthānasamīpe ca samākramya kharasvanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:853: 3.022.005c visvarān vividhāṃś cakrur māṃsādā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 3.022.006a vyājahruś ca padīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam
GE09ram_03_u:854: 3.022.006c aśivā yātu dāhānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:855: 3.022.007a prabhinnagirisaṃkāśās toyaśoṣitadhāriṇaḥ 3.022.007c ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:856: 3.022.008a babhūva timiraṃ ghoram uddhataṃ romaharṣaṇam 3.022.008c diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire
GE09ram_03_u:858: 3.022.009c kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:862: 3.022.011c jagrāha sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ 3.022.012a pravāti mārutaḥ śīghraṃ niṣprabho 'bhūd divākaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:863: 3.022.012c utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:865: 3.022.013c tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:866: 3.022.014a uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:867: 3.022.014c vīcīkūcīti vāśyanto babhūvus tatra sārikāḥ 3.022.015a ulkāś cāpi sanirghoṣā nipetur ghoradarśanāḥ 3.022.015c pracacāla mahī cāpi saśailavanakānanā
GE09ram_03_u:868: 3.022.016a kharasya ca rathasthasya nardamānasya dhīmataḥ 3.022.016c prākampata bhujaḥ savyaḥ kharaś cāsyāvasajjata 3.022.017a sāsrā saṃpadyate dṛṣṭiḥ paśyamānasya sarvataḥ 3.022.017c lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata 3.022.018a tān samīkṣya mahotpātān utthitān romaharṣaṇān 3.022.018c abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:869: 3.022.019a mahotpātān imān sarvān utthitān ghoradarśanān 3.022.019c na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva
GE09ram_03_u:870: 3.022.020a tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt
GE09ram_03_u:871: 3.022.020c mṛtyuṃ maraṇadharmeṇa saṃkruddho yojayāmy aham 3.022.021a rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:872: 3.022.021c ahatvā sāyakais tīkṣṇair nopāvartitum utsahe 3.022.022a sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:873: 3.022.022c yannimittaṃ tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya viparyayaḥ 3.022.023a na kva cit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:874: 3.022.023c yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:876: 3.022.024c vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau 3.022.025a sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ
GE09ram_03_u:879: 3.022.026c ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:881: 3.022.027c svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:882: 3.022.028a jayatāṃ rāghavo yuddhe paulastyān rajanīcarān 3.022.028c cakrā hasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān
GE09ram_03_u:883: 3.022.029a etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:884: 3.022.029c dadṛśur vāhinīṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gatāyuṣām 3.022.030a rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:885: 3.022.030c taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:886: 3.022.031a śyena gāmī pṛthugrīvo yajñaśatrur vihaṃgamaḥ 3.022.031c durjayaḥ karavīrākṣaḥ paruṣaḥ kālakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:888: 3.022.032c dvādaśaite mahāvīryāḥ pratasthur abhitaḥ kharam 3.022.033a mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī triśirās tathā 3.022.033c catvāra ete senāgryā dūṣaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:889: 3.022.034a sā bhīmavegā samarābhikāmā; sudāruṇā rākṣasavīra senā
GE09ram_03_u:890: 3.022.034c tau rājaputrau sahasābhyupetā; mālāgrahāṇām iva candrasūryau
GE09ram_03_u:891: 3.023.001a āśramaṃ prati yāte tu khare kharaparākrame
GE09ram_03_u:892: 3.023.001c tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha
GE09ram_03_u:893: 3.023.002a tān utpātān mahāghorān utthitān romaharṣaṇān 3.023.002c prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:896: 3.023.004a amī rudhiradhārās tu visṛjantaḥ kharasvanān 3.023.004c vyomni meghā vivartante paruṣā gardabhāruṇāḥ 3.023.005a sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:897: 3.023.005c rukmapṛṣṭhāni cāpāni viveṣṭante ca lakṣmaṇa 3.023.006a yādṛśā iha kūjanti pakṣiṇo vanacāriṇaḥ 3.023.006c agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:898: 3.023.007a saṃprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:899: 3.023.007c ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:900: 3.023.008a saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam
GE09ram_03_u:901: 3.023.008c suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate 3.023.009a udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:902: 3.023.009c niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥ parikṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:903: 3.023.010a anāgatavidhānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ śubham icchatā 3.023.010c āpadaṃ śaṅkamānena puruṣeṇa
GE09ram_03_u:904: 3.023.011a tasmād gṛhītvā vaidehīṃ śarapāṇir dhanurdharaḥ 3.023.011c guhām āśrayaśailasya durgāṃ pādapasaṃkulām
GE09ram_03_u:905: 3.023.012a pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:906: 3.023.012c śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram
GE09ram_03_u:907: 3.023.013a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:908: 3.023.013c śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat
GE09ram_03_u:909: 3.023.014a tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:910: 3.023.014c hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat
GE09ram_03_u:913: 3.023.016a sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:914: 3.023.016c babhūvāvasthitas tatra jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ 3.023.017a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:915: 3.023.017c ūcuḥ paramasaṃtrastā guhyakāś ca parasparam 3.023.018a caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ
GE09ram_03_u:916: 3.023.018c ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:920: 3.023.020c cāpāni vispharayatāṃ jṛmbhatāṃ cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ 3.023.021a vipraghuṣṭasvanānāṃ ca dundubhīṃś cāpi nighnatām 3.023.021c teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayām āsa tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:921: 3.023.022a tena śabdena vitrastāḥ śvāpadā vanacāriṇaḥ 3.023.022c dudruvur yatra niḥśabdaṃ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayan 3.023.023a tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata
GE09ram_03_u:924: 3.023.024c dadarśa kharasainyaṃ tad yuddhābhimukham udyatam 3.023.025a vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān
