GE09ram_03_u:925: 3.023.025c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām 3.023.026a duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_03_u:926: 3.023.026c taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejasāviṣṭaṃ prāvyathan vanadevatāḥ 3.023.027a tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā
GE09ram_03_u:927: 3.023.027c dakṣasyeva kratuṃ hantum udyatasya pinākinaḥ 3.024.001a avaṣṭabdhadhanuṃ rāmaṃ kruddhaṃ ca ripughātinam 3.024.001c dadarśāśramam āgamya kharaḥ saha puraḥsaraiḥ 3.024.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam
GE09ram_03_u:928: 3.024.002c rāmasyābhimukhaṃ sūtaṃ codyatām ity acodayat 3.024.003a sa kharasyājñayā sūtas turagān samacodayat 3.024.003c yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:929: 3.024.004a taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:931: 3.024.005a sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:932: 3.024.005c babhūva madhye tārāṇāṃ lohitāṅga ivoditaḥ 3.024.006a tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:933: 3.024.006c rāmaṃ nānāvidhaiḥ śastrair abhyavarṣanta durjayam 3.024.007a mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:934: 3.024.007c rākṣasāḥ samare rāmaṃ nijaghnū roṣatatparāḥ 3.024.008a te balāhakasaṃkāśā mahānādā
GE09ram_03_u:935: 3.024.008c abhyadhāvanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ yuddhe jighāṃsavaḥ 3.024.009a te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:936: 3.024.009c śailendram iva dhārābhir varṣamāṇā mahādhanāḥ 3.024.010a sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:937: 3.024.010c tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:938: 3.024.011a tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:939: 3.024.011c pratijagrāha viśikhair nadyoghān iva sāgaraḥ 3.024.012a sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe
GE09ram_03_u:940: 3.024.012c rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:941: 3.024.013a sa viddhaḥ kṣatajādigdhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ 3.024.013c babhūva rāmaḥ saṃdhyābhrair divākara ivāvṛtaḥ 3.024.014a viṣedur devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ 3.024.014c ekaṃ sahastrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:945: 3.024.016c mumoca līlayā rāmaḥ kaṅkapatrān ajihmagān 3.024.017a te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā
GE09ram_03_u:946: 3.024.017c ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva
GE09ram_03_u:947: 3.024.018a bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:949: 3.024.019a asaṃkhyeyās tu rāmasya sāyakāś cāpamaṇḍalāt 3.024.019c viniṣpetur atīvogrā rakṣaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:950: 3.024.020a tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
GE09ram_03_u:952: 3.024.021a tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ 3.024.021c bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ cakrur bhidyamānā niśācarāḥ 3.024.022a tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:953: 3.024.022c rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā
GE09ram_03_u:954: 3.024.023a ke cid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_03_u:956: 3.024.024a tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:957: 3.024.024c jahāra samare prāṇāṃś ciccheda ca śirodharān
GE09ram_03_u:958: 3.024.025a avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:960: 3.024.026a tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:961: 3.024.026c abhyadhāvata kākutsthaṃ kruddho rudram ivāntakaḥ 3.024.027a nivṛttās tu punaḥ sarve dūṣaṇāśrayanirbhayāḥ 3.024.027c rāmam evābhyadhāvanta sālatālaśilāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:962: 3.024.028a tad babhūvādbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ romaharṣaṇam 3.024.028c rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:963: 3.025.001a tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:965: 3.025.002a pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:966: 3.025.002c rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:967: 3.025.003a tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ pradīpta iva tejasā 3.025.003c śarair abhyakirat sainyaṃ sarvataḥ sahadūṣaṇam 3.025.004a tataḥ senāpatiḥ kruddho dūṣaṇaḥ śatrudūṣaṇaḥ 3.025.004c jagrāha giriśṛṅgābhaṃ parighaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:969: 3.025.005c āyasaiḥ śaṅkubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ kīrṇaṃ paravasokṣitām 3.025.006a vajrāśanisamasparśaṃ paragopuradāraṇam 3.025.006c taṃ mahoragasaṃkāśaṃ pragṛhya parighaṃ raṇe 3.025.006e dūṣaṇo 'bhyapatad rāmaṃ krūrakarmā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:971: 3.025.007c dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ ciccheda sahastābharaṇau bhujau 3.025.008a bhraṣṭas tasya mahākāyaḥ papāta raṇamūrdhani 3.025.008c parighaś chinnahastasya śakradhvaja ivāgrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:972: 3.025.009a sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:974: 3.025.010a dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:975: 3.025.010c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan
GE09ram_03_u:976: 3.025.011a etasminn antare kruddhās trayaḥ senāgrayāyinaḥ 3.025.011c saṃhatyābhyadravan rāmaṃ mṛtyupāśāvapāśitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:977: 3.025.011e mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī ca mahābalaḥ 3.025.012a mahākapālo vipulaṃ śūlam udyamya rākṣasaḥ 3.025.012c sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham
GE09ram_03_u:978: 3.025.013a dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:979: 3.025.013c tīkṣṇāgraiḥ pratijagrāha saṃprāptān atithīn iva 3.025.014a mahākapālasya śiraś ciccheda raghunaṅganaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:980: 3.025.014c asaṃkhyeyais tu bāṇaughaiḥ pramamātha pramāthinam 3.025.015a sthūlākṣasyākṣiṇī tīkṣṇaiḥ pūrayām āsa sāyakaiḥ 3.025.015c sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:982: 3.025.016c jaghanaśeṣaṃ tejasvī tasya sainyasya sāyakaiḥ 3.025.017a te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:983: 3.025.017c nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān
GE09ram_03_u:984: 3.025.018a rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā
GE09ram_03_u:985: 3.025.018c sahasraṃ ca sahasreṇa jaghāna raṇamūrdhani 3.025.019a tair bhinnavarmābharaṇāś
GE09ram_03_u:987: 3.025.020a tair muktakeśaiḥ samare patitaiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥ 3.025.020c āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva
GE09ram_03_u:988: 3.025.021a kṣaṇena tu mahāghoraṃ vanaṃ nihatarākṣasaṃ 3.025.021c babhūva niraya prakhyaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:990: 3.025.022c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa padātinā 3.025.023a tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:991: 3.025.023c rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:992: 3.025.024a tatas tu tad bhīmabalaṃ mahāhave; samīkṣya rāmeṇa hataṃ
GE09ram_03_u:994: 3.025.024c rathena rāmaṃ mahatā kharas tataḥ; samāsasādendra ivodyatāśaniḥ 3.026.001a kharaṃ tu rāmābhimukhaṃ prayāntaṃ vāhinīpatiḥ 3.026.001c rākṣasas triśirā nāma saṃnipatyedam abravīt 3.026.002a māṃ niyojaya vikrānta saṃnivartasva sāhasāt 3.026.002c paśya rāmaṃ mahābāhuṃ saṃyuge vinipātitam 3.026.003a pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe
GE09ram_03_u:995: 3.026.003c yathā rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi vadhārhaṃ sarvarakṣasām 3.026.004a ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama 3.026.004c vinivartya raṇotsāhaṃ muhūrtaṃ prāśniko bhava 3.026.005a prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:996: 3.026.005c mayi vā nihate rāmaṃ saṃyugāyopayāsyasi 3.026.006a kharas triśirasā tena mṛtyulobhāt prasāditaḥ 3.026.006c gaccha yudhyety anujñāto rāghavābhimukho yayau 3.026.007a triśirāś ca rathenaiva vājiyuktena bhāsvatā 3.026.007c abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:997: 3.026.008a śaradhārā samūhān sa mahāmegha ivotsṛjan 3.026.008c vyasṛjat sadṛśaṃ nādaṃ jalārdrasyeva dundubheḥ 3.026.009a āgacchantaṃ triśirasaṃ rākṣasaṃ prekṣya rāghavaḥ 3.026.009c dhanuṣā pratijagrāha vidhunvan sāyakāñ śitān 3.026.010a sa saṃprahāras tumulo rāma triśirasor mahān
GE09ram_03_u:999: 3.026.011a tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1000: 3.026.011c amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1002: 3.026.012c puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1004: 3.026.013a evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān
GE09ram_03_u:1005: 3.026.013c triśiro vakṣasi kruddho nijaghāna caturdaśa 3.026.014a caturbhis turagān asya śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ 3.026.014c nyapātayata tejasvī caturas tasya vājinaḥ 3.026.015a aṣṭabhiḥ sāyakaiḥ sūtaṃ rathopasthe nyapātayat 3.026.015c rāmaś ciccheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam
GE09ram_03_u:1006: 3.026.016a tato hatarathāt tasmād utpatantaṃ niśācaram 3.026.016c bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1007: 3.026.017a sāyakaiś cāprameyātmā sāmarṣas tasya rakṣasaḥ 3.026.017c śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1009: 3.026.018c nyapatat patitaiḥ pūrvaṃ svaśirobhir niśācaraḥ 3.026.019a hataśeṣās tato bhagnā rākṣasāḥ kharasaṃśrayāḥ 3.026.019c dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva
GE09ram_03_u:1010: 3.026.020a tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam
GE09ram_03_u:1011: 3.026.020c rāmam evābhidudrāva rāhuś candramasaṃ yathā 3.027.001a nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha
GE09ram_03_u:1012: 3.027.001c kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam
GE09ram_03_u:1013: 3.027.002a sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1014: 3.027.002c hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api
GE09ram_03_u:1015: 3.027.003a tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1016: 3.027.003c āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1017: 3.027.004a vikṛṣya balavac cāpaṃ nārācān raktabhojanān 3.027.004c kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva
GE09ram_03_u:1018: 3.027.005a jyāṃ vidhunvan subahuśaḥ śikṣayāstrāṇi darśayan 3.027.005c cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1019: 3.027.006a sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ 3.027.006c pūrayām āsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ 3.027.007a sa sāyakair durviṣahaiḥ sasphuliṅgair ivāgnibhiḥ 3.027.007c nabhaś cakārāvivaraṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ 3.027.008a tad babhūva śitair bāṇaiḥ khararāmavisarjitaiḥ 3.027.008c paryākāśam anākāśaṃ sarvataḥ śarasaṃkulam
GE09ram_03_u:1020: 3.027.009a śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate
GE09ram_03_u:1022: 3.027.010a tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ 3.027.010c ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam
GE09ram_03_u:1023: 3.027.011a taṃ rathasthaṃ dhanuṣpāṇiṃ rākṣasaṃ paryavasthitam 3.027.011c dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni pāśahastam ivāntakam
GE09ram_03_u:1024: 3.027.012a taṃ siṃham iva vikrāntaṃ siṃhavikrāntagāminam 3.027.012c dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1025: 3.027.013a tataḥ sūryanikāśena rathena mahatā kharaḥ 3.027.013c āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṅga iva pāvakam
GE09ram_03_u:1027: 3.027.014c kharaś ciccheda rāmasya darśayan pāṇilāghavam 3.027.015a sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi 3.027.015c nijaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ śakrāśanisamaprabhān
GE09ram_03_u:1028: 3.027.016a tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1030: 3.027.017a sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1031: 3.027.017c rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan 3.027.018a tato gambhīranirhrādaṃ rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1032: 3.027.018c cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1033: 3.027.019a sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:1034: 3.027.019c varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata
GE09ram_03_u:1035: 3.027.020a tataḥ kanakapuṅkhais tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ 3.027.020c ciccheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam
GE09ram_03_u:1036: 3.027.021a sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1037: 3.027.021c jagāma dharaṇīṃ sūryo devatānām ivājñayā 3.027.022a taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1038: 3.027.022c vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṅgam iva tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1039: 3.027.023a sa rāmo bahubhir bāṇaiḥ kharakārmukaniḥsṛtaiḥ 3.027.023c viddho rudhirasiktāṅgo babhūva ruṣito bhṛśam 3.027.024a sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave
GE09ram_03_u:1040: 3.027.024c mumoca parameṣvāsaḥ ṣaṭ śarān abhilakṣitān 3.027.025a śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat
GE09ram_03_u:1041: 3.027.025c tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha
GE09ram_03_u:1042: 3.027.026a tataḥ paścān mahātejā nārācān bhāskaropamān 3.027.026c jighāṃsū rākṣasaṃ kruddhas trayodaśa śilāśitān 3.027.027a tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān 3.027.027c ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye ciccheda kharasāratheḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1043: 3.027.028a tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1044: 3.027.028c dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1045: 3.027.028e chittvā vajranikāśena rāghavaḥ prahasann iva 3.027.028g trayodaśenendrasamo bibheda samare kharam
GE09ram_03_u:1047: 3.027.029c gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1048: 3.027.030a tat karma rāmasya mahārathasya; sametya devāś ca maharṣayaś ca 3.027.030c apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭās; tadā vimānāgragatāḥ sametāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1049: 3.028.001a kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:1050: 3.028.001c mṛdupūrvaṃ mahātejāḥ paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt 3.028.002a gajāśvarathasaṃbādhe bale mahati tiṣṭhatā
GE09ram_03_u:1053: 3.028.003c trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati 3.028.004a karma lokaviruddhaṃ tu kurvāṇaṃ kṣaṇadācara 3.028.004c tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:1054: 3.028.005a lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate 3.028.005c bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva
GE09ram_03_u:1056: 3.028.006c kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:1057: 3.028.007a na ciraṃ pāpakarmāṇaḥ krūrā lokajugupsitāḥ 3.028.007c aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1058: 3.028.008a avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1059: 3.028.008c ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam
GE09ram_03_u:1060: 3.028.009a nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE09ram_03_u:1062: 3.028.010a pāpam āccaratāṃ ghoraṃ lokasyāpriyam icchatām 3.028.010c aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:1063: 3.028.011a adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1064: 3.028.011c vidārya nipatiṣyanti valmīkam iva pannagāḥ 3.028.012a ye tvayā daṇḍakāraṇye bhakṣitā dharmacāriṇaḥ 3.028.012c tān adya nihataḥ saṃkhye sasainyo 'nugamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1065: 3.028.013a adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1066: 3.028.013c nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā
GE09ram_03_u:1067: 3.028.014a prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama
GE09ram_03_u:1068: 3.028.014c adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1069: 3.028.015a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1070: 3.028.015c pratyuvāca tato rāmaṃ prahasan krodhamūrchitaḥ 3.028.016a prākṛtān rākṣasān hatvā yuddhe daśarathātmaja 3.028.016c ātmanā katham ātmānam apraśasyaṃ praśaṃsasi 3.028.017a vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1071: 3.028.017c kathayanti na te kiṃ cit tejasā svena garvitāḥ 3.028.018a prākṛtās tv akṛtātmāno loke kṣatriyapāṃsanāḥ 3.028.018c nirarthakaṃ vikatthante yathā rāma vikatthase 3.028.019a kulaṃ vyapadiśan vīraḥ samare ko 'bhidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:1072: 3.028.019c mṛtyukāle hi saṃprāpte svayam aprastave stavam
GE09ram_03_u:1073: 3.028.020a sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam
GE09ram_03_u:1075: 3.028.021a na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam 3.028.021c dharādharam ivākampyaṃ parvataṃ dhātubhiś citam 3.028.022a paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava 3.028.022c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ 3.028.023a kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham
GE09ram_03_u:1076: 3.028.023c astaṃ gacched dhi savitā yuddhavighras tato bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:1077: 3.028.024a caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ hatāni te 3.028.024c tvadvināśāt karomy adya teṣām aśrupramārjanam 3.028.025a ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadām
GE09ram_03_u:1078: 3.028.025c kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1079: 3.028.026a kharabāhupramuktā sā pradīptā mahatī gadā 3.028.026c bhasmavṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1080: 3.028.027a tām āpatantīṃ jvalitāṃ mṛtyupāśopamāṃ gadā 3.028.027c antarikṣagatāṃ rāmaś ciccheda bahudhā śaraiḥ 3.028.028a sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_03_u:1082: 3.029.001a bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1083: 3.029.001c smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1084: 3.029.002a etat te balasarvasvaṃ darśitaṃ rākṣasādhama 3.029.002c śaktihīnataro matto vṛthā tvam upagarjitam 3.029.003a eṣā bāṇavinirbhinnā gadā bhūmitalaṃ gatā 3.029.003c abhidhānapragalbhasya tava pratyayaghātinī
GE09ram_03_u:1085: 3.029.004a yat tvayoktaṃ vinaṣṭānām idam aśrupramārjanam 3.029.004c rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1087: 3.029.005c prāṇān apahariṣyāmi garutmān amṛtaṃ yathā 3.029.006a adya te bhinnakaṇṭhasya
GE09ram_03_u:1088: 3.029.006c vidāritasya madbāṇair mahī pāsyati śoṇitam 3.029.007a pāṃsurūṣitasarvāṅgaḥ srastanyastabhujadvayaḥ 3.029.007c svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva
GE09ram_03_u:1090: 3.029.008c bhaviṣyanty aśaraṇyānāṃ śaraṇyā daṇḍakā ime 3.029.009a janasthāne hatasthāne tava rākṣasamaccharaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1091: 3.029.009c nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sarvato munayo vane 3.029.010a adya viprasariṣyanti rākṣasyo
GE09ram_03_u:1093: 3.029.011a adya śokarasajñās tā bhaviṣyanti niśācara 3.029.011c anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1095: 3.029.012c tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1096: 3.029.013a tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:1097: 3.029.013c kharo nirbhartsayām āsa roṣāt kharatara svanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1098: 3.029.014a dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1099: 3.029.014c vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase
GE09ram_03_u:1100: 3.029.015a kālapāśaparikṣiptā bhavanti puruṣā hi ye 3.029.015c kāryākāryaṃ na jānanti te nirastaṣaḍindriyāḥ 3.029.016a evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhṛkuṭiṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1101: 3.029.016c sa dadarśa mahāsālam avidūre niśācaraḥ 3.029.017a raṇe praharaṇasyārthe sarvato hy avalokayan 3.029.017c sa tam utpāṭayām āsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam
GE09ram_03_u:1102: 3.029.018a taṃ samutkṣipya bāhubhyāṃ vinarditvā mahābalaḥ 3.029.018c rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1103: 3.029.019a tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:1104: 3.029.019c roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam
GE09ram_03_u:1105: 3.029.020a jātasvedas tato rāmo roṣād raktāntalocanaḥ 3.029.020c nirbibheda sahasreṇa bāṇānāṃ samare kharam 3.029.021a tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam
GE09ram_03_u:1107: 3.029.022a vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:1108: 3.029.022c matto rudhiragandhena tam evābhyadravad drutam 3.029.023a tam āpatantaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ kṛtāstro rudhirāplutam 3.029.023c apasarpat pratipadaṃ kiṃ cit tvaritavikramaḥ 3.029.024a tataḥ pāvakasaṃkāśaṃ badhāya samare śaram 3.029.024c kharasya rāmo jagrāha brahmadaṇḍam ivāparam 3.029.025a sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_03_u:1109: 3.029.025c saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati 3.029.026a sa vimukto mahābāṇo
GE09ram_03_u:1110: 3.029.026c rāmeṇa dhanur udyamya kharasyorasi cāpatat 3.029.027a sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā
GE09ram_03_u:1112: 3.029.028a sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathāa
GE09ram_03_u:1113: 3.029.028c balo vendrāśanihato nipapāta hataḥ kharaḥ 3.029.029a tato rājarṣayaḥ sarve saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ 3.029.029c sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_03_u:1116: 3.029.031a ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1117: 3.029.031c eṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ krūrāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ pāpakarmaṇām 3.029.032a tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja
GE09ram_03_u:1118: 3.029.032c sukhaṃ dharmaṃ cariṣyanti daṇḍakeṣu maharṣayaḥ 3.029.033a etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:1120: 3.029.034a tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1122: 3.029.035a taṃ dṛṣṭvā śatruhantāraṃ maharṣīṇāṃ sukhāvaham 3.029.035c babhūva hṛṣṭā vaidehī bhartāraṃ pariṣasvaje 3.030.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi caturdaśa 3.030.001c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām 3.030.002a dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:1123: 3.030.002c dṛṣṭvā punar mahānādaṃ nanāda jaladopamā 3.030.003a sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_03_u:1125: 3.030.004a sa dadarśa vimānāgre rāvaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.030.004c upopaviṣṭaṃ sacivair marudbhir iva vāsavam 3.030.005a āsīnaṃ sūryasaṃkāśe kāñcane paramāsane
GE09ram_03_u:1126: 3.030.005c rukmavedigataṃ prājyaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam 3.030.006a devagandharvabhūtānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:1127: 3.030.006c ajeyaṃ samare śūraṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam 3.030.007a devāsuravimardeṣu vajrāśanikṛtavraṇam 3.030.007c airāvataviṣāṇāgrair utkṛṣṭakiṇavakṣasaṃ 3.030.008a viṃśadbhujaṃ daśagrīvaṃ darśanīyaparicchadam
GE09ram_03_u:1129: 3.030.009a snigdhavaidūryasaṃkāśaṃ taptakāñcanakuṇḍalam 3.030.009c subhujaṃ śukladaśanaṃ mahāsyaṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_03_u:1131: 3.030.010c āhatāṅgaṃ samastaiś ca devapraharaṇais tathā 3.030.011a akṣobhyāṇāṃ samudrāṇāṃ kṣobhaṇaṃ kṣiprakāriṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1132: 3.030.011c kṣeptāraṃ parvatāgrāṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca pramardanam 3.030.012a ucchettāraṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1134: 3.030.013a purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim
GE09ram_03_u:1135: 3.030.013c takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1136: 3.030.014a kailāsaṃ parvataṃ gatvā vijitya naravāhanam 3.030.014c vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1137: 3.030.015a vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_03_u:1138: 3.030.015c vināśayati yaḥ krodhād devodyānāni vīryavān 3.030.016a candrasūryau mahābhāgāv uttiṣṭhantau paraṃtapau
GE09ram_03_u:1141: 3.030.017c purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1143: 3.030.018c abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte
GE09ram_03_u:1144: 3.030.019a mantrar abhituṣṭaṃ puṇyam adhvareṣu dvijātibhiḥ 3.030.019c havirdhāneṣu yaḥ somam upahanti mahābalaḥ 3.030.020a āptayajñaharaṃ krūraṃ brahmaghnaṃ duṣṭacāriṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1145: 3.030.020c karkaśaṃ niranukrośaṃ prajānām ahite ratam 3.030.020e rāvaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1146: 3.030.021a rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1149: 3.030.022a tam abravīd dīptaviśālalocanaṃ; pradarśayitvā bhayamohamūrchitā 3.030.022c sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī; mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā
GE09ram_03_u:1150: 3.031.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā dīnā rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam 3.031.001c amātyamadhye saṃkruddhā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt 3.031.002a pramattaḥ kāmabhogeṣu svairavṛtto niraṅkuśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1151: 3.031.002c samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ boddhavyaṃ nāvabudhyase 3.031.003a saktaṃ grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu kāmavṛttaṃ mahīpatim 3.031.003c lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1152: 3.031.004a svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1153: 3.031.004c sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati
GE09ram_03_u:1155: 3.031.005c varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1156: 3.031.006a ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1157: 3.031.006c te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1159: 3.031.007c ayuktacāraś capalaḥ kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi 3.031.008a yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:1160: 3.031.008c asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1161: 3.031.009a yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1162: 3.031.009c cāreṇa tasmād ucyante rājāno dīrghacakṣuṣaḥ 3.031.010a ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1163: 3.031.010c svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_03_u:1165: 3.031.011c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1166: 3.031.012a ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1168: 3.031.013a tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa 3.031.013c viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_03_u:1169: 3.031.014a tīkṣṇam alpapradātāraṃ pramattaṃ garvitaṃ śaṭham 3.031.014c vyasane sarvabhūtāni nābhidhāvanti pārthivam
GE09ram_03_u:1172: 3.031.016a nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca
GE09ram_03_u:1173: 3.031.016c kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1174: 3.031.017a śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1175: 3.031.017c na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1176: 3.031.018a upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1178: 3.031.019a apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1179: 3.031.019c kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram
GE09ram_03_u:1180: 3.031.020a nayanābhyāṃ prasupto 'pi jāgarti nayacakṣuṣā 3.031.020c vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1181: 3.031.021a tvaṃ tu rāvaṇadurbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1182: 3.031.021c yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1183: 3.031.022a parāvamantā viṣayeṣu saṃgato; nadeśa kālapravibhāga tattvavit
GE09ram_03_u:1184: 3.031.022c ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye; vipannarājyo na cirād vipatsyate
GE09ram_03_u:1185: 3.031.023a iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā; samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1186: 3.031.023c dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito; vicintayām āsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ 3.032.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1188: 3.032.002a kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃ vīryaḥ kiṃ rūpaḥ kiṃ parākramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1189: 3.032.002c kimarthaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ praviṣṭaś ca suduścaram 3.032.003a āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1190: 3.032.003c kharaś ca nihataṃ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:1191: 3.032.004a ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā 3.032.004c tato rāmaṃ yathānyāyam ākhyātum upacakrame 3.032.005a dīrghabāhur viśālākṣaś cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1194: 3.032.006c dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān
GE09ram_03_u:1195: 3.032.007a nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1196: 3.032.007c na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:1197: 3.032.008a hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1198: 3.032.008c indreṇaivottamaṃ sasyam āhataṃ tv aśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ 3.032.009a rakṣasāṃ bhīmavīryāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:1199: 3.032.009c nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇais tenaikena padātinā 3.032.010a ardhādhikamuhūrtena kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1200: 3.032.010c ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1201: 3.032.011a ekā kathaṃ cin muktāhaṃ paribhūya mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:1203: 3.032.012a bhrātā cāsya mahātejā guṇatas tulyavikramaḥ 3.032.012c anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:1204: 3.032.013a amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_03_u:1205: 3.032.013c rāmasya dakṣiṇe bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiṣcaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1206: 3.032.014a rāmasya tu viśālākṣī dharmapatnī yaśasvinī 3.032.014c sītā nāma varārohā vaidehī tanumadhyamā 3.032.015a naiva devī na gandharvā na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_03_u:1207: 3.032.015c tathārūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale 3.032.016a yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet 3.032.016c atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt
GE09ram_03_u:1208: 3.032.017a sā suśīlā vapuḥślāghyā rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi 3.032.017c tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ 3.032.018a tāṃ tu vistīrṇajaghanāṃ pīnottuṅgapayodharām
GE09ram_03_u:1209: 3.032.018c bhāryārthe tu tavānetum udyatāhaṃ varānanām 3.032.019a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvādya vaidehīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām 3.032.019c manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1210: 3.032.020a yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate
GE09ram_03_u:1211: 3.032.020c śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1212: 3.032.021a kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:1214: 3.032.022a taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_03_u:1215: 3.032.022c hatanāthāṃ sukhaṃ sītāṃ yathāvad upabhokṣyase 3.032.023a rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:1216: 3.032.023c kriyatāṃ nirviśaṅkena vacanaṃ mama rāghava 3.032.024a niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair; hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān
GE09ram_03_u:1217: 3.032.024c kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ; tvam adya kṛtyaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1218: pratipattum arhasi 3.033.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ tac chrutvā romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1219: 3.033.001c sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:1220: 3.033.002a tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1221: 3.033.002c doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1222: 3.033.003a iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1223: 3.033.003c sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:1224: 3.033.004a yānaśālāṃ tato gatvā pracchannaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.033.004c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti
GE09ram_03_u:1225: 3.033.005a evam uktaḥ kṣaṇenaiva sārathir laghuvikramaḥ 3.033.005c rathaṃ saṃyojayām āsa tasyābhimatam uttamam 3.033.006a kāñcanaṃ ratham āsthāya kāmagaṃ ratnabhūṣitam 3.033.006c piśācavadanair yuktaṃ kharaiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1229: 3.033.008c snigdhavaidūryasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇaḥ 3.033.009a daśāsyo viṃśatibhujo darśanīya paricchadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1231: 3.033.010a kāmagaṃ ratham āsthāya śuśubhe rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.033.010c vidyunmaṇḍalavān meghaḥ sabalāka ivāmbare
GE09ram_03_u:1237: 3.033.013c sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1239: 3.033.014c nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1240: 3.033.015a jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāmaṇaiś copaśobhitam
GE09ram_03_u:1241: 3.033.015c ājair vaikhānasair māṣair vālakhilyair marīcipaiḥ 3.033.016a divyābharaṇamālyābhir divyarūpābhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1243: 3.033.017a sevitaṃ devapatnībhiḥ śrīmatībhiḥ śriyā vṛtam 3.033.017c devadānavasaṃghaiś ca caritaṃ tv amṛtāśibhiḥ 3.033.018a haṃsakrauñcaplavākīrṇaṃ sārasaiḥ saṃpraṇāditam
GE09ram_03_u:1250: 3.033.021c vanāni paśyan saumyāni ghrāṇatṛptikarāṇi ca 3.033.022a agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:1251: 3.033.022c takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām
GE09ram_03_u:1252: 3.033.023a puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1253: 3.033.023c muktānāṃ ca samūhāni śuṣyamāṇāni tīrataḥ 3.033.024a śaṅkhānāṃ prastaraṃ caiva pravālanicayaṃ tathā 3.033.024c kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1254: 3.033.025a prasravāṇi manojñāni prasannāni hradāni ca 3.033.025c dhanadhānyopapannāni strīratnair āvṛtāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:1256: 3.033.026c taṃ samaṃ sarvataḥ snigdhaṃ mṛdusaṃsparśamārutam 3.033.027a anūpaṃ sindhurājasya dadarśa tridivopamam
GE09ram_03_u:1257: 3.033.027c tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1258: 3.033.028a samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1259: 3.033.028c yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kaccapam
GE09ram_03_u:1260: 3.033.028e bhakṣārthaṃ garuḍaḥ śākhām ājagāma mahābalaḥ 3.033.029a tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1262: 3.033.030a tatra vaikhānasā māṣā vālakhilyā marīcipāḥ 3.033.030c ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1263: 3.033.031a teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām
GE09ram_03_u:1264: 3.033.031c jagāmādāya vegena tau cobhau gajakacchapau 3.033.032a ekapādena dharmātmā bhakṣayitvā tad āmiṣam 3.033.032c niṣādaviṣayaṃ hatvā śākhayā patagottamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1265: 3.033.032e praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mokṣayitvā mahāmunīn 3.033.033a sa tenaiva praharṣeṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1266: 3.033.033c amṛtānayanārthaṃ vai cakāra matimān matim 3.033.034a ayojālāni nirmathya bhittvā ratnagṛhaṃ varam 3.033.034c mahendrabhavanād guptam ājahārāmṛtaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1268: 3.033.035c nāmnā subhadraṃ nyagrodhaṃ dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ 3.033.036a taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1269: 3.033.036c dadarśāśramam ekānte puṇye ramye vanāntare 3.033.037a tatra kṛṣṇājinadharaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1270: 3.033.037c dadarśa niyatāhāraṃ mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ 3.033.038a sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:1271: 3.033.038c tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1272: 3.034.001a mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1273: 3.034.001c ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1274: 3.034.002a jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama
GE09ram_03_u:1275: 3.034.002c dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me
GE09ram_03_u:1276: 3.034.003a triśirāś ca mahātejā rākṣasaḥ piśitāśanaḥ 3.034.003c anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā
GE09ram_03_u:1277: 3.034.004a vasanti manniyogena adhivāsaṃ ca rākṣasaḥ 3.034.004c bādhamānā mahāraṇye munīn ye dharmacāriṇaḥ 3.034.005a caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:1279: 3.034.006a te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1280: 3.034.006c saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:1282: 3.034.007c anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃ cic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1284: 3.034.008c nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇair mānuṣeṇa padātinā 3.034.009a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1285: 3.034.009c hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1286: 3.034.010a pitrā nirastaḥ kruddhena sabhāryaḥ kṣīṇajīvitaḥ 3.034.010c sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1288: 3.034.011c tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1289: 3.034.012a yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam
GE09ram_03_u:1291: 3.034.013a tasya bhāryāṃ janasthānāt sītāṃ surasutopamām 3.034.013c ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava
GE09ram_03_u:1292: 3.034.014a tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala
GE09ram_03_u:1293: 3.034.014c bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye
GE09ram_03_u:1294: 3.034.015a tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:1295: 3.034.015c vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_03_u:1296: 3.034.016a etadartham ahaṃ prāptas tvatsamīpaṃ niśācara 3.034.016c śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama 3.034.017a sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1297: 3.034.017c āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara
GE09ram_03_u:1298: 3.034.018a tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1299: 3.034.018c gṛhyatām iti bhartāraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cābhidhāsyati 3.034.019a tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_03_u:1300: 3.034.019c nirābādho hariṣyāmi rāhuś candraprabhām iva 3.034.020a tataḥ paścāt sukhaṃ rāme bhāryāharaṇakarśite 3.034.020c visrabdhaṃ prahariṣyāmi kṛtārthenāntarātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:1301: 3.034.021a tasya rāmakathāṃ śrutvā mārīcasya mahātmanaḥ 3.034.021c śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca
GE09ram_03_u:1302: 3.034.022a sa rāvaṇaṃ trastaviṣaṇṇacetā; mahāvane rāmaparākramajñaḥ 3.034.022c kṛtāñjalis tattvam uvāca vākyaṃ; hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca
GE09ram_03_u:1303: 3.035.001a tac chrutvā rākṣasendrasya vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 3.035.001c pratyuvāca mahāprājño mārīco rākṣaseśvaram
GE09ram_03_u:1304: 3.035.002a sulabhāḥ puruṣā rājan satataṃ priyavādinaḥ 3.035.002c apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1305: 3.035.003a na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam
GE09ram_03_u:1307: 3.035.004a api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:1308: 3.035.004c api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1309: 3.035.005a api te jīvitāntāya notpannā janakātmajā 3.035.005c api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat 3.035.006a api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam
GE09ram_03_u:1310: 3.035.006c na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:1311: 3.035.007a tvadvidhaḥ kāmavṛtto hi duḥśīlaḥ pāpamantritaḥ 3.035.007c ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1312: 3.035.008a na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:1313: 3.035.008c na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ 3.035.009a na ca dharmaguṇair hīnaiḥ kausalyānandavardhanaḥ 3.035.009c na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1314: 3.035.010a vañcitaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyyā satyavādinam 3.035.010c kariṣyāmīti dharmātmā tataḥ pravrajito vanam 3.035.011a kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ pitur daśarathasya ca 3.035.011c hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam
GE09ram_03_u:1315: 3.035.012a na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1316: 3.035.012c anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi 3.035.013a rāmo vigrahavān dharmaḥ sādhuḥ satyaparākramaḥ 3.035.013c rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1317: 3.035.014a kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_03_u:1318: 3.035.014c icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1320: 3.035.015c rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:1323: 3.035.017a rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1325: 3.035.018a aprameyaṃ hi tat tejo yasya sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:1326: 3.035.018c na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:1328: 3.035.019c dīptasyeva hutāśasya śikhā sītā sumadhyamā 3.035.020a kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa
GE09ram_03_u:1329: 3.035.020c dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tad antaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:1330: 3.035.020e jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham
GE09ram_03_u:1331: 3.035.021a sa sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ vibhīṣaṇapuraskṛtaiḥ 3.035.021c mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1332: 3.035.022a doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1333: 3.035.022c ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1334: 3.035.022e hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi 3.035.023a ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe; samāgamaṃ kosalarājasūnunā 3.035.023c idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ; kṣamaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca niśācarādhipa 3.036.001a kadā cid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām 3.036.001c balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayan parvatopamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1335: 3.036.002a nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ 3.036.002c bhayaṃ lokasya janayan kirīṭī parighāyudhaḥ 3.036.002e vyacaraṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam ṛṣimāṃsāni bhakṣayan
GE09ram_03_u:1337: 3.036.003c svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1338: 3.036.004a ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1339: 3.036.004c mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara
GE09ram_03_u:1340: 3.036.005a ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1342: 3.036.006a ūna ṣoḍaśa varṣo 'yam akṛtāstraś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1343: 3.036.006c kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati 3.036.006e badhiṣyāmi muniśreṣṭha śatruṃ tava yathepsitam 3.036.007a ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt 3.036.007c rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1344: 3.036.008a bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe 3.036.008c gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1345: 3.036.009a ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam 3.036.009c jagāma paramaprīto viśvāmitraḥ svam āśramam 3.036.010a taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:1346: 3.036.010c babhūvāvasthito rāmaś citraṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ 3.036.011a ajātavyañjanaḥ śrīmān bālaḥ śyāmaḥ śubhekṣaṇaḥ 3.036.011c ekavastradharo dhanvī śikhī kanakamālayā
GE09ram_03_u:1347: 3.036.012a śobhayan daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ dīptena svena tejasā 3.036.012c adṛśyata tadā rāmo bālacandra ivoditaḥ 3.036.013a tato 'haṃ meghasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ 3.036.013c balī dattavaro darpād ājagāma tadāśramam 3.036.014a tena dṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭo 'haṃ sahasaivodyatāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1348: 3.036.014c māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asaṃbhrāntaś cakāra ha 3.036.015a avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam 3.036.015c viśvāmitrasya tāṃ vedim adhyadhāvaṃ kṛtatvaraḥ 3.036.016a tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1349: 3.036.016c tenāhaṃ tāḍitaḥ kṣiptaḥ samudre śatayojane 3.036.017a rāmasya śaravegena nirasto
GE09ram_03_u:1351: 3.036.017e prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm 3.036.018a evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1353: 3.036.019a tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham
GE09ram_03_u:1354: 3.036.019c kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1356: 3.036.020c rakṣasāṃ caiva saṃtāpam anarthaṃ cāhariṣyasi 3.036.021a harmyaprāsādasaṃbādhāṃ nānāratnavibhūuṣitām 3.036.021c drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte
GE09ram_03_u:1358: 3.036.022c parapāpair vinaśyanti matsyā nāgahrade yathā 3.036.023a divyacandanadigdhāṅgān divyābharaṇabhūṣitān 3.036.023c drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:1359: 3.036.024a hṛtadārān sadārāṃś ca daśavidravato diśaḥ 3.036.024c hataśeṣān aśaraṇān drakṣyasi tvaṃ niśācarān 3.036.025a śarajālaparikṣiptām agnijvālāsamāvṛtām 3.036.025c pradagdhabhavanāṃ laṅkāṃ drakṣyasi tvam asaṃśayam 3.036.026a pramadānāṃ sahasrāṇi tava rājan parigrahaḥ 3.036.026c bhava svadāranirataḥ svakulaṃ rakṣarākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:1360: 3.036.027a mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam iātmanaḥ 3.036.027c yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāma vipriyam
GE09ram_03_u:1361: 3.036.028a nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśaṃ; prasahya sītāṃ yadi
GE09ram_03_u:1363: 3.036.028c gamiṣyasi kṣīṇabalaḥ sabāndhavo; yamakṣayaṃ rāmaśarāttajīvitaḥ 3.037.001a evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃ cit tena saṃyuge 3.037.001c idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram 3.037.002a rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1368: 3.037.004c atyantaghoro vyacaraṃs tāpasāṃs tān pradharṣayan 3.037.005a nihatya daṇḍakāraṇye tāpasān dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1369: 3.037.005c rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan
GE09ram_03_u:1371: 3.037.006c tadā rudhiramatto 'haṃ vyacaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam 3.037.007a tadāhaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye vicaran dharmadūṣakaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1372: 3.037.007c āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam
GE09ram_03_u:1373: 3.037.008a vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_03_u:1378: 3.037.010c jighāṃsur akṛtaprajñas taṃ prahāram anusmaran 3.037.011a tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1380: 3.037.012a te bāṇā vajrasaṃkāśāḥ sughorā raktabhojanāḥ 3.037.012c ājagmuḥ sahitāḥ sarve trayaḥ saṃnataparvaṇaḥ 3.037.013a parākramajño rāmasya śaṭho dṛṣṭabhayaḥ purā 3.037.013c samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau
GE09ram_03_u:1381: 3.037.014a śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃ cit prāpya jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:1383: 3.037.015a vṛkṣe vṛkṣe hi paśyāmi cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram 3.037.015c gṛhītadhanuṣaṃ rāmaṃ pāśahastam
GE09ram_03_u:1384: 3.037.016a api rāmasahasrāṇi bhītaḥ paśyāmi rāvaṇa 3.037.016c rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_03_u:1385: 3.037.017a rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:1386: 3.037.017c dṛṣṭvā svapnagataṃ rāmam udbhramāmi vicetanaḥ 3.037.018a rakārādīni nāmāni rāmatrastasya
GE09ram_03_u:1387: 3.037.018c ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me
GE09ram_03_u:1388: 3.037.019a ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam 3.037.019c raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:1389: 3.037.019e na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi 3.037.020a idaṃ vaco bandhuhitārthinā mayā; yathocyamānaṃ yadi nābhipatsyase
GE09ram_03_u:1390: 3.037.020c sabāndhavas tyakṣyasi jīvitaṃ raṇe; hato 'dya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1391: 3.038.001a mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ 3.038.001c ukto na pratijagrāha martukāma ivauṣadham 3.038.002a taṃ pathyahitavaktāraṃ mārīcaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1392: 3.038.002c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyam ayuktaṃ kālacoditaḥ 3.038.003a yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate
GE09ram_03_u:1393: 3.038.003c vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare
GE09ram_03_u:1394: 3.038.004a tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge 3.038.004c pāpaśīlasya mūrkhasya mānuṣasya viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1395: 3.038.005a yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_03_u:1396: 3.038.005c strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1397: 3.038.006a avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1398: 3.038.006c prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau
GE09ram_03_u:1399: 3.038.007a evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate
GE09ram_03_u:1400: 3.038.007c na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1401: 3.038.008a doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi 3.038.008c apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścane
GE09ram_03_u:1402: 3.038.009a saṃpṛṣṭena tu vaktavyaṃ sacivena vipaścitā 3.038.009c udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1403: 3.038.010a vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:1404: 3.038.010c upacāreṇa yuktaṃ ca vaktavyo vasudhādhipaḥ 3.038.011a sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate
GE09ram_03_u:1405: 3.038.011c nābhinandati tad rājā mānārho mānavarjitam 3.038.012a pañcarūpāṇi rājāno dhārayanty
GE09ram_03_u:1406: 3.038.012c agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1407: 3.038.012e auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām
GE09ram_03_u:1408: 3.038.013a tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1409: 3.038.013c tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1410: 3.038.014a abhyāgataṃ māṃ daurātmyāt paruṣaṃ vadasīdṛśam 3.038.014c guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:1411: 3.038.014e asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāryyaṃ kartum arhasi 3.038.015a sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1412: 3.038.015c pralobhayitvā vaidehīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhasi 3.038.016a tvāṃ tu māyā mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā
GE09ram_03_u:1413: 3.038.016c ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:1414: 3.038.017a apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham
GE09ram_03_u:1415: 3.038.017c ānayiṣyāmi vaidehīṃ sahasrākṣaḥ śacīm iva 3.038.018a evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa 3.038.018c rājyasyārdhaṃ pradāsyāmi mārīca tava suvrata 3.038.019a gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye
GE09ram_03_u:1416: 3.038.019c prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:1417: 3.038.019e laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:1418: 3.038.020a etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1419: 3.038.020c rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate
GE09ram_03_u:1420: 3.038.021a āsādyā taṃ jīvitasaṃśayas te; mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya
GE09ram_03_u:1421: 3.038.021c etad yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā; yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam 3.039.001a ājñapto rājavad vākyaṃ pratikūlaṃ niśācaraḥ 3.039.001c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ mārīco rākṣasādhipam 3.039.002a kenāyam upadiṣṭas te vināśaḥ pāpakarmaṇā 3.039.002c saputrasya sarāṣṭrasya sāmātyasya niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:1422: 3.039.003a kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt
GE09ram_03_u:1423: 3.039.003c kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te mṛtyudvāram upāyataḥ 3.039.004a śatravas tava suvyaktaṃ hīnavīryā niśācara 3.039.004c icchanti tvāṃ vinaśyantam uparuddhaṃ balīyasā 3.039.005a kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te kṣudreṇāhitavādinā
GE09ram_03_u:1424: 3.039.005c yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:1425: 3.039.006a vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1426: 3.039.006c ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1427: 3.039.007a amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1428: 3.039.007c nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase
GE09ram_03_u:1429: 3.039.008a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:1431: 3.039.009a viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1433: 3.039.010a rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara 3.039.010c tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu rakṣitavyo narādhipaḥ 3.039.011a rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:1434: 3.039.011c na cāpi pratikūlena nāvinītena rākṣasa 3.039.012a ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai
GE09ram_03_u:1435: 3.039.012c viṣameṣu rathāḥ śīghraṃ mandasārathayo yathā 3.039.013a bahavaḥ sādhavo loke yuktadharmam anuṣṭhitāḥ 3.039.013c pareṣām aparādhena vinaṣṭāḥ saparicchadāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1436: 3.039.014a svāminā pratikūlena prajās tīkṣṇena rāvaṇa 3.039.014c rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1438: 3.039.015c yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1439: 3.039.016a tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:1440: 3.039.016c atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1441: 3.039.017a māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1442: 3.039.017c anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1443: 3.039.018a darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya
GE09ram_03_u:1444: 3.039.018c ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam
GE09ram_03_u:1445: 3.039.019a ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:1446: 3.039.019c naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ 3.039.020a nivāryamāṇas tu mayā hitaiṣiṇā; na mṛṣyase vākyam idaṃ niśācara 3.039.020c paretakalpā hi gatāyuṣo narā; hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam 3.040.001a evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇo tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1447: 3.040.001c gacchāvety abravīd dīno bhayād rātriṃcaraprabhoḥ 3.040.002a dṛṣṭāś cāhaṃ punas tena śaracāpāsidhāriṇā 3.040.002c madvidhodyataśastreṇa vinaṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me 3.040.003a kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani 3.040.003c eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1448: 3.040.004a prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1449: 3.040.004c pariṣvajya susaṃśliṣṭam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 3.040.005a etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:1450: 3.040.005c idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1451: 3.040.006a āruhyatām ayaṃ śīghraṃ khago ratnavibhūṣitaḥ 3.040.006c mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1452: 3.040.007a tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham
GE09ram_03_u:1453: 3.040.007c āruhya yayatuḥ śīghraṃ tasmād āśramamaṇḍalāt 3.040.008a tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:1454: 3.040.008c girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_03_u:1457: 3.040.010a avatīrya rathāt tasmāt tataḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāt 3.040.010c haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1459: 3.040.011c kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1460: 3.040.012a sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1461: 3.040.012c mṛgo bhūtvāśramadvāri rāmasya vicacāra ha 3.040.013a maṇipravaraśṛṅgāgraḥ sitāsitamukhākṛtiḥ 3.040.013c raktapadmotpalamukha indranīlotpalaśravāḥ 3.040.014a kiṃ cid abhyunnata grīva indranīlanibhodaraḥ 3.040.014c madhūkanibhapārśvaś ca kañjakiñjalkasaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1465: 3.040.016c kṣaṇena rākṣaso jāto mṛgaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ 3.040.017a vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_03_u:1466: 3.040.017c manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1468: 3.040.018c vicaran gacchate samyak śādvalāni samantataḥ 3.040.019a rūpyabinduśataiś citro bhūtvā ca priyadarśanaḥ 3.040.019c viṭapīnāṃ kisalayān bhaṅktvādan vicacāra ha 3.040.020a kadalīgṛhakaṃ gatvā karṇikārān itas tataḥ 3.040.020c samāśrayan mandagatiḥ sītāsaṃdarśanaṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1471: 3.040.022a punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1472: 3.040.022c gatvā muhūrtaṃ tvarayā punaḥ pratinivartate 3.040.023a vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati
GE09ram_03_u:1474: 3.040.024a mṛgayūthair anugataḥ punar eva nivartate 3.040.024c sītādarśanam ākāṅkṣan rākṣaso mṛgatāṃ gataḥ 3.040.025a paribhramati citrāṇi maṇḍalāni viniṣpatan
GE09ram_03_u:1475: 3.040.025c samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1476: 3.040.026a upagamya samāghrāya vidravanti diśo daśa 3.040.026c rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ 3.040.027a pracchādanārthaṃ bhāvasya na bhakṣayati saṃspṛśan 3.040.027c tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā
GE09ram_03_u:1478: 3.040.028c karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūṭāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:1480: 3.040.029c anarhāraṇyavāsasya sā taṃ ratnamayaṃ mṛgam 3.040.029e muktāmaṇivicitrāṅgaṃ dadarśa
GE09ram_03_u:1483: 3.040.031a sa ca tāṃ rāma dayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ 3.040.031c vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:1484: 3.040.032a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ nānāratnamayaṃ mṛgam 3.040.032c vismayaṃ paramaṃ sītā jagāma janakātmajā 3.041.001a sā taṃ saṃprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī
GE09ram_03_u:1487: 3.041.002c bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham
GE09ram_03_u:1489: 3.041.003c vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:1490: 3.041.004a śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1491: 3.041.004c tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:1492: 3.041.005a caranto mṛgayāṃ hṛṣṭāḥ pāpenopādhinā vane 3.041.005c anena nihatā rāma rājānaḥ kāmarūpiṇā 3.041.006a asya māyāvido māyā mṛgarūpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1493: 3.041.006c bhānumatpuruṣavyāghra gandharvapurasaṃnibham 3.041.007a mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratnavicitro nāsti rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:1494: 3.041.007c jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1495: 3.041.008a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ prativārya śucismitā 3.041.008c uvāca sītā saṃhṛṣṭā chadmanā hṛtacetanā 3.041.009a āryaputrābhirāmo 'sau mṛgo harati me manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1496: 3.041.009c ānayainaṃ mahābāho krīḍārthaṃ no bhaviṣyati 3.041.010a ihāśramapade 'smākaṃ bahavaḥ puṇyadarśanāḥ 3.041.010c mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:1497: 3.041.011a ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kinarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:1499: 3.041.012a na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā
GE09ram_03_u:1500: 3.041.012c tejasā kṣamayā dīptyā yathāyaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ 3.041.013a nānāvarṇavicitrāṅgo ratnabindusamācitaḥ 3.041.013c dyotayan vanam avyagraṃ śobhate śaśisaṃnibhaḥ 3.041.014a aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasaṃpac ca śobhanā
GE09ram_03_u:1502: 3.041.015a yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava
GE09ram_03_u:1504: 3.041.016a samāptavanavāsānāṃ rājyasthānāṃ ca naḥ punaḥ 3.041.016c antaḥpuravibhūṣārtho mṛga eṣa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1505: 3.041.017a bharatasyāryaputrasya śvaśrūṇāṃ mama ca prabho 3.041.017c mṛgarūpam idaṃ divyaṃ vismayaṃ janayiṣyati 3.041.018a jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ 3.041.018c ajinaṃ naraśārdūla ruciraṃ me bhaviṣyati 3.041.019a nihatasyāsya sattvasya jāmbūnadamayatvaci
GE09ram_03_u:1506: 3.041.019c śaṣpabṛsyāṃ vinītāyām icchāmy aham upāsitum 3.041.020a kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam
GE09ram_03_u:1507: 3.041.020c vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama
GE09ram_03_u:1509: 3.041.021c taruṇādityavarṇena nakṣatrapathavarcasā 3.041.021e babhūva rāghavasyāpi mano vismayam āgatam 3.041.022a evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam
GE09ram_03_u:1510: 3.041.022c uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1511: 3.041.023a paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām
GE09ram_03_u:1512: 3.041.023c rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati 3.041.024a na vane nandanoddeśe na caitrarathasaṃśraye 3.041.024c kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaś cit samo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1514: 3.041.025c śobhante mṛgam āśritya citrāḥ kanakabindubhiḥ 3.041.026a paśyāsya jṛmbhamāṇasya dīptām agniśikhopamām
GE09ram_03_u:1515: 3.041.026c jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām
GE09ram_03_u:1516: 3.041.027a masāragalvarkamukhaḥ śaṅkhamuktānibhodaraḥ 3.041.027c kasya nāmānirūpyo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1517: 3.041.028a kasya rūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭvā jāmbūnadamaya prabham
GE09ram_03_u:1518: 3.041.028c nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_03_u:1519: 3.041.029a māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1520: 3.041.029c ghnanti lakṣmaṇa rājāno mṛgayāyāṃ mahāvane 3.041.030a dhanāni vyavasāyena vicīyante
GE09ram_03_u:1522: 3.041.031a tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam
GE09ram_03_u:1523: 3.041.031c manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1525: 3.041.032c tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1527: 3.041.033c upavekṣyati vaidehī mayā saha sumadhyamā 3.041.034a na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī 3.041.034c bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1528: 3.041.035a eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ 3.041.035c ubhāv etau mṛgau divyau tārāmṛgamahīmṛgau 3.041.036a yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa 3.041.036c māyaiṣā rākṣasasyeti kartavyo 'sya vadho mayā 3.041.037a etena hi nṛśaṃsena mārīcenākṛtātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:1529: 3.041.037c vane vicaratā pūrvaṃ hiṃsitā munipuṃgavāḥ 3.041.038a utthāya bahavo yena mṛgayāyāṃ janādhipāḥ 3.041.038c nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1530: 3.041.039a purastād iha vātāpiḥ paribhūya tapasvinaḥ 3.041.039c udarastho dvijān hanti svagarbho 'śvatarīm iva
GE09ram_03_u:1531: 3.041.040a sa kadā cic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:1532: 3.041.040c agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha
GE09ram_03_u:1533: 3.041.041a samutthāne ca tad rūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_03_u:1534: 3.041.041c utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1535: 3.041.042a tvayāvigaṇya vātāpe paribhūtāś ca tejasā 3.041.042c jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1536: 3.041.043a evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa 3.041.043c madvidhaṃ yo 'timanyeta dharmanityaṃ jitendriyam 3.041.044a bhaved dhato 'yaṃ vātāpir agastyeneva mā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1537: 3.041.044c iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:1538: 3.041.045a asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_03_u:1539: 3.041.045c aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy atha vā mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:1540: 3.041.046a yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam
GE09ram_03_u:1541: 3.041.046c paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehīṃ mṛgatvaci gataspṛhām 3.041.047a tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati 3.041.047c apramattena te bhāvyam āśramasthena sītayā 3.041.048a yāvat pṛṣatam ekena sāyakena nihanmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:1542: 3.041.048c hatvaitac carma ādāya śīghram eṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1543: 3.041.049a pradakṣiṇenātibalena pakṣiṇā; jaṭāyuṣā buddhimatā ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1544: 3.041.049c bhavāpramattaḥ pratigṛhya maithilīṃ; pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvata eva
GE09ram_03_u:1546: 3.042.001a tathā tu taṃ samādiśya bhrātaraṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1549: 3.042.002c ābadhya ca kalāpau dvau jagāmodagravikramaḥ 3.042.003a taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_03_u:1551: 3.042.004a baddhāsir dhanur ādāya pradudrāva yato mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1552: 3.042.004c taṃ sa paśyati rūpeṇa dyotamānam ivāgrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1554: 3.042.005c ativṛttam iṣoḥ pātāl lobhayānaṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_03_u:1555: 3.042.006a śaṅkitaṃ tu samudbhrāntam utpatantam ivāmbare 3.042.006c daśyamānam adṛśyaṃ ca navoddeśeṣu keṣu cit
GE09ram_03_u:1556: 3.042.007a chinnābhrair iva saṃvītaṃ śāradaṃ candramaṇḍalam 3.042.007c muhūrtād eva dadṛśe muhur dūrāt prakāśate
GE09ram_03_u:1558: 3.042.008c āsīt kruddhas tu kākutstho vivaśas tena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1559: 3.042.009a athāvatasthe suśrāntaś chāyām āśritya śādvale 3.042.009c mṛgaiḥ parivṛto vanyair adūrāt pratyadṛśyata 3.042.010a dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1560: 3.042.010c saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī
GE09ram_03_u:1561: 3.042.011a tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam
GE09ram_03_u:1563: 3.042.012a sa bhṛśaṃ mṛgarūpasya vinirbhidya śarottamaḥ 3.042.012c mārīcasyaiva hṛdayaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1564: 3.042.013a tālamātram athotpatya nyapatat sa śarāturaḥ 3.042.013c vyanadad bhairavaṃ nādaṃ dharaṇyām alpajīvitaḥ 3.042.013e mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum
GE09ram_03_u:1565: 3.042.014a saṃprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram
GE09ram_03_u:1566: 3.042.014c sadṛśaṃ rāghavasyaiva hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_03_u:1567: 3.042.015a tena marmaṇi nirviddhaḥ śareṇānupamena hi 3.042.015c mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1568: 3.042.015e cakre sa sumahākāyo mārīco jīvitaṃ tyajan
GE09ram_03_u:1571: 3.042.017a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_03_u:1572: 3.042.017c jagāma manasā sītāṃ lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ smaran
GE09ram_03_u:1573: 3.042.018a hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evam ākruśya tu mahāsvaram
GE09ram_03_u:1574: 3.042.018c mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:1575: 3.042.019a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1576: 3.042.019c iti saṃcintya dharmātmā rāmo hṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ 3.042.020a tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam
GE09ram_03_u:1577: 3.042.020c rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tat svaram 3.042.021a nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1579: 3.043.001a ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:1580: 3.043.001c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā gaccha jānīhi rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:1581: 3.043.002a na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate
GE09ram_03_u:1582: 3.043.002c krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:1583: 3.043.003a ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:1584: 3.043.003c taṃ kṣipram abhidhāva tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1585: 3.043.004a rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam
GE09ram_03_u:1586: 3.043.004c na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_03_u:1587: 3.043.005a tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:1588: 3.043.005c saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat
GE09ram_03_u:1589: 3.043.006a yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase
GE09ram_03_u:1590: 3.043.006c icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte
GE09ram_03_u:1591: 3.043.007a vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te 3.043.007c tena tiṣṭhasi visrabdhas tam apaśyan mahādyutim
GE09ram_03_u:1592: 3.043.008a kiṃ hi saṃśayam āpanne tasminn iha mayā bhavet 3.043.008c kartavyam iha tiṣṭhantyā yat pradhānas tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1594: 3.043.009c abravīl lakṣmaṇas trastāṃ sītāṃ mṛgavadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:1596: 3.043.010c rākṣaseṣu piśāceṣu kiṃnareṣu mṛgeṣu ca 3.043.011a dānaveṣu ca ghoreṣu na sa vidyeta śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:1597: 3.043.011c yo rāmaṃ pratiyudhyeta samare vāsavopamam 3.043.012a avadhyaḥ samare rāmo naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:1598: 3.043.012c na tvām asmin vane hātum utsahe rāghavaṃ vinā 3.043.013a anivāryaṃ balaṃ tasya balair balavatām api
GE09ram_03_u:1599: 3.043.013c tribhir lokaiḥ samudyuktaiḥ seśvaraiḥ sāmarair api
GE09ram_03_u:1600: 3.043.014a hṛdayaṃ nirvṛtaṃ te 'stu saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_03_u:1601: 3.043.014c āgamiṣyati te bhartā śīghraṃ hatvā mṛgottamam
GE09ram_03_u:1602: 3.043.015a na sa tasya svaro vyaktaṃ na kaś cid api daivataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1603: 3.043.015c gandharvanagaraprakhyā māyā sā tasya rakṣasaḥ 3.043.016a nyāsabhūtāsi vaidehi nyastā mayi mahātmanā 3.043.016c rāmeṇa tvaṃ varārohe na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe
GE09ram_03_u:1604: 3.043.017a kṛtavairāś ca kalyāṇi vayam etair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1605: 3.043.017c kharasya nidhane devi janasthānavadhaṃ prati 3.043.018a rākṣasā vidhinā vāco visṛjanti mahāvane 3.043.018c hiṃsāvihārā vaidehi na cintayitum arhasi 3.043.019a lakṣmaṇenaivam uktā tu kruddhā saṃraktalocanā 3.043.019c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavādinam 3.043.020a anārya karuṇārambha nṛśaṃsa kulapāṃsana
GE09ram_03_u:1606: 3.043.020c ahaṃ tava priyaṃ manye tenaitāni prabhāṣase
GE09ram_03_u:1607: 3.043.021a naitac citraṃ sapatneṣu pāpaṃ lakṣmaṇa yad bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:1609: 3.043.022a suduṣṭas tvaṃ vane rāmam ekam eko 'nugacchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1610: 3.043.022c mama hetoḥ praticchannaḥ prayukto bharatena vā
GE09ram_03_u:1612: 3.043.023c upasaṃśritya bhartāraṃ kāmayeyaṃ pṛthag janam 3.043.024a samakṣaṃ tava saumitre prāṇāṃs tyakṣye na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1613: 3.043.024c rāmaṃ vinā kṣaṇam api na hi jīvāmi bhūtale 3.043.025a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sītayā somaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1614: 3.043.025c abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ sītāṃ prāñjalir vijitendriyaḥ 3.043.026a uttaraṃ notsahe vaktuṃ daivataṃ bhavatī mama
GE09ram_03_u:1615: 3.043.026c vākyam apratirūpaṃ tu na citraṃ strīṣu maithili
GE09ram_03_u:1616: 3.043.027a svabhāvas tv eṣa nārīṇām eṣu lokeṣu dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:1617: 3.043.027c vimuktadharmāś capalās tīkṣṇā bhedakarāḥ striyaḥ 3.043.028a upaśṛṇvantu me sarve sākṣibhūtā vanecarāḥ 3.043.028c nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā 3.043.029a dhik tvām adya praṇaśya tvaṃ yan mām evaṃ viśaṅkase
GE09ram_03_u:1619: 3.043.030a gamiṣye yatra kākutsthaḥ svasti te 'stu varānane
GE09ram_03_u:1620: 3.043.030c rakṣantu tvāṃ viśālākṣi samagrā vanadevatāḥ 3.043.031a nimittāni hi ghorāṇi yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_03_u:1621: 3.043.031c api tvāṃ saha rāmeṇa paśyeyaṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1622: 3.043.032a lakṣmaṇenaivam uktā tu rudatī janakātmajā 3.043.032c pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ tīvraṃ bāṣpapariplutā 3.043.033a godāvarīṃ pravekṣyāmi vinā rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇa 3.043.033c ābandhiṣye 'thavā tyakṣye viṣame deham ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1623: 3.043.034a pibāmi vā viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam
GE09ram_03_u:1624: 3.043.034c na tv ahaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ padāpi puruṣaṃ spṛśe 3.043.035a iti lakṣmaṇam ākruśya sītā duḥkhasamanvitā 3.043.035c pāṇibhyāṃ rudatī duḥkhād udaraṃ prajaghāna ha
GE09ram_03_u:1625: 3.043.036a tām ārtarūpāṃ vimanā rudantīṃ; saumitrir ālokya viśālanetrām
GE09ram_03_u:1626: 3.043.036c āśvāsayām āsa na caiva bhartus; taṃ bhrātaraṃ kiṃ cid uvāca sītā
GE09ram_03_u:1627: 3.043.037a tatas tu sītām abhivādya lakṣmaṇaḥ; kṛtāñjaliḥ kiṃ cid
GE09ram_03_u:1629: 3.043.037c avekṣamāṇo bahuśaś ca maithilīṃ; jagāma rāmasya samīpam ātmavān
GE09ram_03_u:1630: 3.044.001a tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1631: 3.044.001c sa vikāṅkṣan bhṛśaṃ rāmaṃ pratasthe nacirād iva
GE09ram_03_u:1632: 3.044.002a tadāsādya daśagrīvaḥ kṣipram antaram āsthitaḥ 3.044.002c abhicakrāma vaidehīṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1634: 3.044.003c vāme cāṃse 'vasajyātha śubhe yaṣṭikamaṇḍalū 3.044.003e parivrājakarūpeṇa vaidehīṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1635: 3.044.004a tām āsasādātibalo bhrātṛbhyāṃ rahitāṃ vane 3.044.004c rahitāṃ sūryacandrābhyāṃ saṃdhyām iva mahattamaḥ 3.044.005a tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:1636: 3.044.005c rohiṇīṃ śaśinā hīnāṃ grahavad bhṛśadāruṇaḥ 3.044.006a tam ugraṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ janasthānaruhā drumāḥ 3.044.006c samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1637: 3.044.007a śīghrasrotāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīkṣantaṃ raktalocanam
GE09ram_03_u:1638: 3.044.007c stimitaṃ gantum ārebhe bhayād godāvarī nadī
GE09ram_03_u:1639: 3.044.008a rāmasya tv antaraṃ prepsur daśagrīvas tadantare
GE09ram_03_u:1640: 3.044.008c upatasthe ca vaidehīṃ bhikṣurūpeṇa rāvaṇaḥ 3.044.009a abhavyo bhavyarūpeṇa bhartāram
GE09ram_03_u:1641: 3.044.009c abhyavartata vaidehīṃ citrām iva śanaiścaraḥ 3.044.010a sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1642: 3.044.010c atiṣṭhat prekṣya vaidehīṃ rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm 3.044.011a śubhāṃ ruciradantauṣṭhīṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1647: 3.044.013c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.044.014a tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_03_u:1648: 3.044.014c vibhrājamānāṃ vapuṣā rāvaṇaḥ praśaśaṃsa ha 3.044.015a kā tvaṃ kāñcanavarṇābhe
GE09ram_03_u:1649: 3.044.015c kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī
GE09ram_03_u:1650: 3.044.016a hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane 3.044.016c bhūtir vā tvaṃ varārohe ratir vā svairacāriṇī
GE09ram_03_u:1651: 3.044.017a samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava
GE09ram_03_u:1652: 3.044.017c viśāle vimale netre raktānte kṛṣṇatārake 3.044.018a viśālaṃ jaghanaṃ pīnam ūrū karikaropamau 3.044.018c etāv upacitau vṛttau sahitau saṃpragalbhitau 3.044.019a pīnonnatamukhau kāntau snigdhatālaphalopamau
GE09ram_03_u:1655: 3.044.020c mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_03_u:1657: 3.044.021c naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_03_u:1658: 3.044.022a naivaṃrūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale 3.044.022c iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmāthayanti me
GE09ram_03_u:1659: 3.044.023a sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi 3.044.023c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso ghorāṇāṃ kāmarūpiṇām 3.044.024a prāsādāgryāṇi ramyāṇi nagaropavanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:1660: 3.044.024c saṃpannāni sugandhīni yuktāny ācarituṃ tvayā 3.044.025a varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane 3.044.025c bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:1661: 3.044.026a kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite
GE09ram_03_u:1662: 3.044.026c vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
GE09ram_03_u:1663: 3.044.027a neha gacchantī gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ 3.044.027c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā
GE09ram_03_u:1664: 3.044.028a iha śākhāmṛgāḥ siṃhā dvīpivyāghramṛgās tathā 3.044.028c ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyase
GE09ram_03_u:1666: 3.044.029c katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi vanānane
GE09ram_03_u:1667: 3.044.030a kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān 3.044.030c ekā carasi kalyāṇi ghorān rākṣasasevitān 3.044.031a iti praśastā vaidehī rāvaṇena durātmanā 3.044.031c dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_03_u:1668: 3.044.031e sarvair atithisatkāraiḥ pūjayām āsa maithilī 3.044.032a upānīyāsanaṃ pūrvaṃ pādyenābhinimantrya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1669: 3.044.032c abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam
GE09ram_03_u:1670: 3.044.033a dvijātiveṣeṇa samīkṣya maithilī; tam āgataṃ pātrakusumbhadhāriṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1671: 3.044.033c aśakyam uddveṣṭum upāyadarśanān; nyamantrayad brāhmaṇavad yathāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:1672: 3.044.034a iyaṃ bṛsī brāhmaṇa kāmam āsyatām; idaṃ ca pādyaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti 3.044.034c idaṃ ca siddhaṃ vanajātam uttamaṃ; tvadartham avyagram ihopabhujyatām
GE09ram_03_u:1674: 3.044.035c prahasya tasyā haraṇe dhṛtaṃ manaḥ; samarpayām āsa vadhāya
GE09ram_03_u:1676: 3.044.036a tataḥ suveṣaṃ mṛgayā gataṃ patiṃ; pratīkṣamāṇā sahalakṣmaṇaṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1677: 3.044.036c nirīkṣamāṇā haritaṃ dadarśa tan; mahad vanaṃ naiva tu rāmalakṣmaṇau 3.045.001a rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā
GE09ram_03_u:1679: 3.045.002a brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām
GE09ram_03_u:1680: 3.045.002c iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1682: 3.045.003c sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama
GE09ram_03_u:1685: 3.045.005a tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim
GE09ram_03_u:1688: 3.045.006c kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam
GE09ram_03_u:1689: 3.045.007a pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me
GE09ram_03_u:1691: 3.045.007e dvāv ayācata bhartāraṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ nṛpottamam 3.045.008a nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadā cana 3.045.008c eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
GE09ram_03_u:1692: 3.045.009a iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1693: 3.045.009c ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā
GE09ram_03_u:1694: 3.045.010a mama bhartā mahātejā vayasā pañcaviṃśakaḥ 3.045.010c rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1696: 3.045.011a abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam
GE09ram_03_u:1697: 3.045.011c kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1698: 3.045.012a tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:1699: 3.045.012c bharatāya pradātavyam idaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam 3.045.013a tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca 3.045.013c vane pravraja kākutstha pitaraṃ mocayānṛtāt 3.045.014a tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1700: 3.045.014c cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1701: 3.045.015a dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyabrūyān na cānṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1702: 3.045.015c etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam
GE09ram_03_u:1703: 3.045.016a tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:1705: 3.045.017a sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1706: 3.045.017c anvagacchad dhanuṣpāṇiḥ pravrajantaṃ mayā saha 3.045.018a te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaileyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ 3.045.018c vicarāma dvijaśreṣṭha vanaṃ gambhīram ojasā 3.045.019a samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:1707: 3.045.019c āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam
GE09ram_03_u:1708: 3.045.020a sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1709: 3.045.020c ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija
GE09ram_03_u:1710: 3.045.021a evaṃ bruvatyāṃ sītāyāṃ rāmapatnyāṃ mahābalaḥ 3.045.021c pratyuvācottaraṃ tīvraṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1712: 3.045.022c ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1713: 3.045.023a tvāṃ tu kāñcanavarṇābhāṃ dṛṣṭvā kauśeyavāsinīm 3.045.023c ratiṃ svakeṣu dāreṣu nādhigacchāmy anindite 3.045.024a bahvīnām uttamastrīṇām āhṛtānām itas tataḥ 3.045.024c sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava
GE09ram_03_u:1714: 3.045.025a laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī
GE09ram_03_u:1716: 3.045.026a tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1719: 3.045.027c sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi
GE09ram_03_u:1720: 3.045.028a rāvaṇenaivam uktā tu kupitā janakātmajā 3.045.028c pratyuvācānavadyāṅgī tam anādṛtya rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1722: 3.045.029c mahodadhim ivākṣobhyam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā 3.045.030a mahābāhuṃ mahoraskaṃ siṃhavikrāntagāminam
GE09ram_03_u:1723: 3.045.030c nṛsiṃhaṃ siṃhasaṃkāśam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā 3.045.031a pūrṇacandrānanaṃ vīraṃ rājavatsaṃ jitendriyam
GE09ram_03_u:1724: 3.045.031c pṛthukīrtiṃ mahābāhum ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā 3.045.032a tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām
GE09ram_03_u:1725: 3.045.032c nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1726: 3.045.033a pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk
GE09ram_03_u:1727: 3.045.033c rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1728: 3.045.034a kṣudhitasya ca siṃhasya mṛgaśatros tarasvinaḥ 3.045.034c āśīviṣasya vadanād daṃṣṭrām ādātum icchasi 3.045.035a mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ pāṇinā hartum icchasi 3.045.035c kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1729: 3.045.036a akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā leḍhi ca kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:1730: 3.045.036c rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1731: 3.045.037a avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1732: 3.045.037c sūryā candramasau cobhau prāṇibhyāṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1733: 3.045.037e yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1734: 3.045.038a agniṃ prajvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vastreṇāhartum icchasi 3.045.038c kalyāṇa vṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1735: 3.045.039a ayomukhānāṃ śūlānām agre caritum icchasi 3.045.039c rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi 3.045.040a yad antaraṃ siṃhaśṛgālayor vane; yad antaraṃ syandanikāsamudrayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1736: 3.045.040c surāgryasauvīrakayor yad antaraṃ; tad antaraṃ dāśarathes
GE09ram_03_u:1737: tavaiva ca 3.045.041a yad antaraṃ kāñcanasīsalohayor; yad antaraṃ candanavāripaṅkayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1738: 3.045.041c yad antaraṃ hastibiḍālayor vane; tad antaraṃ daśarathes tavaiva ca 3.045.042a yad antaraṃ vāyasavainateyayor; yad antaraṃ madgumayūrayor api
GE09ram_03_u:1739: 3.045.042c yad antaraṃ sārasagṛdhrayor vane; tad antaraṃ dāśarathes
GE09ram_03_u:1740: tavaiva ca 3.045.043a tasmin sahasrākṣasamaprabhāve; rāme sthite kārmukabāṇapāṇau
GE09ram_03_u:1741: 3.045.043c hṛtāpi te 'haṃ na jarāṃ gamiṣye; vajraṃ yathā makṣikayāvagīrṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1742: 3.045.044a itīva tad vākyam aduṣṭabhāvā; sudṛṣṭam uktvā rajanīcaraṃ tam
GE09ram_03_u:1743: 3.045.044c gātraprakampād vyathitā babhūva; vātoddhatā sā kadalīva tanvī
GE09ram_03_u:1744: 3.045.045a tāṃ vepamānām upalakṣya sītāṃ; sa rāvaṇo mṛtyusamaprabhāvaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1745: 3.045.045c kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ; samācacakṣe bhayakāraṇārtham 3.046.001a evaṃ bruvatyāṃ sītāyāṃ saṃrabdhaḥ paruṣākṣaram 3.046.001c lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:1747: 3.046.002c rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:1749: 3.046.003c vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1750: 3.046.004a yena vaiśravaṇo bhrātā vaimātraḥ kāraṇāntare 3.046.004c dvandvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1751: 3.046.005a madbhayārtaḥ parityajya svam adhiṣṭhānam ṛddhimat 3.046.005c kailāsaṃ parvataśreṣṭham adhyāste naravāhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1752: 3.046.006a yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham
GE09ram_03_u:1753: 3.046.006c vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1754: 3.046.007a mama saṃjātaroṣasya mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva maithili 3.046.007c vidravanti paritrastāḥ surāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1755: 3.046.008a yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1756: 3.046.008c tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt saṃpadyate raviḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1757: 3.046.009a niṣkampapatrās taravo nadyaś ca stimitodakāḥ 3.046.009c bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca
GE09ram_03_u:1758: 3.046.010a mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā
GE09ram_03_u:1761: 3.046.011c hemakakṣyā purī ramyā vaidūryamaya toraṇā 3.046.012a hastyaśvarathasaṃbhādhā tūryanādavināditā 3.046.012c sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣaiḥ saṃkulodyānaśobhitā
GE09ram_03_u:1762: 3.046.013a tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:1763: 3.046.013c na sramiṣyasi nārīṇāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ manasvini 3.046.014a bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini
GE09ram_03_u:1764: 3.046.014c na smariṣyasi rāmasya mānuṣasya gatāyuṣaḥ 3.046.015a sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1765: 3.046.015c mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam
GE09ram_03_u:1766: 3.046.016a tena kiṃ bhraṣṭarājyena rāmeṇa gatacetasā 3.046.016c kariṣyasi viśālākṣi tāpasena
GE09ram_03_u:1768: 3.046.017c na manmathaśarāviṣṭaṃ pratyākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi 3.046.018a pratyākhyāya hi māṃ bhīru paritāpaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1770: 3.046.019a evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā
GE09ram_03_u:1771: 3.046.019c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipam 3.046.020a kathaṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ devaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:1772: 3.046.020c bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1773: 3.046.021a avaśyaṃ vinaśiṣyanti sarve rāvaṇa rākṣasāḥ 3.046.021c yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1774: 3.046.022a apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum
GE09ram_03_u:1775: 3.046.022c na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:1776: 3.046.023a jīvec ciraṃ vajradharasya hastāc; chacīṃ pradhṛṣyāpratirūparūpām 3.046.023c na mādṛśīṃ rākṣasadharṣayitvā; pītāmṛtasyāpi tavāsti mokṣaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1777: 3.047.001a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān 3.047.001c haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1778: 3.047.002a sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam 3.047.002c nonmattayā śrutau manye mama vīryaparākramau 3.047.003a udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1779: 3.047.003c āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1780: 3.047.004a arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam
GE09ram_03_u:1781: 3.047.004c kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim
GE09ram_03_u:1782: 3.047.005a evam uktavatas tasya rāvaṇasya śikhiprabhe 3.047.005c kruddhasya hariparyante rakte netre babhūvatuḥ 3.047.006a sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1783: 3.047.006c svaṃ rūpaṃ kālarūpābhaṃ bheje vaiśravaṇānujaḥ 3.047.007a saṃraktanayanaḥ śrīmāṃs
GE09ram_03_u:1784: 3.047.007c daśāsyaḥ kārmukī bāṇī babhūva kṣaṇadācaraḥ 3.047.008a sa parivrājakacchadma mahākāyo vihāya tat 3.047.008c pratipede svakaṃ rūpaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.047.009a saṃraktanayanaḥ krodhāj jīmūtanicayaprabhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1785: 3.047.009c raktāmbaradharas tasthau strīratnaṃ prekṣya maithilīm 3.047.010a sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva
GE09ram_03_u:1787: 3.047.011a triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1788: 3.047.011c mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1789: 3.047.012a māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ 3.047.012c naiva cāhaṃ kva cid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam 3.047.012e tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām
GE09ram_03_u:1790: 3.047.013a rājyāc cyutam asiddhārthaṃ rāmaṃ parimitāyuṣam 3.047.013c kair guṇair anuraktāsi mūḍhe paṇḍitamānini 3.047.014a yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_03_u:1791: 3.047.014c asmin vyālānucarite vane vasati durmatiḥ 3.047.015a ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm
