GE09ram_03_u:1792: 3.047.015c jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva

GE09ram_03_u:1795: 3.047.018a sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1797: 3.047.019a tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1798: 3.047.019c aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ ratham āropayat tadā 3.047.020a sā gṛhītāticukrośa rāvaṇena
GE09ram_03_u:1799: 3.047.020c rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:1800: 3.047.021a tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:1802: 3.047.022a tataḥ sā rākṣasendreṇa hriyamāṇā vihāyasā 3.047.022c bhṛśaṃ cukrośa matteva bhrāntacittā yathāturā 3.047.023a hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho gurucittaprasādaka
GE09ram_03_u:1803: 3.047.023c hriyamāṇāṃ na jānīṣe rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā 3.047.024a jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan
GE09ram_03_u:1804: 3.047.024c hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1806: 3.047.025c katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam 3.047.026a nanu sadyo 'vinītasya dṛśyate karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE09ram_03_u:1807: 3.047.026c kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye
GE09ram_03_u:1808: 3.047.027a sa karma kṛtavān etat kālopahatacetanaḥ 3.047.027c jīvitāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ rāmād vyasanam āpnuhi 3.047.028a hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha
GE09ram_03_u:1810: 3.047.029a āmantraye janasthānaṃ karṇikārāṃś ca puṣpitān 3.047.029c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1811: 3.047.030a mālyavantaṃ śikhariṇaṃ vande prasravaṇaṃ girim 3.047.030c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1813: 3.047.031c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1814: 3.047.032a daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape
GE09ram_03_u:1815: 3.047.032c namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:1816: 3.047.033a yāni kāni cid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta 3.047.033c sarvāṇi śaraṇaṃ yāmi mṛgapakṣigaṇān api 3.047.034a hriyamāṇāṃ priyāṃ bhartuḥ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_03_u:1818: 3.047.035a viditvā māṃ mahābāhur amutrāpi mahābalaḥ 3.047.035c āneṣyati parākramya vaivasvatahṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:1819: 3.047.036a rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:1820: 3.047.036c lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1821: 3.048.001a taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve
GE09ram_03_u:1822: 3.048.001c niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1824: 3.048.002c vanaspatigataḥ śrīmān vyājahāra śubhāṃ giram 3.048.003a daśagrīvasthito dharme purāṇe satyasaṃśrayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1825: 3.048.003c jaṭāyur nāma nāmnāhaṃ gṛdhrarājo mahābalaḥ 3.048.004a rājā sarvasya lokasya
GE09ram_03_u:1826: 3.048.004c lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1828: 3.048.005c sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1829: 3.048.006a kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet
GE09ram_03_u:1832: 3.048.007a na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet
GE09ram_03_u:1833: 3.048.007c yathātmanas tathānyeṣāṃ dārā rakṣyā vimarśanāt 3.048.008a arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣv anāgatam 3.048.008c vyavasyanty anu rājānaṃ dharmaṃ paurastyanandana 3.048.009a rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ 3.048.009c dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate
GE09ram_03_u:1834: 3.048.010a pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:1835: 3.048.010c aiśvaryam abhisaṃprāpto vimānam iva duṣkṛtī 3.048.011a kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum
GE09ram_03_u:1836: 3.048.011c na hi duṣṭātmanām ārya mā vasaty ālaye ciram 3.048.012a viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ 3.048.012c nāparādhyati dharmātmā kathaṃ tasyāparādhyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1839: 3.048.014a atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1840: 3.048.014c yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1841: 3.048.015a kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:1842: 3.048.015c dahed dahana bhūtena vṛtram indrāśanir yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1843: 3.048.016a sarpam āśīviṣaṃ baddhvā vastrānte nāvabudhyase 3.048.016c grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1844: 3.048.017a sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet
GE09ram_03_u:1845: 3.048.017c tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam
GE09ram_03_u:1846: 3.048.018a yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi
GE09ram_03_u:1847: 3.048.018c śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret
GE09ram_03_u:1850: 3.048.020a vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī
GE09ram_03_u:1851: 3.048.020c tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1852: 3.048.021a na śaktas tvaṃ balād dhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ 3.048.021c hetubhir nyāyasaṃyuktair dhruvāṃ vedaśrutīm iva 3.048.022a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1853: 3.048.022c śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:1854: 3.048.023a asakṛt saṃyuge yena nihatā daityadānavāḥ 3.048.023c nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1855: 3.048.024a kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau 3.048.024c kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ 3.048.025a na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām
GE09ram_03_u:1856: 3.048.025c sītāṃ kamalapatrākṣīṃ rāmasya mahaṣīṃ priyām 3.048.026a avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1857: 3.048.026c jīvitenāpi rāmasya tathā daśarathasya ca 3.048.027a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1859: 3.048.027e vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt
GE09ram_03_u:1860: 3.049.001a ity uktasya yathānyāyaṃ rāvaṇasya jaṭāyuṣā 3.049.001c kruddhasyāgninibhāḥ sarvā rejur viṃśatidṛṣṭayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1862: 3.049.002c rākṣasendro 'bhidudrāva patagendram amarṣaṇaḥ 3.049.003a sa saṃprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane
GE09ram_03_u:1863: 3.049.003c babhūva vātoddhatayor meghayor gagane yathā 3.049.004a tad babhūvādbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ gṛdhrarākṣasayos tadā 3.049.004c sapakṣayor mālyavator mahāparvatayor iva
GE09ram_03_u:1864: 3.049.005a tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ 3.049.005c abhyavarṣan mahāghorair gṛdhrarājaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1865: 3.049.006a sa tāni śarajālāni gṛdhraḥ patraratheśvaraḥ 3.049.006c jaṭāyuḥ pratijagrāha rāvaṇāstrāṇi saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:1866: 3.049.007a tasya tīkṣṇanakhābhyāṃ tu caraṇābhyāṃ mahābalaḥ 3.049.007c cakāra bahudhā gātre vraṇān patagasattamaḥ 3.049.008a atha krodhād daśagrīvo jagrāha daśamārgaṇān 3.049.008c mṛtyudaṇḍanibhān ghorāñ śatrumardanakāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_03_u:1867: 3.049.009a sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1868: 3.049.009c bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1869: 3.049.010a sa rākṣasarathe paśyañ jānakīṃ bāṣpalocanām 3.049.010c acintayitvā bāṇāṃs tān rākṣasaṃ samabhidravat 3.049.011a tato 'sya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muktāmaṇivibhūṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:1871: 3.049.012a tac cāgnisadṛśaṃ dīptaṃ rāvaṇasya śarāvaram 3.049.012c pakṣābhyāṃ ca mahātejā vyadhunot patageśvaraḥ 3.049.013a kāñcanoraśchadān divyān piśācavadanān kharān
GE09ram_03_u:1872: 3.049.013c tāṃś cāsya javasaṃpannāñ jaghāna samare balī
GE09ram_03_u:1875: 3.049.014e pūrṇacandrapratīkāśaṃ chatraṃ ca vyajanaiḥ saha 3.049.015a sa bhagnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ 3.049.015c aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ papāta bhuvi rāvaṇaḥ 3.049.016a dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ bhūmau rāvaṇaṃ bhagnavāhanam 3.049.016c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan
GE09ram_03_u:1876: 3.049.017a pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam
GE09ram_03_u:1877: 3.049.017c utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1878: 3.049.018a taṃ prahṛṣṭaṃ nidhāyāṅke gacchantaṃ janakātmajām 3.049.018c gṛdhrarājaḥ samutpatya jaṭāyur idam abravīt 3.049.019a vajrasaṃsparśabāṇasya bhāryāṃ rāmasya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1879: 3.049.019c alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:1881: 3.049.020c viṣapānaṃ pibasy etat pipāsita ivodakam 3.049.021a anubandham ajānantaḥ karmaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:1882: 3.049.021c śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1883: 3.049.022a baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
GE09ram_03_u:1884: 3.049.022c vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1885: 3.049.023a na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1886: 3.049.023c dharṣaṇaṃ cāśramasyāsya kṣamiṣyete tu rāghavau 3.049.024a yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam
GE09ram_03_u:1888: 3.049.025a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1889: 3.049.025c śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:1890: 3.049.026a paretakāle puruṣo yat karma pratipadyate 3.049.026c vināśāyātmano 'dharmyaṃ pratipanno 'si karma tat 3.049.027a pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān 3.049.027c kurvīta lokādhipatiḥ svayambhūr bhagavān api 3.049.028a evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1891: 3.049.028c nipapāta bhṛśaṃ pṛṣṭhe daśagrīvasya vīryavān 3.049.029a taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1892: 3.049.029c adhirūḍho gajārohi yathā syād duṣṭavāraṇam 3.049.030a virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan
GE09ram_03_u:1894: 3.049.031a sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1895: 3.049.031c amarṣasphuritauṣṭhaḥ san prākampata sa rākṣasaḥ 3.049.032a saṃpariṣvajya vaidehīṃ vāmenāṅkena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1897: 3.049.033a jaṭāyus tam atikramya tuṇḍenāsya kharādhipaḥ 3.049.033c vāmabāhūn daśa tadā vyapāharad ariṃdamaḥ 3.049.034a tataḥ kruddho daśakrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:1898: 3.049.034c muṣṭibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāṃ ca gṛdhrarājam apothayat 3.049.035a tato muhūrtaṃ saṃgrāmo
GE09ram_03_u:1899: 3.049.035c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1901: 3.049.036c pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya so 'cchinat
GE09ram_03_u:1902: 3.049.037a sa chinnapakṣaḥ sahasā rakṣasā raudrakarmaṇā 3.049.037c nipapāta hato gṛdhro dharaṇyām alpajīvitaḥ 3.049.038a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_03_u:1903: 3.049.038c abhyadhāvata vaidehī svabandhum iva duḥkhitā 3.049.039a taṃ nīlajīmūtanikāśakalpaṃ; supāṇḍuroraskam udāravīryam 3.049.039c dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyāṃ; jaṭāyuṣaṃ śāntam ivāgnidāvam
GE09ram_03_u:1904: 3.049.040a tatas tu taṃ patrarathaṃ mahītale; nipātitaṃ rāvaṇavegamarditam 3.049.040c punaḥ pariṣvajya śaśiprabhānanā; ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1905: 3.050.001a tam alpajīvitaṃ bhūmau sphurantaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.050.001c dadarśa gṛdhraṃ patitaṃ samīpe rāghavāśramāt 3.050.002a sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_03_u:1909: 3.050.004a na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1910: 3.050.004c dhāvanti nūnaṃ kākutstha madarthaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 3.050.005a trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā
GE09ram_03_u:1911: 3.050.005c susaṃtrastā samākrandac chṛṇvatāṃ tu yathāntike 3.050.006a tāṃ kliṣṭamālyābharaṇāṃ vilapantīm anāthavat
GE09ram_03_u:1913: 3.050.007a tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān
GE09ram_03_u:1914: 3.050.007c muñca muñceti bahuśaḥ pravadan rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.050.008a krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:1917: 3.050.009c jagat sarvam amaryādaṃ tamasāndhena saṃvṛtam 3.050.010a dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:1918: 3.050.010c kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1919: 3.050.011a prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1921: 3.050.012a sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca 3.050.012c jagāmākāśam ādāya rāvaṇo
GE09ram_03_u:1922: 3.050.013a taptābharaṇasarvāṅgī pītakauśeyavāsanī 3.050.013c rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1923: 3.050.014a uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1924: 3.050.014c adhikaṃ paribabhrāja girir dīpa ivāgninā 3.050.015a tasyāḥ paramakalyāṇyās tāmrāṇi surabhīṇi ca 3.050.015c padmapatrāṇi vaidehyā abhyakīryanta rāvaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1925: 3.050.016a tasyāḥ kauśeyam uddhūtam ākāśe kanakaprabham 3.050.016c babhau cādityarāgeṇa tāmram abhram ivātape 3.050.017a tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam
GE09ram_03_u:1926: 3.050.017c na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam
GE09ram_03_u:1927: 3.050.018a babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1929: 3.050.018e śuklaiḥ suvimalair dantaiḥ prabhāvadbhir alaṃkṛtam 3.050.019a ruditaṃ vyapamṛṣṭāstraṃ candravat priyadarśanam
GE09ram_03_u:1931: 3.050.020a rākṣasendrasamādhūtaṃ tasyās tad vacanaṃ śubham 3.050.020c śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1932: 3.050.021a sā hemavarṇā nīlāṅgaṃ maithilī rākṣasādhipam 3.050.021c śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā
GE09ram_03_u:1933: 3.050.022a sā padmagaurī hemābhā rāvaṇaṃ janakātmajā 3.050.022c vidyudghanam ivāviśya śuśubhe
GE09ram_03_u:1935: 3.050.023c babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ

GE09ram_03_u:2103: 3.054.010c rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam
GE09ram_03_u:2104: 3.054.011a yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā
GE09ram_03_u:2105: 3.054.011c sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha
GE09ram_03_u:2106: 3.054.012a gatāyus tvaṃ gataśrīko gatasattvo gatendriyaḥ 3.054.012c laṅkā vaidhavyasaṃyuktā tvatkṛtena bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2107: 3.054.013a na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2108: 3.054.013c yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt
GE09ram_03_u:2109: 3.054.014a sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2110: 3.054.014c nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake
GE09ram_03_u:2111: 3.054.015a sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham 3.054.015c apaneṣyati gātrebhyaḥ śaravarṣeṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:2112: 3.054.016a yadā vināśo bhūtānāṃ dṛśyate kālacoditaḥ 3.054.016c tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2113: 3.054.017a māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rakṣasādhama
GE09ram_03_u:2114: 3.054.017c ātmano rākṣasānāṃ ca vadhāyāntaḥpurasya ca 3.054.018a na śakyā yajñamadhyasthā vediḥ srugbhāṇḍa maṇḍitā
GE09ram_03_u:2115: 3.054.018c dvijātimantrasaṃpūtā caṇḍālenāvamarditum 3.054.019a idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā
GE09ram_03_u:2116: 3.054.019c nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:2117: 3.054.019e na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2118: 3.054.020a evam uktvā tu vaidehī kroddhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2119: 3.054.020c rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:2120: 3.054.021a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā paruṣaṃ romaharṣaṇam 3.054.021c pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ bhayasaṃdarśanaṃ vacaḥ 3.054.022a śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini
GE09ram_03_u:2121: 3.054.022c kālenānena nābhyeṣi yadi māṃ cāruhāsini 3.054.022e tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2122: 3.054.023a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2123: 3.054.023c rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2124: 3.054.024a śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2126: 3.054.025a vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2128: 3.054.026a sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2129: 3.054.026c pracālya caraṇotkarṣair dārayann iva medinīm 3.054.027a aśokavanikāmadhye maithilī nīyatām iti
GE09ram_03_u:2130: 3.054.027c tatreyaṃ rakṣyatāṃ gūḍham uṣmābhiḥ parivāritā 3.054.028a tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:2131: 3.054.028c ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:2132: 3.054.029a iti pratisamādiṣṭā rākṣasyo rāvaṇena tāḥ 3.054.029c aśokavanikāṃ jagmur maithilīṃ parigṛhya tām 3.054.030a sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣair nānāpuṣpaphalair vṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:2134: 3.054.031a sā tu śokaparītāṅgī maithilī janakātmajā 3.054.031c rākṣasī vaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2135: 3.054.032a na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī; virūpanetrābhir atīva tarjitā
GE09ram_03_u:2136: 3.054.032c patiṃ smarantī dayitaṃ ca devaraṃ; vicetanābhūd bhayaśokapīḍitā 3.055.001a rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa carantaṃ kāmarūpiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2137: 3.055.001c nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata
GE09ram_03_u:2140: 3.055.003a sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2141: 3.055.003c cintayām āsa gomāyoḥ svareṇa pariśaṅkitaḥ 3.055.004a aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2142: 3.055.004c svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā
GE09ram_03_u:2143: 3.055.005a mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam
GE09ram_03_u:2144: 3.055.005c vikruṣṭaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ śṛṇuyād yadi 3.055.006a sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm 3.055.006c tayaiva prahitaḥ kṣipraṃ matsakāśam ihaiṣyati 3.055.007a rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2145: 3.055.007c kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām
GE09ram_03_u:2146: 3.055.008a dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2147: 3.055.008c hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyajahāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:2148: 3.055.009a api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane
GE09ram_03_u:2150: 3.055.009e nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca 3.055.010a ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam
GE09ram_03_u:2153: 3.055.011a taṃ dīnamānasaṃ dīnam āsedur mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 3.055.011c savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān
GE09ram_03_u:2154: 3.055.012a tāni dṛṣṭvā nimittāni mahāghorāṇi rāghavaḥ 3.055.012c tato lakṣaṇam āyāntaṃ dadarśa vigataprabham 3.055.013a tato 'vidūre rāmeṇa samīyāya sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2155: 3.055.013c viṣaṇṇaḥ sa viṣaṇṇena duḥkhito duḥkhabhāginā 3.055.014a saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam 3.055.014c vihāya sītāṃ vijane vane rākṣasasevite 3.055.015a gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2156: 3.055.015c uvāca madhurodarkam idaṃ paruṣam ārtavat 3.055.016a aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām
GE09ram_03_u:2157: 3.055.016c sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:2158: 3.055.017a na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:2159: 3.055.017c vinaṣṭā bhakṣitā vāpa rākṣasair vanacāribhiḥ 3.055.018a aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_03_u:2160: 3.055.018c api lakṣmaṇa sītāyāḥ sāmagryaṃ prāpnuyāvahe 3.055.019a idaṃ hi rakṣomṛgasaṃnikāśaṃ; pralobhya māṃ dūram anuprayātam
GE09ram_03_u:2161: 3.055.019c hataṃ kathaṃ cin mahatā śrameṇa; sa rākṣaso 'bhūn mriyamāṇa eva 3.055.020a manaś ca me dīnam ihāprahṛṣṭaṃ; cakṣuś ca savyaṃ kurute vikāram 3.055.020c asaṃśayaṃ lakṣmaṇa nāsti sītā; hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā
GE09ram_03_u:2162: 3.056.001a sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2163: 3.056.001c paryapṛcchata dharmātmā vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā 3.056.002a prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:2164: 3.056.002c kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ 3.056.003a rājyabhraṣṭasya dīnasya daṇḍakān paridhāvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2165: 3.056.003c kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:2166: 3.056.004a yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_03_u:2167: 3.056.004c kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_03_u:2168: 3.056.005a patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2169: 3.056.005c vinā tāṃ tapanīyābhāṃ neccheyaṃ janakātmajām 3.056.006a kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama
GE09ram_03_u:2170: 3.056.006c kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2171: 3.056.007a sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi
GE09ram_03_u:2172: 3.056.007c kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2174: 3.056.008c upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccin saumya na kaikayīm
GE09ram_03_u:2175: 3.056.009a yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2176: 3.056.009c suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2177: 3.056.010a yadi mām āśramagataṃ vaidehī nābhibhāṣate 3.056.010c punaḥ prahasitā sītā vinaśiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa 3.056.011a brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā 3.056.011c tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
GE09ram_03_u:2178: 3.056.012a sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:2179: 3.056.012c madviyogena vaidehī vyaktaṃ śocati durmanāḥ 3.056.013a sarvathā rakṣasā tena jihmena sudurātmanā 3.056.013c vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_03_u:2180: 3.056.014a śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama 3.056.014c trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ 3.056.015a sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane
GE09ram_03_u:2181: 3.056.015c pratikartuṃ nṛśaṃsānāṃ rakṣasāṃ dattam antaram 3.056.016a duḥkhitāḥ kharaghātena rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2182: 3.056.016c taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2184: 3.056.017c kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:2185: 3.056.018a iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2187: 3.056.019a vigarhamāṇo 'nujam ārtarūpaṃ; kṣudhā śramāc caiva pipāsayā ca 3.056.019c viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukho viṣaṇṇaḥ; pratiśrayaṃ prāpya samīkṣya
GE09ram_03_u:2189: 3.056.020a svam āśramaṃ saṃpravigāhya vīro; vihāradeśān anusṛtya kāṃś cit
GE09ram_03_u:2190: 3.056.020c etat tad ity eva nivāsabhūmau; prahṛṣṭaromā vyathito babhūva
GE09ram_03_u:2192: 3.057.001c paripapraccha saumitriṃ rāmo duḥkhārditaḥ punaḥ 3.057.002a tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:2193: 3.057.002c yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane viharitā mayā
GE09ram_03_u:2194: 3.057.003a dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2195: 3.057.003c śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2196: 3.057.004a sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me 3.057.004c dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi
GE09ram_03_u:2197: 3.057.005a evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2198: 3.057.005c bhūyo duḥkhasamāviṣṭo duḥkhitaṃ rāmam abravīt 3.057.006a na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2200: 3.057.007a āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_03_u:2201: 3.057.007c paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam
GE09ram_03_u:2202: 3.057.008a sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:2203: 3.057.008c gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā
GE09ram_03_u:2204: 3.057.009a pracodyamānena mayā gaccheti bahuśas tayā 3.057.009c pratyuktā maithilī vākyam idaṃ tvatpratyayānvitam 3.057.010a na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet
GE09ram_03_u:2205: 3.057.010c nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:2206: 3.057.011a vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:2207: 3.057.011c trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api
GE09ram_03_u:2208: 3.057.012a kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram
GE09ram_03_u:2209: 3.057.012c visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti
GE09ram_03_u:2210: 3.057.012e na bhavatyā vyathā kāryā kunārījanasevitā 3.057.013a alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā
GE09ram_03_u:2211: 3.057.013c na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe 3.057.013e jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet
GE09ram_03_u:2212: 3.057.014a evam uktā tu vaidehī parimohitacetanā 3.057.014c uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2213: 3.057.015a bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2214: 3.057.015c vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi 3.057.016a saṃketād bharatena tvaṃ rāmaṃ samanugacchasi 3.057.016c krośantaṃ hi yathātyarthaṃ nainam abhyavapadyase 3.057.017a ripuḥ pracchannacārī tvaṃ madartham anugacchasi 3.057.017c rāghavasyāntaraprepsus tathainaṃ nābhipadyase
GE09ram_03_u:2215: 3.057.018a evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2217: 3.057.019a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saumitriṃ rāmaḥ saṃtāpamohitaḥ 3.057.019c abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ 3.057.020a jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe
GE09ram_03_u:2218: 3.057.020c anena krodhavākyena maithilyā niḥsṛto bhavān 3.057.021a na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm 3.057.021c kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2219: 3.057.022a sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2220: 3.057.022c krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:2221: 3.057.023a asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā
GE09ram_03_u:2223: 3.057.024a vikṛṣya cāpaṃ paridhāya sāyakaṃ; salīla bāṇena ca tāḍito mayā 3.057.024c mārgīṃ tanuṃ tyajya ca viklavasvaro; babhūva keyūradharaḥ sa
GE09ram_03_u:2225: 3.057.025a śarāhatenaiva tadārtayā girā; svaraṃ mamālambya sudūrasaṃśravam
GE09ram_03_u:2226: 3.057.025c udāhṛtaṃ tad vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ; tvam āgato yena vihāya maithilīm 3.058.001a bhṛśam āvrajamānasya tasyādhovāmalocanam
GE09ram_03_u:2227: 3.058.001c prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate
GE09ram_03_u:2228: 3.058.002a upālakṣya nimittāni so 'śubhāni muhur muhuḥ 3.058.002c api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha 3.058.003a tvaramāṇo jagāmātha sītādarśanalālasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2230: 3.058.004a udbhramann iva vegena vikṣipan raghunandanaḥ 3.058.004c tatra tatroṭajasthānam abhivīkṣya samantataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2231: 3.058.005a dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_03_u:2232: 3.058.005c śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva
GE09ram_03_u:2233: 3.058.006a rudantam iva vṛkṣaiś ca mlānapuṣpamṛgadvijam 3.058.006c śriyā vihīnaṃ vidhvastaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2234: 3.058.007a viprakīrṇājinakuśaṃ vipraviddhabṛsīkaṭam 3.058.007c dṛṣṭvā śūnyoṭajasthānaṃ vilalāpa punaḥ punaḥ 3.058.008a hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati 3.058.008c nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā 3.058.009a gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ 3.058.009c atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā 3.058.010a yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām
GE09ram_03_u:2235: 3.058.010c śokaraktekṣaṇaḥ śokād unmatta iva lakṣyate 3.058.011a vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm 3.058.011c babhūva vilapan rāmaḥ śokapaṅkārṇavaplutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2236: 3.058.012a asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:2237: 3.058.012c kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām
GE09ram_03_u:2238: 3.058.013a snigdhapallavasaṃkāśāṃ pītakauśeyavāsinīm 3.058.013c śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī
GE09ram_03_u:2239: 3.058.014a atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām
GE09ram_03_u:2240: 3.058.014c janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā 3.058.015a kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:2241: 3.058.015c latāpallavapuṣpāḍhyo bhāti hy eṣa vanaspatiḥ 3.058.016a bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam
GE09ram_03_u:2242: 3.058.016c eṣa vyaktaṃ vijānāti tilakas tilakapriyām 3.058.017a aśokaśokāpanuda śokopahatacetasaṃ 3.058.017c tvannāmānaṃ kuru kṣipraṃ priyāsaṃdarśanena mām 3.058.018a yadi tāla tvayā dṛṣṭā pakvatālaphalastanī 3.058.018c kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṣyaṃ yadi te mayi
GE09ram_03_u:2243: 3.058.019a yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā sītā jambujāmbūnadaprabhā 3.058.019c priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me
GE09ram_03_u:2244: 3.058.020a atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:2245: 3.058.020c mṛgaviprekṣaṇī kāntā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bhavet 3.058.021a gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:2246: 3.058.021c tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2247: 3.058.022a śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā
GE09ram_03_u:2248: 3.058.022c maithilī mama visrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam
GE09ram_03_u:2249: 3.058.023a kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:2250: 3.058.023c vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_03_u:2251: 3.058.024a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi 3.058.024c nātyarthaṃ hāsyaśīlāsi kimarthaṃ mām upekṣase 3.058.025a pītakauśeyakenāsi sūcitā varavarṇini
GE09ram_03_u:2252: 3.058.025c dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam 3.058.026a naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī
GE09ram_03_u:2253: 3.058.026c kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati
GE09ram_03_u:2254: 3.058.027a vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2255: 3.058.027c vibhajyāṅgāni sarvāṇi mayā virahitā priyā 3.058.028a nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam
GE09ram_03_u:2256: 3.058.028c sā hi campakavarṇābhā grīvā graiveya śobhitā
GE09ram_03_u:2257: 3.058.029a komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā
GE09ram_03_u:2258: 3.058.029c nūnaṃ vikṣipyamāṇau tau bāhū pallavakomalau 3.058.030a bhakṣitau vepamānāgrau
GE09ram_03_u:2259: 3.058.030c mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai
GE09ram_03_u:2261: 3.058.031c hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kva cit 3.058.032a hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2262: 3.058.032c ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam
GE09ram_03_u:2263: 3.058.033a kva cid udbhramate vegāt kva cid vibhramate balāt 3.058.033c kva cin matta ivābhāti kāntān veṣaṇatatparaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2264: 3.058.034a sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:2265: 3.058.034c kānanāni ca vegena bhramaty aparisaṃsthitaḥ 3.058.035a tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ; parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:2266: 3.058.035c aniṣṭhitāśaḥ sa cakāra mārgaṇe; punaḥ priyāyāḥ paramaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2269: 3.059.001c rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:2270: 3.059.002a adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2271: 3.059.002c uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau
GE09ram_03_u:2272: 3.059.003a kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā
GE09ram_03_u:2273: 3.059.003c kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:2274: 3.059.004a vṛṣkeṇāvārya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2275: 3.059.004c alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam
GE09ram_03_u:2276: 3.059.005a yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2277: 3.059.005c ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2278: 3.059.006a mṛtaṃ śokena mahatā sītāharaṇajena mām 3.059.006c paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā
GE09ram_03_u:2279: 3.059.007a kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2280: 3.059.007c apūrayitvā taṃ kālaṃ matsakāśam ihāgataḥ 3.059.008a kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:2281: 3.059.008c dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā
GE09ram_03_u:2283: 3.059.009c mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum
GE09ram_03_u:2284: 3.059.010a kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame
GE09ram_03_u:2285: 3.059.010c tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2287: 3.059.011c na dadarśa suduḥkhārto rāghavo janakātmajām 3.059.012a anāsādayamānaṃ taṃ sītāṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2288: 3.059.012c paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_03_u:2289: 3.059.012e lakṣmaṇo rāmam atyartham uvāca hitakāmyayā 3.059.013a mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:2290: 3.059.013c idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam
GE09ram_03_u:2292: 3.059.014c sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām 3.059.015a saritaṃ vāpi saṃprāptā
GE09ram_03_u:2293: 3.059.015c vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:2294: 3.059.015e jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:2295: 3.059.016a tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe
GE09ram_03_u:2296: 3.059.016c vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:2297: 3.059.016e manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ 3.059.017a evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2298: 3.059.017c saha saumitriṇā rāmo vicetum upacakrame 3.059.017e tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca 3.059.018a nikhilena vicinvantau sītāṃ daśarathātmajau
GE09ram_03_u:2299: 3.059.018c tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca
GE09ram_03_u:2300: 3.059.019a nikhilena vicinvantau naiva tām abhijagmatuḥ 3.059.019c vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2301: 3.059.020a neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe
GE09ram_03_u:2302: 3.059.020c tato duḥkhābhisaṃtapto lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt 3.059.021a vicaran daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2303: 3.059.021c prāpsyasi tvaṃ mahāprājña maithilīṃ janakātmajām 3.059.022a yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām
GE09ram_03_u:2304: 3.059.022c evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2306: 3.059.023c vanaṃ sarvaṃ suvicitaṃ padminyaḥ phullapaṅkajāḥ 3.059.024a giriś cāyaṃ mahāprājña
GE09ram_03_u:2307: 3.059.024c na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_03_u:2308: 3.059.025a evaṃ sa vilapan rāmaḥ sītāharaṇakarśitaḥ 3.059.025c dīnaḥ śokasamāviṣṭo muhūrtaṃ vihvalo 'bhavat
GE09ram_03_u:2311: 3.059.027a bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2312: 3.059.027c hā priyeti vicukrośa bahuśo bāṣpagadgadaḥ 3.059.028a taṃ sāntvayām āsa tato lakṣmaṇaḥ priyabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2314: 3.059.029a anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇauṣṭhapuṭacyutam 3.059.029c apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ 3.060.001a sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2315: 3.060.001c śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:2316: 3.060.001e api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā
GE09ram_03_u:2317: 3.060.002a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi 3.060.002c nadīṃ godāvarīṃ ramyāṃ jagāma laghuvikramaḥ 3.060.003a tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2318: 3.060.003c naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me
GE09ram_03_u:2319: 3.060.004a kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī
GE09ram_03_u:2320: 3.060.004c na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:2321: 3.060.005a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dīnaḥ saṃtāpa mohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2322: 3.060.005c rāmaḥ samabhicakrāma svayaṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm 3.060.006a sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt 3.060.007a bhūtāni rākṣasendreṇa vadhārheṇa hṛtām api 3.060.007c na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī
GE09ram_03_u:2323: 3.060.008a tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti
GE09ram_03_u:2324: 3.060.008c na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā
GE09ram_03_u:2325: 3.060.009a rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2326: 3.060.009c dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām
GE09ram_03_u:2327: 3.060.010a nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2329: 3.060.011a kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2330: 3.060.011c mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam
GE09ram_03_u:2331: 3.060.012a yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2332: 3.060.012c sarvaṃ vyapanayac chokaṃ vaidehī kva nu sā gatā 3.060.013a jñātipakṣavihīnasya rājaputrīm apaśyataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2333: 3.060.013c manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2334: 3.060.014a godāvarīṃ janasthānam imaṃ prasravaṇaṃ girim 3.060.014c sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:2335: 3.060.015a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:2337: 3.060.016a tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale
GE09ram_03_u:2338: 3.060.016c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2340: 3.060.017c apinaddhāni vaidehyā mayā dattāni kānane 3.060.018a evam uktvā mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaṃ puruṣarṣabham 3.060.018c kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā 3.060.019a tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata
GE09ram_03_u:2341: 3.060.019c yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:2344: 3.060.021a imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2345: 3.060.021c yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām
GE09ram_03_u:2346: 3.060.022a evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:2347: 3.060.022c dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:2348: 3.060.023a sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:2349: 3.060.023c saṃbhrāntahṛdayo rāmaḥ śaśaṃsa bhrātaraṃ priyam 3.060.024a paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ śīrṇāḥ kanakabindavaḥ 3.060.024c bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:2351: 3.060.025c āvṛtaṃ paśya saumitre sarvato dharaṇītalam 3.060.026a manye lakṣmaṇa vaidehī rākṣasaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ 3.060.026c bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2352: 3.060.027a tasya nimittaṃ vaidehyā dvayor vivadamānayoḥ 3.060.027c babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha
GE09ram_03_u:2354: 3.060.028c dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2355: 3.060.029a taruṇādityasaṃkāśaṃ vaidūryagulikācitam 3.060.029c viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam
GE09ram_03_u:2357: 3.060.030c bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam
GE09ram_03_u:2359: 3.060.031c bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:2361: 3.060.032c apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2364: 3.060.034a vairaṃ śataguṇaṃ paśya mamedaṃ jīvitāntakam 3.060.034c sughorahṛdayaiḥ saumya rākṣasaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2365: 3.060.035a hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī 3.060.035c na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane
GE09ram_03_u:2366: 3.060.036a bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2367: 3.060.036c ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ 3.060.037a kartāram api lokānāṃ śūraṃ karuṇavedinam 3.060.037c ajñānād avamanyeran sarvabhūtāni lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2368: 3.060.038a mṛduṃ lokahite yuktaṃ dāntaṃ karuṇavedinam 3.060.038c nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2369: 3.060.039a māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa 3.060.039c adyaiva sarvabhūtānāṃ rakṣasām abhavāya ca 3.060.039e saṃhṛtyaiva śaśijyotsnāṃ mahān sūrya ivoditaḥ 3.060.040a naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ 3.060.040c kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2371: 3.060.041c niḥsaṃpātaṃ kariṣyāmi hy adya trailokyacāriṇām 3.060.042a saṃniruddhagrahagaṇam āvāritaniśākaram 3.060.042c vipranaṣṭānalamarudbhāskaradyutisaṃvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:2372: 3.060.043a vinirmathitaśailāgraṃ śuṣyamāṇajalāśayam 3.060.043c dhvastadrumalatāgulmaṃ vipraṇāśitasāgaram 3.060.044a na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2373: 3.060.044c asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam
GE09ram_03_u:2375: 3.060.045c mama cāpaguṇān muktair bāṇajālair nirantaram 3.060.046a arditaṃ mama nārācair
GE09ram_03_u:2376: 3.060.046c samākulam amaryādaṃ jagat paśyādya lakṣmaṇa 3.060.047a ākarṇapūrṇair iṣubhir jīvalokaṃ durāvaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2378: 3.060.048a mama roṣaprayuktānāṃ sāyakānāṃ balaṃ surāḥ 3.060.048c drakṣyanty adya vimuktānām amarṣād dūragāminām 3.060.049a naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ 3.060.049c bhaviṣyanti mama krodhāt trailokye vipraṇāśite 3.060.050a devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ lokā ye rakṣasām api 3.060.050c bahudhā nipatiṣyanti bāṇaughaiḥ śakulīkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2379: 3.060.050e nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2380: 3.060.051a yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathākālo yathāvidhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2381: 3.060.051c nityaṃ na pratihanyante sarvabhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa 3.060.051e tathāhaṃ krodhasaṃyukto na nivāryo 'smy asaṃśayam
GE09ram_03_u:2382: 3.060.052a pureva me cārudatīm aninditāṃ; diśanti sītāṃ yadi nādya maithilīm 3.060.052c sadevagandharvamanuṣya pannagaṃ; jagat saśailaṃ parivartayāmy
GE09ram_03_u:2385: 3.061.001c lokānām abhave yuktaṃ sāmvartakam ivānalam 3.061.002a vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2386: 3.061.002c hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2387: 3.061.003a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2388: 3.061.003c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā 3.061.004a purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2389: 3.061.004c na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2390: 3.061.005a candre lakṣṇīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā 3.061.005c etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2391: 3.061.006a na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2392: 3.061.006c kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2395: 3.061.008a ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:2396: 3.061.008c na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam 3.061.009a naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2397: 3.061.009c yuktadaṇḍā hi mṛdavaḥ praśāntā vasudhādhipāḥ 3.061.010a sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2398: 3.061.010c ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2400: 3.061.011c nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2401: 3.061.012a yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2403: 3.061.013a samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:2404: 3.061.013c guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha 3.061.014a devagandharvalokāṃś ca viceṣyāmaḥ samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2406: 3.061.015a na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2407: 3.061.015c kosalendra tataḥ paścāt prāptakālaṃ kariṣyasi 3.061.016a śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītāṃ; nayena na prāpsyasi cen narendra 3.061.016c tataḥ samutsādaya hemapuṅkhair; mahendravajrapratimaiḥ śaraughaiḥ 3.062.001a taṃ tathā śokasaṃtaptaṃ vilapantam anāthavat 3.062.001c mohena mahatāviṣṭaṃ paridyūnam acetanam
GE09ram_03_u:2408: 3.062.002a tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2409: 3.062.002c rāmaṃ saṃbodhayām āsa caraṇau cābhipīḍayan 3.062.003a mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:2411: 3.062.004a tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2412: 3.062.004c rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:2413: 3.062.005a yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase
GE09ram_03_u:2414: 3.062.005c prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2415: 3.062.006a duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:2416: 3.062.006c ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim
GE09ram_03_u:2418: 3.062.007c gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat
GE09ram_03_u:2419: 3.062.008a maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2420: 3.062.008c ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam
GE09ram_03_u:2421: 3.062.009a yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:2422: 3.062.009c asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava
GE09ram_03_u:2423: 3.062.010a yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_03_u:2425: 3.062.011a sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:2426: 3.062.011c na daivasya pramuñcanti sarvabhūtāni dehinaḥ 3.062.012a śakrādiṣv api deveṣu vartamānau nayānayau 3.062.012c śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2427: 3.062.013a naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha
GE09ram_03_u:2428: 3.062.013c śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:2429: 3.062.014a tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2431: 3.062.015a tattvato hi naraśreṣṭha buddhyā samanucintaya 3.062.015c buddhyā yuktā mahāprājñā vijānanti śubhāśubhe 3.062.016a adṛṣṭaguṇadoṣāṇām adhṛtānāṃ ca karmaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:2432: 3.062.016c nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate
GE09ram_03_u:2433: 3.062.017a mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuṣo 'nvaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2434: 3.062.017c anuśiṣyād dhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ 3.062.018a buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā
GE09ram_03_u:2435: 3.062.018c śokenābhiprasuptaṃ te jñānaṃ saṃbodhayāmy aham 3.062.019a divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam
GE09ram_03_u:2437: 3.062.020a kiṃ te sarvavināśena kṛtena puruṣarṣabha 3.062.020c tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum
GE09ram_03_u:2440: 3.063.002a saṃnigṛhya mahābāhuḥ pravṛddhaṃ kopam ātmanaḥ 3.063.002c avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2441: 3.063.003a kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2442: 3.063.003c kenopāyena paśyeyaṃ sītām iti vicintaya 3.063.004a taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2443: 3.063.004c idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2445: 3.063.005c santīha giridurgāṇi nirdarāḥ kandarāṇi ca 3.063.006a guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nānāmṛgagaṇākulāḥ 3.063.006c āvāsāḥ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca gandharvabhavanāni ca 3.063.007a tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2447: 3.063.008a āpatsu na prakampante vāyuvegair ivācalāḥ 3.063.008c ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2448: 3.063.009a kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:2450: 3.063.010a dadarśa patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam 3.063.010c taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2451: 3.063.010e anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2452: 3.063.011a gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam
GE09ram_03_u:2453: 3.063.011c bhakṣayitvā viśālākṣīm āste sītāṃ yathāsukham 3.063.011e enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2454: 3.063.012a ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:2455: 3.063.012c kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_03_u:2456: 3.063.013a taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman
GE09ram_03_u:2457: 3.063.013c abhyabhāṣata pakṣī tu rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam 3.063.014a yām oṣadhim ivāyuṣmann anveṣasi mahāvane 3.063.014c sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:2458: 3.063.015a tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2459: 3.063.015c hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena balīyasā 3.063.016a sītām abhyavapan no 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā
GE09ram_03_u:2461: 3.063.017a etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram
GE09ram_03_u:2462: 3.063.017c ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2463: 3.063.018a pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2464: 3.063.018c sītām ādāya vaidehīm utpapāta vihāyasaṃ 3.063.018e rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvma na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi 3.063.019a rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām
GE09ram_03_u:2466: 3.063.020a ekam ekāyane durge niḥśvasantaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:2467: 3.063.020c samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2468: 3.063.021a rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ 3.063.021c īdṛśīyaṃ mamālakṣmīr nirdahed api pāvakam 3.063.022a saṃpūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim
GE09ram_03_u:2469: 3.063.022c so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ 3.063.023a nāsty abhāgyataro loke matto 'smin sacarācare
GE09ram_03_u:2470: 3.063.023c yeneyaṃ mahatī prāptā mayā vyasanavāgurā 3.063.024a ayaṃ pitṛvayasyo me gṛdhrarājo jarānvitaḥ 3.063.024c śete vinihato bhūmau mama bhāgyaviparyayāt 3.063.025a ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2471: 3.063.025c jaṭāyuṣaṃ ca pasparśa pitṛsnehaṃ nidarśayan 3.063.026a nikṛttapakṣaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ; taṃ gṛdhrarājaṃ parirabhya rāmaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2472: 3.063.026c kva maithili prāṇasamā mameti; vimucya vācaṃ nipapāta bhūmau
GE09ram_03_u:2473: 3.064.001a rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam 3.064.001c saumitriṃ mitrasaṃpannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 3.064.002a mamāyaṃ nūnam artheṣu yatamāno vihaṃgamaḥ 3.064.002c rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān
GE09ram_03_u:2474: 3.064.003a ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate
GE09ram_03_u:2475: 3.064.003c tathā svaravihīno 'yaṃ viklavaṃ samudīkṣate 3.064.004a jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2476: 3.064.004c sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2477: 3.064.005a kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā 3.064.005c aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:2478: 3.064.006a kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam
GE09ram_03_u:2479: 3.064.006c sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama
GE09ram_03_u:2480: 3.064.007a kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2481: 3.064.007c kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2482: 3.064.008a tam udvīkṣyātha dīnātmā vilapantam anantaram 3.064.008c vācātisannayā rāmaṃ jaṭāyur idam abravīt 3.064.009a sā hṛtā rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena vihāyasā 3.064.009c māyām āsthāya vipulāṃ vātadurdinasaṃkulām
GE09ram_03_u:2483: 3.064.010a pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2484: 3.064.010c sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2485: 3.064.011a uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2487: 3.064.012a yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2488: 3.064.012c vipranaṣṭaṃ dhanaṃ kṣipraṃ tat svāmipratipadyate 3.064.013a vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat
GE09ram_03_u:2489: 3.064.013c jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati
GE09ram_03_u:2490: 3.064.014a na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati 3.064.014c vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:2492: 3.064.015c āsyāt susrāva rudhiraṃ mriyamāṇasya sāmiṣam 3.064.016a putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:2493: 3.064.016c ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2494: 3.064.017a brūhi brūhīti rāmasya bruvāṇasya kṛtāñjaleḥ 3.064.017c tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2495: 3.064.018a sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā
GE09ram_03_u:2496: 3.064.018c vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_03_u:2497: 3.064.019a taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam
GE09ram_03_u:2498: 3.064.019c rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2499: 3.064.020a bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham
GE09ram_03_u:2500: 3.064.020c anena daṇḍakāraṇye vicīrṇam iha pakṣiṇā 3.064.021a anekavārṣiko yas tu cirakālaṃ samutthitaḥ 3.064.021c so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2501: 3.064.022a paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me
GE09ram_03_u:2502: 3.064.022c sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā
GE09ram_03_u:2504: 3.064.023c mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2505: 3.064.024a sarvatra khalu dṛśyante sādhavo dharmacāriṇaḥ 3.064.024c śūrāḥ śaraṇyāḥ saumitre tiryagyonigateṣv api 3.064.025a sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:2506: 3.064.025c yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:2507: 3.064.026a rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mayā yaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2508: 3.064.026c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2509: 3.064.027a saumitre hara kāṣṭhāni nirmathiṣyāmi pāvakam 3.064.027c gṛdhrarājaṃ didhakṣāmi matkṛte nidhanaṃ gatam 3.064.028a nāthaṃ patagalokasya citām āropayāmy aham 3.064.028c imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:2510: 3.064.029a yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2511: 3.064.029c aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām
GE09ram_03_u:2512: 3.064.030a mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān
GE09ram_03_u:2513: 3.064.030c gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja
GE09ram_03_u:2514: 3.064.031a evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram
GE09ram_03_u:2515: 3.064.031c dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2516: 3.064.032a rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān 3.064.032c sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam
GE09ram_03_u:2518: 3.064.033c śakunāya dadau rāmo ramye haritaśādvale 3.064.034a yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2519: 3.064.034c tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha
GE09ram_03_u:2520: 3.064.035a tato godāvarīṃ gatvā nadīṃ naravarātmajau 3.064.035c udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:2521: 3.064.036a sa gṛdhrarājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaraṃ; suduṣkaraṃ karma raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:2523: 3.064.036c maharṣikalpena ca saṃskṛtas tadā; jagāma puṇyāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām 3.065.001a kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā
GE09ram_03_u:2524: 3.065.001c avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam
GE09ram_03_u:2525: 3.065.002a tāṃ diśaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ gatvā śaracāpāsidhāriṇau 3.065.002c aviprahatam aikṣvākau panthānaṃ pratipedatuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2526: 3.065.003a gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam
GE09ram_03_u:2527: 3.065.003c āvṛtaṃ sarvato durgaṃ gahanaṃ ghoradarśanam 3.065.004a vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_03_u:2528: 3.065.004c subhīmaṃ tan mahāraṇyaṃ vyatiyātau mahābalau 3.065.005a tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:2529: 3.065.005c krauñcāraṇyaṃ viviśatur gahanaṃ tau mahaujasau 3.065.006a nānāmeghaghanaprakhyaṃ prahṛṣṭam iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2530: 3.065.006c nānāvarṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṣpair mṛgapakṣigaṇair yutam 3.065.007a didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2532: 3.065.008a lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2533: 3.065.008c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.065.009a spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ 3.065.009c prāyaśaś cāpy aniṣṭāni nimittāny upalakṣaye 3.065.010a tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:2534: 3.065.010c mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti saṃbhramam
GE09ram_03_u:2535: 3.065.011a eṣa vañculako nāma pakṣī paramadāruṇaḥ 3.065.011c āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati
GE09ram_03_u:2536: 3.065.012a tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā
GE09ram_03_u:2537: 3.065.012c saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:2539: 3.065.013c vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_03_u:2540: 3.065.014a taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2542: 3.065.015a āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam
GE09ram_03_u:2543: 3.065.015c vivṛddham aśirogrīvaṃ kabandham udare mukham 3.065.016a romabhir nicitais tīkṣṇair mahāgirim ivocchritam 3.065.016c nīlameghanibhaṃ raudraṃ meghastanitaniḥsvanam
GE09ram_03_u:2548: 3.065.019a ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_03_u:2549: 3.065.019c karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛṣkān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān
GE09ram_03_u:2551: 3.065.020c sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2552: 3.065.021a atha tau samatikramya krośamātre dadarśatuḥ 3.065.021c mahāntaṃ dāruṇaṃ bhīmaṃ kabandhaṃ bhujasaṃvṛtam 3.065.022a sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau
GE09ram_03_u:2553: 3.065.022c jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt
GE09ram_03_u:2555: 3.065.023c bhrātarau vivaśaṃ prāptau kṛṣyamāṇau mahābalau 3.065.024a tāv uvāca mahābāhuḥ kabandho dānavottamaḥ 3.065.024c kau yuvāṃ vṛṣabhaskandhau mahākhaḍgadhanurdharau
GE09ram_03_u:2556: 3.065.025a ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau
GE09ram_03_u:2557: 3.065.025c vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām
GE09ram_03_u:2558: 3.065.026a imaṃ deśam anuprāptau kṣudhārtasyeha tiṣṭhataḥ 3.065.026c sabāṇacāpakhaḍgau ca tīkṣṇaśṛṅgāv ivarṣabhau
GE09ram_03_u:2559: 3.065.026e mamāsyam anusaṃprāptau durlabhaṃ jīvitaṃ punaḥ 3.065.027a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kabandhasya durātmanaḥ 3.065.027c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mukhena pariśuṣyatā 3.065.028a kṛcchrāt kṛcchrataraṃ prāpya dāruṇaṃ satyavikrama 3.065.028c vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām
GE09ram_03_u:2560: 3.065.029a kālasya sumahad vīryaṃ sarvabhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa 3.065.029c tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau 3.065.029e nātibhāro 'sti daivasya sarvabhuteṣu lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2561: 3.065.030a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_03_u:2563: 3.065.031a iti bruvāṇo dṛḍhasatyavikramo; mahāyaśā dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:2564: 3.065.031c avekṣya saumitrim udagravikramaṃ; sthirāṃ tadā svāṃ matim ātmanākarot 3.066.001a tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:2566: 3.066.002a tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau
GE09ram_03_u:2567: 3.066.002c āhārārthaṃ tu saṃdiṣṭau daivena gatacetasau 3.066.003a tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:2569: 3.066.004a tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ 3.066.004c tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahe gurū
GE09ram_03_u:2570: 3.066.005a tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:2572: 3.066.006a dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2573: 3.066.006c ciccheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2574: 3.066.007a sa papāta mahābāhuś chinnabāhur mahāsvanaḥ 3.066.007c khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2575: 3.066.008a sa nikṛttau bhujau dṛṣṭvā śoṇitaughapariplutaḥ 3.066.008c dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ 3.066.009a iti tasya bruvāṇasya lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ 3.066.009c śaśaṃsa tasya kākutsthaṃ kabandhasya mahābalaḥ 3.066.010a ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2576: 3.066.010c asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2577: 3.066.011a asya devaprabhāvasya vasato vijane vane 3.066.011c rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā yām icchantāv ihāgatau 3.066.012a tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane
GE09ram_03_u:2579: 3.066.013a evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2580: 3.066.013c uvāca paramaprītas tad indravacanaṃ smaran 3.066.014a svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham
GE09ram_03_u:2581: 3.066.014c diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau
GE09ram_03_u:2582: 3.066.015a virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2583: 3.066.015c tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava
GE09ram_03_u:2585: 3.067.001c rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_03_u:2586: 3.067.001e yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2587: 3.067.002a so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat 3.067.002c ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2588: 3.067.003a tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:2589: 3.067.003c saṃcinvan vividhaṃ vanyaṃ rūpeṇānena dharṣitaḥ 3.067.004a tenāham uktaḥ prekṣyaivaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2590: 3.067.004c etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam
GE09ram_03_u:2591: 3.067.005a sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:2593: 3.067.006a yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane 3.067.006c tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham 3.067.007a śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2594: 3.067.007c indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire
GE09ram_03_u:2595: 3.067.008a ahaṃ hi tapasogreṇa pitāmaham atoṣayam 3.067.008c dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat
GE09ram_03_u:2596: 3.067.009a dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati 3.067.009c ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam
GE09ram_03_u:2598: 3.067.010c sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam
GE09ram_03_u:2599: 3.067.011a sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:2600: 3.067.011c pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2602: 3.067.012c vajreṇābhihataḥ kālaṃ sudīrgham api jīvitum 3.067.013a evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau 3.067.013c prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat
GE09ram_03_u:2605: 3.067.015a sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ 3.067.015c chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2606: 3.067.016a sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava 3.067.016c śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:2607: 3.067.017a ahaṃ hi matisācivyaṃ kariṣyāmi nararṣabha 3.067.017c mitraṃ caivopadekṣyāmi yuvābhyāṃ saṃskṛto 'gninā
GE09ram_03_u:2608: 3.067.018a evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2610: 3.067.019a rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_03_u:2611: 3.067.019c niṣkrāntasya janasthānāt saha bhrātrā yathāsukham 3.067.020a nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2612: 3.067.020c nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe 3.067.021a śokārtānām anāthānām evaṃ viparidhāvatām
GE09ram_03_u:2613: 3.067.021c kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām
GE09ram_03_u:2614: 3.067.022a kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2615: 3.067.022c bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite
GE09ram_03_u:2616: 3.067.023a sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:2617: 3.067.023c kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2618: 3.067.024a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam
GE09ram_03_u:2619: 3.067.024c provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:2620: 3.067.025a divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:2621: 3.067.025c yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2622: 3.067.026a adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho 3.067.026c rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava
GE09ram_03_u:2623: 3.067.027a vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2624: 3.067.027c svakṛtena mayā prāptaṃ rūpaṃ lokavigarhitam 3.067.028a kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ 3.067.028c tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:2625: 3.067.029a dagdhas tvayāham avaṭe nyāyena raghunandana 3.067.029c vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasaṃ 3.067.030a tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2626: 3.067.030c kalpayiṣyati te prītaḥ sāhāyyaṃ laghuvikramaḥ 3.067.031a na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2627: 3.067.031c sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare
GE09ram_03_u:2628: 3.068.001a evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau
GE09ram_03_u:2630: 3.068.002a lakṣmaṇas tu maholkābhir jvalitābhiḥ samantataḥ 3.068.002c citām ādīpayām āsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2631: 3.068.003a tac charīraṃ kabandhasya ghṛtapiṇḍopamaṃ mahat 3.068.003c medasā pacyamānasya mandaṃ dahati pāvaka 3.068.004a sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2632: 3.068.004c araje vāsasī vibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2633: 3.068.005a tataś citāyā vegena bhāsvaro virajāmbaraḥ 3.068.005c utpapātāśu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sarvapratyaṅgabhūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2634: 3.068.006a vimāne bhāsvare tiṣṭhan haṃsayukte yaśaskare 3.068.006c prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan
GE09ram_03_u:2636: 3.068.007c śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2637: 3.068.008a rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:2639: 3.068.009a daśābhāgagato hīnas tvaṃ rāma sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 3.068.009c yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2640: 3.068.010a tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara 3.068.010c akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan 3.068.011a śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2641: 3.068.011c bhrātrā nirastaḥ kruddhena vālinā śakrasūnunā 3.068.012a ṛṣyamūke girivare pampāparyantaśobhite
GE09ram_03_u:2642: 3.068.012c nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2643: 3.068.013a vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2645: 3.068.014a na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ 3.068.014c kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:2646: 3.068.015a śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam 3.068.015c kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2647: 3.068.016a sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2650: 3.068.017c kuru rāghava satyena vayasyaṃ vanacāriṇam 3.068.018a sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2652: 3.068.019a na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃ cid asti hi rāghava 3.068.019c yāvat sūryaḥ pratapati sahasrāṃśur ariṃdama 3.068.020a sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān
GE09ram_03_u:2654: 3.068.021a vānarāṃś ca mahākāyān preṣayiṣyati rāghava 3.068.021c diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm
GE09ram_03_u:2657: 3.068.022c plavaṃgamānāṃ pravaras tava priyāṃ; nihatya rakṣāṃsi punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2660: 3.069.001c vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2661: 3.069.002a eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2662: 3.069.002c pratīcīṃ diśam āśritya prakāśante manoramāḥ 3.069.003a jambūpriyālapanasāḥ plakṣanyagrodhatindukāḥ 3.069.003c aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2663: 3.069.004a tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt
GE09ram_03_u:2665: 3.069.005a caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam
GE09ram_03_u:2666: 3.069.005c tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2669: 3.069.007a tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2671: 3.069.008a nodvijante narān dṛṣṭvā vadhasyākovidāḥ śubhāḥ 3.069.008c ghṛtapiṇḍopamān sthūlāṃs tān dvijān bhakṣayiṣyathaḥ 3.069.009a rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2672: 3.069.009c pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān
GE09ram_03_u:2674: 3.069.010c tava bhaktyā samāyukto lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃpradāsyati 3.069.011a bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye
GE09ram_03_u:2675: 3.069.011c padmagandhi śivaṃ vāri sukhaśītam anāmayam 3.069.012a uddhṛtya sa tadākliṣṭaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2678: 3.069.013c apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2679: 3.069.013e rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama
GE09ram_03_u:2680: 3.069.014a sāyāhne vicaran rāma viṭapī mālyadhāriṇaḥ 3.069.014c śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2681: 3.069.015a sumanobhiś citāṃs tatra tilakān naktamālakān 3.069.015c utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2682: 3.069.016a na tāni kaś cin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2684: 3.069.017a teṣāṃ bhārābhitaptānāṃ vanyam āharatāṃ guroḥ 3.069.017c ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2685: 3.069.018a tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā
GE09ram_03_u:2687: 3.069.019a teṣām adyāpi tatraiva dṛśyate paricāriṇī 3.069.019c śramaṇī śabarī nāma kākutstha cirajīvinī 3.069.020a tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:2688: 3.069.020c dṛṣṭvā devopamaṃ rāma svargalokaṃ gamiṣyati 3.069.021a tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam
GE09ram_03_u:2689: 3.069.021c āśramasthānam atulaṃ guhyaṃ kākutstha paśyasi 3.069.022a na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:2690: 3.069.022c ṛṣes tasya mataṅgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam
GE09ram_03_u:2693: 3.069.024a ṛṣyamūkas tu pampāyāḥ purastāt puṣpitadrumaḥ 3.069.024c suduḥkhārohaṇo nāma
GE09ram_03_u:2694: 3.069.024e udāro brahmaṇā caiva pūrvakāle vinirmitaḥ 3.069.025a śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani
GE09ram_03_u:2695: 3.069.025c yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati
GE09ram_03_u:2696: 3.069.026a na tv enaṃ viṣamācāraḥ pāpakarmādhirohati 3.069.026c tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2700: 3.069.028c pracaranti pṛthak kīrṇā meghavarṇās tarasvinaḥ 3.069.029a te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam
GE09ram_03_u:2702: 3.069.030a rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā
GE09ram_03_u:2703: 3.069.030c śilāpidhānā kākutstha duḥkhaṃ cāsyāḥ praveśanam 3.069.031a tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2705: 3.069.032a tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2706: 3.069.032c kadā cic chikhare tasya parvatasyāvatiṣṭhate 3.069.033a kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:2707: 3.069.033c sragvī bhāskaravarṇābhaḥ khe vyarocata vīryavān 3.069.034a taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:2708: 3.069.034c prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt
GE09ram_03_u:2709: 3.069.035a gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2710: 3.069.035c suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:2711: 3.069.036a sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpaṃ; vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskaratulyadehaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2712: 3.069.036c nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya khasthaḥ; sakhyaṃ kuruṣveti tadābhyuvāca
GE09ram_03_u:2713: 3.070.001a tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:2714: 3.070.001c ātasthatur diśaṃ gṛhya pratīcīṃ nṛvarātmajau 3.070.002a tau śaileṣv ācitānekān
GE09ram_03_u:2715: 3.070.002c vīkṣantau jagmatur draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau 3.070.003a kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau
GE09ram_03_u:2716: 3.070.003c pampāyāḥ paścimaṃ tīraṃ rāghavāv upatasthatuḥ 3.070.004a tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam
GE09ram_03_u:2717: 3.070.004c apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:2718: 3.070.005a tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:2720: 3.070.006a tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2721: 3.070.006c pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2722: 3.070.007a tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām
GE09ram_03_u:2723: 3.070.007c kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ 3.070.008a kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane
GE09ram_03_u:2724: 3.070.008c kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham 3.070.008e kaccit te guruśuśrūṣā saphalā cārubhāṣiṇi 3.070.009a rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭhā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā
GE09ram_03_u:2725: 3.070.009c śaśaṃsa śabarī vṛddhā rāmāya pratyupasthitā 3.070.010a citrakūṭaṃ tvayi prāpte vimānair atulaprabhaiḥ 3.070.010c itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam
GE09ram_03_u:2726: 3.070.011a taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2727: 3.070.011c āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:2729: 3.070.012c taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi 3.070.013a mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:2731: 3.070.014a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam
GE09ram_03_u:2732: 3.070.014c rāghavaḥ prāha vijñāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:2733: 3.070.015a danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2734: 3.070.015c śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase
GE09ram_03_u:2735: 3.070.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:2736: 3.070.016c śabarī darśayām āsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat 3.070.017a paśya meghaghanaprakhyaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2737: 3.070.017c mataṅgavanam ity eva viśrutaṃ raghunandana 3.070.018a iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute
GE09ram_03_u:2738: 3.070.018c juhavāṃś cakrire tīrthaṃ mantravan mantrapūjitam 3.070.019a iyaṃ pratyak sthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ 3.070.019c puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti śramād udvepibhiḥ karaiḥ 3.070.020a teṣāṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena paśyādyāpi raghūttama 3.070.020c dyotayanti diśaḥ sarvāḥ śriyā vedyo 'tulaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2741: 3.070.022a kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha
GE09ram_03_u:2742: 3.070.022c adyāpi na viśuṣyanti pradeśe raghunandana 3.070.023a kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā 3.070.023c tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram
GE09ram_03_u:2743: 3.070.024a teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:2744: 3.070.024c munīnām āśraṃmo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī
GE09ram_03_u:2745: 3.070.025a dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2747: 3.070.026a anujñātā tu rāmeṇa hutvātmānaṃ hutāśane 3.070.026c jvalatpāvakasaṃkāśā svargam eva jagāma sā 3.070.027a yatra te sukṛtātmāno viharanti maharṣayaḥ 3.070.027c tat puṇyaṃ śabarīsthānaṃ jagāmātmasamādhinā
GE09ram_03_u:2748: 3.071.001a divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:2749: 3.071.001c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2750: 3.071.002a cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:2753: 3.071.003c viśvastamṛgaśārdūlo nānāvihagasevitaḥ 3.071.004a saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2754: 3.071.004c upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2755: 3.071.005a pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:2756: 3.071.005c tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa saṃprati 3.071.006a hṛdaye hi naravyāghra śubham āvirbhaviṣyati 3.071.006c tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām
GE09ram_03_u:2757: 3.071.007a ṛśyamūko girir yatra nātidūre prakāśate 3.071.007c yasmin vasati dharmātmā sugrīvo 'ṃśumataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2758: 3.071.007e nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2759: 3.071.008a abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham
GE09ram_03_u:2760: 3.071.008c tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2761: 3.071.009a iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2762: 3.071.009c gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2763: 3.071.010a āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ 3.071.010c ājagāma tataḥ pampāṃ lakṣmaṇena sahābhibhūḥ 3.071.011a samīkṣamāṇaḥ puṣpāḍhyaṃ sarvato vipuladrumam
GE09ram_03_u:2764: 3.071.011c koyaṣṭibhiś cārjunakaiḥ śatapatraiś ca kīcakaiḥ 3.071.011e etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat 3.071.012a sa rāmo vidhivān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:2765: 3.071.012c paśyan kāmābhisaṃtapto jagāma paramaṃ hradam 3.071.013a sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm
GE09ram_03_u:2767: 3.071.014a sa tu śokasamāviṣṭo rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 3.071.014c viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:2768: 3.071.015a tilakāśokapuṃnāgabakuloddāla kāśinīm 3.071.015c ramyopavanasaṃbādhāṃ padmasaṃpīḍitodakām 3.071.016a sphaṭikopamatoyāḍhyāṃ ślakṣṇavālukasaṃtatām 3.071.016c matsyakacchapasaṃbādhāṃ tīrasthadrumaśobhitām 3.071.017a sakhībhir iva yuktābhir latābhir anuveṣṭitām 3.071.017c kiṃnaroragagandharvayakṣarākṣasasevitām
GE09ram_03_u:2770: 3.071.018a padmaiḥ saugandhikais tāmrāṃ śuklāṃ kumudamaṇḍalaiḥ 3.071.018c nīlāṃ kuvalayoddhātair bahuvarṇāṃ kuthām iva 3.071.019a aravindotpalavatīṃ padmasaugandhikāyutām 3.071.019c puṣpitāmravaṇopetāṃ barhiṇodghuṣṭanāditām 3.071.020a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha 3.071.020c vilalāpa ca tejasvī kāmād daśarathātmajaḥ 3.071.021a tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā
GE09ram_03_u:2771: 3.071.021c puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2772: 3.071.022a mālatīkundagulmaiś ca bhaṇḍīrair niculais tathā 3.071.022c aśokaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca ketakair atimuktakaiḥ 3.071.022e anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ pramadevopaśobhitām 3.071.023a asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2774: 3.071.024a harir ṛkṣarajo nāmnaḥ putras tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2775: 3.071.024c adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2776: 3.071.025a sugrīvam abhigaccha tvaṃ vānarendraṃ nararṣabha 3.071.025c ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam
GE09ram_03_u:2777: 3.071.026a tato mahad vartma ca dūrasaṃkramaṃ; krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan
